atk-s0304a0:4_0: 1. Saḷāyatanavaggassa paṭhame cakkhunti dve cakkhūni – ñāṇacakkhu ceva maṃsacakkhu
atk-s0304a0:4_1: ca. Tattha ñāṇacakkhu pañcavidhaṃ – buddhacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, samantacakkhu, dibbacakkhu,
atk-s0304a0:4_2: paññācakkhūti. Tesu buddhacakkhu nāma āsayānusayañāṇañceva indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca,
atk-s0304a0:4_3: yaṃ – “buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”ti āgataṃ. Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo
atk-s0304a0:4_4: maggā tīṇi ca phalāni, yaṃ – “virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti āgataṃ.
atk-s0304a0:4_5: Samantacakkhu nāma sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, yaṃ – “pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhū”ti āgataṃ.
atk-s0304a0:4_6: Dibbacakkhu nāma ālokapharaṇena uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yaṃ – “dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti
atk-s0304a0:4_7: āgataṃ. Paññācakkhu nāma catusaccaparicchedakañāṇaṃ, yaṃ – “cakkhuṃ udapādī”ti āgataṃ.
atk-s0304a0:5_0: Maṃsacakkhupi duvidhaṃ – sasambhāracakkhu, pasādacakkhūti. Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake
atk-s0304a0:5_1: akkhipaṭalehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo, yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavo
atk-s0304a0:5_2: jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti. Vitthārato
atk-s0304a0:5_3: pana catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavoti ime nava catusamuṭṭhānavasena chattiṃsa,
atk-s0304a0:5_4: jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā tāva cattāroti cattārīsa
atk-s0304a0:5_5: sambhārā honti. Idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu nāma. Yaṃ panettha setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena
atk-s0304a0:5_6: kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhimaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:5_7: idaṃ pasādacakkhu nāma. Tassa tato paresañca sotādīnaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttāva.
atk-s0304a0:6_0: Tattha yadidaṃ pasādacakkhu, taṃ gahetvā bhagavā – cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, aniccantiādimāha.
atk-s0304a0:6_1: Tattha – “catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ udayabbayavantatāyā”tiādinā nayena vitthārakathā
atk-s0304a0:6_2: heṭṭhā pakāsitāyeva. Sotampi pasādasotameva adhippetaṃ, tathā ghānajivhākāyā. Manoti
atk-s0304a0:6_3: tebhūmakasammasanacāracittaṃ. Iti idaṃ suttaṃ chasu ajjhattikāyatanesu tīṇi lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0304a0:8: 2-3. Dutiyaṃ dve lakkhaṇāni, tatiyaṃ ekalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Sesāni pana tehi sallakkhitāni vā ettakeneva vā sallakkhessantīti.
atk-s0304a0:10_0: 4-6. Catutthe rūpagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā catusamuṭṭhānā, saddo dvisamuṭṭhāno, dhammāti
atk-s0304a0:10_1: tebhūmakadhammārammaṇaṃ. Idampi bāhiresu chasu āyatanesu tilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā kathite
atk-s0304a0:10_2: bujjhanakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Pañcame chaṭṭhe ca dutiyatatiyesu vuttasadisova nayo.
atk-s0304a0:12: 7-12. Sattamādīni atītānāgatesu cakkhādīsu aniccalakkhaṇādīni sallakkhetvā paccuppannesu balavagāhena kilamantānaṃ vasena vuttāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0304a0:16_1: So pana nesaṃ ajjhattikabhāvo chandarāgassa adhimattabalavatāya veditabbo. Manussānañhi
atk-s0304a0:16_2: antogharaṃ viya cha ajjhattikāyatanāni, gharūpacāraṃ viya cha bāhirāyatanāni. Yathā
atk-s0304a0:16_3: nesaṃ puttadāradhanadhaññapuṇṇe antoghare chandarāgo adhimattabalavā hoti, tattha
atk-s0304a0:16_4: kassaci pavisituṃ na denti, appamattena bhājanasaddamattenāpi “kiṃ eta”nti? Vattāro
atk-s0304a0:16_5: bhavanti. Evamevaṃ chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu adhimattabalavachandarāgoti. Iti
atk-s0304a0:16_6: imāya chandarāgabalavatāya tāni “ajjhattikānī”ti vuttāni. Gharūpacāre pana no tathā
atk-s0304a0:16_7: balavā hoti, tattha carante manussepi catuppadānipi na sahasā nivārenti. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0304a0:16_8: na nivārenti, anicchantā pana pasupacchimattampi gahituṃ na denti. Iti nesaṃ tattha
atk-s0304a0:16_9: na adhimattabalavachandarāgo hoti. Rūpādīsupi tatheva na adhimattabalavachandarāgo,
atk-s0304a0:16_10: tasmā tāni “bāhirānī”ti vuttāni. Vitthārato pana ajjhattikabāhirakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0304a0:16_11: vuttāva. Sesaṃ dvīsupi suttesu heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Tathā tatiyacatutthesu.
atk-s0304a0:18_0: 17-18. Pañcame nissaṭāti nikkhantā. Visaññuttāti nosaṃyuttā. Vippamuttāti no adhimuttā
atk-s0304a0:18_1: vimariyādīkatena cetasāti nimmariyādīkatena cetasā. Yañhi kilesajātaṃ vā vaṭṭaṃ vā
atk-s0304a0:18_2: appahīnaṃ hoti, tena sekhānaṃ cittaṃ samariyādīkataṃ nāma. Yaṃ pahīnaṃ, tena vimariyādīkataṃ.
atk-s0304a0:18_3: Idha pana sabbaso kilesānañceva vaṭṭassa ca pahīnattā vimariyādīkatena kilesavaṭṭamariyādaṃ
atk-s0304a0:18_4: atikkantena cittena vihariṃsūti attho. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo. Chasupi panetesu suttesu
atk-s0304a0:20: 19-22. Sattamādīsu catūsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Anupubbakathā pana nesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
atk-s0304a0:24: 23. Sabbavaggassa paṭhame sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhaveti sabbaṃ nāma catubbidhaṃ – sabbasabbaṃ, āyatanasabbaṃ, sakkāyasabbaṃ, padesasabbanti. Tattha –
atk-s0304a0:29_0: Idaṃ sabbasabbaṃ nāma. “Sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, taṃ suṇāthā”ti idaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:29_1: nāma. “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”ti idaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ nāma.
atk-s0304a0:29_2: “Sabbadhammesu vā pana paṭhamasamannāhāro uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe… tajjāmanodhātū”ti
atk-s0304a0:29_3: idaṃ padesasabbaṃ nāma. Iti pañcārammaṇamattaṃ padesasabbaṃ. Tebhūmakadhammā sakkāyasabbaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:29_4: Catubhūmakadhammā āyatanasabbaṃ. Yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ sabbasabbaṃ. Padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:29_5: na pāpuṇāti, sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti, āyatanasabbaṃ sabbasabbaṃ na
atk-s0304a0:29_6: pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? Sabbaññutaññāṇassa ayaṃ nāma dhammo ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti natthitāya.
atk-s0304a0:30_1: bhaveyya. Imāni pana dvādasāyatanāni atikkamitvā ayaṃ nāma añño sabhāvadhammo atthīti
atk-s0304a0:30_2: dassetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Puṭṭho ca na sampāyeyyāti, “katamaṃ aññaṃ sabbaṃ nāmā”ti?
atk-s0304a0:30_3: Pucchito, “idaṃ nāmā”ti vacanena sampādetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Vighātaṃ āpajjeyyāti dukkhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:30_4: āpajjeyya. Yathā taṃ, bhikkhave, avisayasminti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Yathāti
atk-s0304a0:30_5: kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā avisaye puṭṭhoti attho. Avisayasmiñhi sattānaṃ vighātova hoti,
atk-s0304a0:30_6: kūṭāgāramattaṃ silaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā gambhīre udake taraṇaṃ avisayo, tathā candimasūriyānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:30_7: ākaḍḍhitvā pātanaṃ, tasmiṃ avisaye vāyamanto vighātameva āpajjati, evaṃ imasmimpi
atk-s0304a0:32_0: 24. Dutiye sabbappahānāyāti sabbassa pahānāya. Cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitanti
atk-s0304a0:32_3: eseva nayo. Ettha pana manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Dhammāti ārammaṇaṃ. Manoviññāṇanti
atk-s0304a0:32_4: sahāvajjanakajavanaṃ. Manosamphassoti bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso. Vedayitanti sahāvajjanavedanāya
atk-s0304a0:32_5: javanavedanā. Bhavaṅgasampayuttāya pana vattabbameva natthi. Āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgato
atk-s0304a0:32_6: amocetvā manoti sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammāti ārammaṇaṃ. Manoviññāṇanti
atk-s0304a0:32_7: javanaviññāṇaṃ. Manosamphassoti bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso. Vedayitanti javanasahajātā
atk-s0304a0:32_8: vedanā. Sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgasahajātāpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Yā panettha desanā anusiṭṭhiāṇā,
atk-s0304a0:34_0: 25. Tatiye sabbaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahānāyāti sabbaṃ abhijānitvā parijānitvā pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0304a0:34_1: Abhiññā pariññā pahātabbanti abhijānitvā parijānitvā pahātabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:36_0: 26. Catutthe anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahanti anabhijānanto aparijānanto
atk-s0304a0:36_1: avirājento appajahanto. Ettha ca avirājentoti avigacchāpento. Iti imasmiṃ sutte tissopi
atk-s0304a0:36_2: pariññā kathitā honti. “Abhijāna”nti hi vacanena ñātapariññā kathitā, “parijāna”nti
atk-s0304a0:38_0: 27. Pañcame cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammāti heṭṭhā gahitarūpameva gahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0304a0:38_1: Heṭṭhā vā āpāthagataṃ gahitaṃ, idha anāpāthagataṃ. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – heṭṭhā
atk-s0304a0:38_2: āpāthagatampi anāpāthagatampi gahitameva, idha pana cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tayo
atk-s0304a0:38_3: khandhā. Te hi cakkhuviññāṇena saha viññātabbattā “cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0304a0:40_0: 28. Chaṭṭhe gayāsīseti gayāgāmassa hi avidūre gayāti ekā pokkharaṇīpi atthi nadīpi,
atk-s0304a0:40_1: gayāsīsanāmako hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇopi, yattha bhikkhusahassassapi okāso
atk-s0304a0:40_2: pahoti, bhagavā tattha viharati. Tena vuttaṃ “gayāsīse”ti. Bhikkhū āmantesīti tesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:41_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – ito kira dvānavutikappe mahindo nāma rājā ahosi. Tassa jeṭṭhaputto
atk-s0304a0:41_1: phusso nāma. So pūritapāramī pacchimabhavikasatto, paripākagate ñāṇe bodhimaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0304a0:41_2: āruyha sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhi. Rañño kaniṭṭhaputto tassa aggasāvako ahosi, purohitaputto
atk-s0304a0:41_3: dutiyasāvako. Rājā cintesi – “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhaputto nikkhamitvā buddho jāto, kaniṭṭhaputto
atk-s0304a0:41_4: aggasāvako, purohitaputto dutiyasāvako”ti. So “amhākaṃyeva buddho, amhākaṃ dhammo,
atk-s0304a0:41_5: amhākaṃ saṅgho”ti vihāraṃ kāretvā vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato yāva attano gharadvārā ubhato
atk-s0304a0:41_7: bandhāpetvā heṭṭhā rajatavaṇṇaṃ vālukaṃ santharitvā pupphāni vikirāpetvā tena maggena
atk-s0304a0:42_0: Satthā vihārasmiṃyeva ṭhito cīvaraṃ pārupitvā antosāṇiyāva saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0304a0:42_1: rājagehaṃ āgacchati, katabhattakicco antosāṇiyāva gacchati. Koci kaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi
atk-s0304a0:42_2: dātuṃ na labhati. Tato nāgarā ujjhāyiṃsu, “buddho loke uppanno, na ca mayaṃ puññāni
atk-s0304a0:42_3: kātuṃ labhāma. Yathā hi candimasūriyā sabbesaṃ ālokaṃ karonti, evaṃ buddhā nāma sabbesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:42_4: hitatthāya uppajjanti, ayaṃ pana rājā sabbesaṃ puññacetanaṃ attanoyeva anto pavesetī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:43_0: Tassa ca rañño aññe tayo puttā atthi. Nāgarā tehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sammantayiṃsu,
atk-s0304a0:43_1: “rājakulehi saddhiṃ aṭṭo nāma natthi, ekaṃ upāyaṃ karomā”ti. Te paccante core uṭṭhāpetvā,
atk-s0304a0:43_2: “katipayā gāmā pahaṭā”ti sāsanaṃ āharāpetvā rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā putte pakkosāpetvā“tātā,
atk-s0304a0:43_3: ahaṃ mahallako, gacchatha core vūpasamethā”ti pesesi. Payuttacorā ito cito ca avippakiritvā
atk-s0304a0:43_4: tesaṃ santikameva āgacchiṃsu. Te anāvāse gāme vāsetvā “vūpasamitā corā”ti āgantvā
atk-s0304a0:44_0: Rājā tuṭṭho “tātā, varaṃ vo demī”ti āha. Te adhivāsetvā gantvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ mantayiṃsu,
atk-s0304a0:44_1: “raññā amhākaṃ varo dinno. Kiṃ gaṇhāmā”ti? Ayyaputtā, tumhākaṃ hatthiassādayo na
atk-s0304a0:44_2: dullabhā, buddharatanaṃ pana dullabhaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ uppajjati, tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0304a0:44_3: phussabuddhassa paṭijagganavaraṃ gaṇhathāti. Te “evaṃ karissāmā”ti nāgarānaṃ paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0304a0:44_4: katamassukammā sunhātā suvilittā rañño santikaṃ gantvā, “deva, no varaṃ dethā”ti
atk-s0304a0:44_5: yāciṃsu. Kiṃ gaṇhissatha tātāti? Deva, amhākaṃ hatthiassādīhi attho natthi, jeṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0304a0:44_6: no phussabuddhassa paṭijagganavaraṃ dethāti. “Ayaṃ varo na sakkā mayā jīvamānena
atk-s0304a0:44_7: dātu”nti dve kaṇṇe pidahi. “Deva, na tumhe amhehi balakkārena varaṃ dāpitā, tumhehi
atk-s0304a0:44_8: attano ruciyā tuṭṭhehi dinno. Kiṃ, deva, rājakulassa dve kathā vaṭṭantī”ti? Saccavāditāya bhaṇiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:45_0: Rājā vinivattituṃ alabhanto – “tātā, satta saṃvacchare satta māse satta ca divase
atk-s0304a0:45_1: upaṭṭhahitvā tumhākaṃ dassāmī”ti āha. “Sundaraṃ, deva, pāṭibhogaṃ dethā”ti. “Kissa
atk-s0304a0:45_2: pāṭibhogaṃ tātā”ti? “Ettakaṃ kālaṃ amaraṇapāṭibhogaṃ devā”ti. “Tātā, ayuttaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ
atk-s0304a0:45_3: dāpetha, na sakkā evaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ dātuṃ, tiṇagge ussāvabindusadisaṃ sattānaṃ jīvita”nti.
atk-s0304a0:45_4: “No ce, deva, pāṭibhogaṃ detha, mayaṃ antarā matā kiṃ kusalaṃ karissāmā”ti? “Tena
atk-s0304a0:45_5: hi, tātā, cha saṃvaccharāni dethā”ti. “Na sakkā, devā”ti. “Tena hi pañca, cattāri,
atk-s0304a0:45_6: tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ detha”. “Satta, cha māse detha…pe… māsaḍḍhamattaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0304a0:45_7: “Na sakkā, devā”ti. “Tena hi sattadivasamattaṃ dethā”ti. “Sādhu, devāti satta divase
atk-s0304a0:45_8: sampaṭicchiṃsu”. Rājā satta saṃvacchare satta māse satta divase kattabbasakkāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:46_0: Tato puttānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ satthāraṃ pesetuṃ aṭṭhausabhavitthataṃ maggaṃ alaṅkārāpesi,
atk-s0304a0:46_1: majjhaṭṭhāne catuusabhappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ hatthīhi maddāpetvā kasiṇamaṇḍalasadisaṃ
atk-s0304a0:46_2: katvā vālukāya santharāpetvā pupphābhikiṇṇamakāsi, tattha tattha kadaliyo ca puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0304a0:46_3: ca ṭhapāpetvā dhajapaṭākā ukkhipāpesi. Usabhe usabhe pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpesi, aparabhāge
atk-s0304a0:46_4: dvīsu passesu gandhamālāpupphāpaṇe pasārāpesi. Majjhaṭṭhāne catuusabhavitthārassa
atk-s0304a0:46_5: alaṅkatamaggassa ubhosu passesu dve dve usabhavitthāre magge khāṇukaṇṭake harāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:46_6: daṇḍadīpikāyo kārāpesi. Rājaputtāpi attano āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne soḷasausabhamaggaṃ tatheva alaṅkārāpesuṃ.
atk-s0304a0:47_0: Rājā attano āṇāpavattiṭṭhānassa kedārasīmaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā paridevamāno,
atk-s0304a0:47_1: “tātā, mayhaṃ dakkhiṇakkhiṃ uppāṭetvā gaṇhantā viya gacchatha, evaṃ gaṇhitvā gatā
atk-s0304a0:47_2: pana buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ kareyyātha. Mā surāsoṇḍā viya pamattā vicaritthā”ti āha.
atk-s0304a0:47_3: Te “jānissāma mayaṃ, devā”ti satthāraṃ gahetvā gatā, vihāraṃ kāretvā satthu niyyātetvā
atk-s0304a0:47_4: tattha satthāraṃ paṭijaggantā kālena therāsane, kālena majjhimāsane, kālena saṅghanavakāsane
atk-s0304a0:47_5: tiṭṭhanti. Dānaṃ upaparikkhamānānaṃ tiṇṇampi janānaṃ ekasadisameva ahosi. Te upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0304a0:47_6: vassūpanāyikāya cintayiṃsu – “kathaṃ nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇheyyāmā”ti? Atha
atk-s0304a0:47_7: nesaṃ etadahosi – “buddhā nāma dhammagaruno, na āmisagaruno, sīle patiṭṭhamānā mayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:47_8: satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti dānasaṃvidhāyake manusse pakkosāpetvā, “tātā,
atk-s0304a0:47_9: imināva nīhārena yāgubhattakhādanīyādīni sampādentā dānaṃ pavattethā”ti vatvā dānasaṃvidahanapalibodhaṃ chindiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:48_0: Atha nesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā pañcasate purise ādāya dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya dve kāsāyāni
atk-s0304a0:48_1: acchādetvā kappiyaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjamāno vāsaṃ kappesi. Majjhimo tīhi, kaniṭṭho
atk-s0304a0:48_2: dvīhi purisasatehi saddhiṃ tatheva paṭipajji. Te yāvajīvaṃ satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:49_0: Tepi kālaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya dvānavutikappe manussalokato devalokaṃ, devalokato
atk-s0304a0:49_1: ca manussalokaṃ saṃsarantā amhākaṃ satthukāle devalokā cavitvā manussaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:49_2: Tesaṃ dānagge byāvaṭo mahāamacco aṅgamagadhānaṃ rājā bimbisāro hutvā nibbatti. Te
atk-s0304a0:49_3: tasseva rañño raṭṭhe brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhabhātā jeṭṭhova jāto,
atk-s0304a0:49_4: majjhimakaniṭṭhā majjhimakaniṭṭhāyeva. Yepi tesaṃ parivāramanussā, te parivāramanussāva
atk-s0304a0:49_5: jātā. Te vuddhimanvāya tayopi janā taṃ purisasahassaṃ ādāya nikkhamitvā tāpasā hutvā
atk-s0304a0:49_6: uruvelāyaṃ nadītīreyeva vasiṃsu. Aṅgamagadhavāsino māse māse tesaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0304a0:50_0: Atha amhākaṃ bodhisatto katābhinikkhamano anupubbena sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0304a0:50_1: yasādayo kulaputte vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante dhammadesanatthāya disāsu uyyojetvā sayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:50_2: pattacīvaramādāya – “te tayo jaṭilabhātike damessāmī”ti uruvelaṃ gantvā anekehi pāṭihāriyasatehi
atk-s0304a0:50_3: tesaṃ diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā te pabbājesi. So taṃ iddhimayapattacīvaradharaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0304a0:50_4: ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā tehi parivārito nisīditvā, – “katarā nu kho etesaṃ dhammakathā
atk-s0304a0:50_5: sappāyā”ti cintento, “ime sāyaṃpātaṃ aggiṃ paricaranti. Imesaṃ dvādasāyatanāni ādittāni
atk-s0304a0:50_6: sampajjalitāni viya katvā desessāmi, evaṃ ime arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissantī”ti
atk-s0304a0:50_7: sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. Atha nesaṃ tathā dhammaṃ desetuṃ imaṃ ādittapariyāyaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:50_8: Tena vuttaṃ – “bhikkhū āmantesīti tesaṃ sappāyadhammadesanaṃ vicinitvā taṃ desessāmīti
atk-s0304a0:50_9: āmantesī”ti. Tattha ādittanti padittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:52: 29. Sattame addhabhūtanti adhibhūtaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ, upaddutanti attho. Imasmimpi sutte dukkhalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:54_1: anucchavikaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Cakkhuṃ na maññatīti cakkhuṃ ahanti vā mamanti
atk-s0304a0:54_2: vā paroti vā parassāti vā na maññati. Cakkhusmiṃ na maññatīti ahaṃ cakkhusmiṃ, mama
atk-s0304a0:54_3: kiñcanapalibodho cakkhusmiṃ paro cakkhusmiṃ, parassa kiñcanapalibodho cakkhusminti
atk-s0304a0:54_4: na maññati. Cakkhuto na maññatīti ahaṃ cakkhuto niggato, mama kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto
atk-s0304a0:54_5: niggato, paro cakkhuto niggato, parassa kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto niggatoti evampi
atk-s0304a0:54_6: na maññati, taṇhāmānadiṭṭhimaññanānaṃ ekampi na uppādetīti attho. Cakkhuṃ meti na
atk-s0304a0:54_7: maññatīti mama cakkhūti na maññati, mamattabhūtaṃ taṇhāmaññanaṃ na uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0304a0:54_8: Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Imasmiṃ sutte catucattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:56_0: 31. Navame samugghātasappāyāti samugghātassa upakārabhūtā. Tato taṃ hoti aññathāti
atk-s0304a0:56_1: tato taṃ aññenākārena hoti. Aññathābhāvī bhavasatto loko bhavamevābhinandatīti aññathābhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:56_2: vipariṇāmaṃ upagamanena aññathābhāvī hutvāpi bhavesu satto laggo lagito palibuddho
atk-s0304a0:56_3: ayaṃ loko bhavaṃyeva abhinandati. Yāvatā, bhikkhave, khandhadhātuāyatananti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0304a0:56_4: yattakaṃ idaṃ khandhā ca dhātuyo ca āyatanāni cāti khandhadhātuāyatanaṃ. Tampi na
atk-s0304a0:56_5: maññatīti sabbampi na maññatīti heṭṭhā gahitameva saṃkaḍḍhitvā puna dasseti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:56_6: sutte aṭṭhacattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:58_0: 32. Dasame etaṃ mamātiādīhi tīhi tīhi padehi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhe dassetvā tiparivaṭṭanayena
atk-s0304a0:58_1: desanā katā. Paṭipāṭiyā pana tīsupi imesu suttesu saha vipassanāya cattāropi maggā kathitāti.
atk-s0304a0:61_1: jīraṇasabhāvaṃ. Byādhidhammanti byādhino uppattipaccayabhāvena byādhisabhāvaṃ. Maraṇadhammanti
atk-s0304a0:61_2: maraṇasabhāvaṃ. Sokadhammanti sokassa uppattipaccayabhāvena sokasabhāvaṃ. Saṃkilesikadhammanti
atk-s0304a0:61_3: saṃkilesikasabhāvaṃ. Khayadhammanti khayagamanasabhāvaṃ. Vayadhammādīsupi eseva nayoti.
atk-s0304a0:64_0: 43-52. Aniccavagge abhiññeyyanti pade ñātapariññā āgatā, itarā pana dve gahitāyevāti
atk-s0304a0:64_1: veditabbā. Pariññeyyapahātabbapadesupi tīraṇapahānapariññāva āgatā, itarāpi pana
atk-s0304a0:64_2: dve gahitāyevāti veditabbā. Sacchikātabbanti paccakkhaṃ kātabbaṃ. Abhiññāpariññeyyanti
atk-s0304a0:64_3: idhāpi pahānapariññā avuttāpi gahitāyevāti veditabbā. Upaddutanti anekaggaṭṭhena.
atk-s0304a0:68_0: 53-62. Avijjāvagge avijjāti catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ. Vijjāti arahattamaggavijjā. Aniccato
atk-s0304a0:68_1: jānato passatoti dukkhānattavasenāpi jānato passato pahīyatiyeva, idaṃ pana aniccavasena
atk-s0304a0:68_2: kathite bujjhanakapuggalassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Api cettha
atk-s0304a0:68_3: saṃyojanāti dasa saṃyojanāni. Āsavāti cattāro āsavā. Anusayāti satta anusayā. Sabbupādānapariññāyāti
atk-s0304a0:68_4: sabbesaṃ catunnampi upādānānaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānanatthāya. Pariyādānāyāti khepanatthāya.
atk-s0304a0:72_0: 63. Migajālavaggassa paṭhame cakkhuviññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇena passitabbā. Sotaviññeyyādīsupi
atk-s0304a0:72_1: eseva nayo. Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Kantāti
atk-s0304a0:72_2: kamanīyā. Manāpāti manavaḍḍhanakā. Piyarūpāti piyajātikā. Kāmūpasaṃhitāti ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:72_3: katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā rajanīyāti rañjanīyā, rāguppattikāraṇabhūtāti
atk-s0304a0:72_4: attho. Nandīti taṇhānandī. Saṃyogoti saṃyojanaṃ. Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyuttoti nandībandhanena
atk-s0304a0:72_5: baddho. Araññavanapatthānīti araññāni ca vanapatthāni ca. Tattha kiñcāpi abhidhamme
atk-s0304a0:72_6: nippariyāyena “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ, tathāpi yaṃ
atk-s0304a0:72_7: taṃ “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti araññakaṅganipphādakaṃ senāsanaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva
atk-s0304a0:72_8: adhippetanti veditabbaṃ. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:72_9: yattha na kasīyati na vapīyati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0304a0:74_0: Ettha ca pariyantānanti imaṃ ekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi vanapatthāni
atk-s0304a0:74_1: veditabbāni. Pantānīti pariyantāni atidūrāni. Appasaddānīti udukkhalamusaladārakasaddādīnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:74_2: abhāvena appasaddāni. Appanigghosānīti tesaṃ tesaṃ ninnādamahānigghosassa abhāvena
atk-s0304a0:76: 64. Dutiye nandinirodhā dukkhanirodhoti taṇhānandiyā nirodhena vaṭṭadukkhassa nirodho.
atk-s0304a0:78_0: 65-67. Tatiye samiddhīti attabhāvassa samiddhatāya evaṃ laddhanāmo. Tassa kira therassa
atk-s0304a0:78_1: attabhāvo abhirūpo ahosi pāsādiko, ukkhittamālāpuṭo viya alaṅkatamālāgabbho viya
atk-s0304a0:78_2: ca sabbākārapāripūriyā samiddho. Tasmā samiddhitveva saṅkhaṃ gato. Māroti maraṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:78_3: pucchati. Mārapaññattīti māroti paññatti nāmaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ. Atthi tattha māro vā
atk-s0304a0:78_4: mārapaññatti vāti tattha maraṇaṃ vā maraṇanti idaṃ nāmaṃ vā atthīti dasseti. Catutthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:80: 68. Chaṭṭhe lokoti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Iti migajālattherassa āyācanasuttato paṭṭhāya pañcasupi suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:82_0: 69. Sattame sītavaneti evaṃnāmake susānavane. Sappasoṇḍikapabbhāreti sappaphaṇasadisatāya
atk-s0304a0:82_2: Āsīviso patito hotīti thero kira katabhattakicco mahācīvaraṃ gahetvā leṇacchāyāya
atk-s0304a0:82_3: mandamandena vātapānavātena bījiyamāno nisīditvā dupaṭṭanivāsane sūcikammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0304a0:82_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe leṇacchadane dve āsīvisapotakā kīḷanti. Tesu eko patitvā therassa aṃsakūṭe
atk-s0304a0:82_5: avatthāsi. So ca phuṭṭhaviso hoti. Tasmā patitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya therassa kāye dīpasikhā
atk-s0304a0:82_6: viya vaṭṭiṃ pariyādiyamānamevassa visaṃ otiṇṇaṃ. Thero visassa tathāgamanaṃ disvā
atk-s0304a0:82_7: kiñcāpi taṃ patitamattameva yathāparicchedena gataṃ, attano pana iddhibalena “ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:82_8: attabhāvo leṇe mā vinassatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhikkhū āmantesi. Purāyaṃ kāyo idheva
atk-s0304a0:82_9: vikiratīti yāva na vikirati, tāva naṃ bahiddhā nīharathāti attho. Aññathattanti aññathābhāvaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:82_10: Indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmanti cakkhusotādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ pakativijahanabhāvaṃ. Tattheva
atk-s0304a0:82_11: vikirīti bahi nīharitvā ṭhapitaṭṭhāne mañcakasmiṃyeva vikiri.
atk-s0304a0:84_0: 70. Aṭṭhame rūpappaṭisaṃvedīti nīlapītādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento rūpaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-s0304a0:84_1: karoti, tasmā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī nāma hoti. Rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedīti kilesassa atthibhāveneva
atk-s0304a0:84_2: pana rūparāgaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti nāma, tasmā rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedīti vuccati.
atk-s0304a0:84_3: Sandiṭṭhikotiādīni visuddhimagge vuttatthāneva. No ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedīti kilesassa
atk-s0304a0:84_4: natthibhāveneva na rūparāgaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti nāma, tasmā “no ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī”ti
atk-s0304a0:84_5: vuccati. Imasmiṃ sutte sekhāsekhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:86_0: 71. Navame phassāyatanānanti phassākarānaṃ. Avusitanti avuṭṭhaṃ. Ārakāti dūre. Etthāhaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:86_1: bhante, anassasanti, bhante, ahaṃ ettha anassasiṃ, naṭṭho nāma ahanti vadati. Bhagavā
atk-s0304a0:86_2: – “ayaṃ bhikkhu ‘ahaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sāsane naṭṭho’ti vadati, kinnu khvassa aññesu
atk-s0304a0:86_3: dhātukammaṭṭhāna-kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu abhiyogo atthī”ti cintetvā, tampi apassanto
atk-s0304a0:86_4: – “kataraṃ nu kho kammaṭṭhānaṃ imassa sappāyaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintesi. Tato “āyatanakammaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0304a0:86_5: sappāya”nti disvā taṃ kathento taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhikkhūtiādimāha. Sādhūti tassa byākaraṇe
atk-s0304a0:86_6: sampahaṃsanaṃ. Esevanto dukkhassāti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassanto paricchedo, nibbānanti attho.
atk-s0304a0:88: 72. Dasame anassasanti nassasiṃ, naṭṭho nāmamhi icceva attho. Āyatiṃ apunabbhavāyāti ettha āyatiṃ apunabbhavo nāma nibbānaṃ, nibbānatthāya pahīnaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0304a0:90: 73. Ekādasame anassasanti naṭṭho, panassasanti atinaṭṭho. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0304a0:94_0: 74-78. Gilānavaggassa paṭhame amukasminti asukasmiṃ. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Appaññātoti
atk-s0304a0:94_1: aññāto apākaṭo. Navopi hi koci paññāto hoti rāhulatthero viya sumanasāmaṇero viya
atk-s0304a0:94_2: ca, ayaṃ pana navo ceva apaññāto ca. Sesamettha vuttanayamevāti. Tathā ito paresu catūsu.
atk-s0304a0:96: 79. Chaṭṭhe aniccato jānatoti dukkhānattavasena jānatopi pahīyatiyeva, idaṃ pana aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā vutte bujjhanakassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:98_0: 80. Sattame sabbe dhammāti sabbe tebhūmakadhammā. Nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti abhinivesaparāmāsaggāhena
atk-s0304a0:98_1: gaṇhituṃ na yuttā. Sabbanimittānīti sabbāni saṅkhāranimittāni. Aññato passatīti yathā
atk-s0304a0:98_2: apariññātābhiniveso jano passati, tato aññato passati. Apariññātābhiniveso hi jano
atk-s0304a0:98_3: sabbanimittānipi attato passati. Pariññātābhiniveso pana anattato passati, no attatoti
atk-s0304a0:100: 81. Aṭṭhame idha noti ettha no-kāro nipātamattameva. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Kevalaṃ idha dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:102: 82. Navame lujjatīti palujjati bhijjati. Idha aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:104_0: 83. Dasame chinnapapañceti taṇhāpapañcassa chinnattā chinnapapañce. Chinnavaṭumeti
atk-s0304a0:104_1: taṇhāvaṭumasseva chinnattā chinnavaṭume. Kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati? Atikkantabuddhehi
atk-s0304a0:104_2: pariharitāni cakkhusotādīni pucchāmīti pucchati. Atha vā sace magge bhāvitepi anāgate
atk-s0304a0:108: 84. Channavaggassa paṭhame palokadhammanti bhijjanakasabhāvaṃ. Evamettha aniccalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:110: 85. Dutiye attaniyenāti attano santakena parikkhārena. Evamettha anattalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:114_0: 87. Catutthe channoti evaṃnāmako thero, na abhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantathero. Paṭisallānāti
atk-s0304a0:114_1: phalasamāpattito. Gilānapucchakāti gilānupaṭṭhākā. Gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma buddhapasatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:114_2: buddhavaṇṇitaṃ, tasmā evamāha. Sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyyāti sīse veṭhanaṃ sīsaveṭhaṃ, tañca
atk-s0304a0:114_3: dadeyya. Satthanti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ. Nāvakaṅkhāmīti na icchāmi. Pariciṇṇoti paricarito.
atk-s0304a0:114_4: Manāpenāti manavaḍḍhanakena kāyakammādinā. Ettha ca satta sekhā paricaranti nāma,
atk-s0304a0:114_5: arahā paricārī nāma, bhagavā pariciṇṇo nāma.
atk-s0304a0:115_0: Etañhi, āvuso, sāvakassa patirūpanti, āvuso, sāvakassa nāma etaṃ anucchavikaṃ. Anupavajjanti
atk-s0304a0:115_1: appavattikaṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ. Pucchāvuso sāriputta, sutvā vedissāmāti ayaṃ sāvakapavāraṇā
atk-s0304a0:115_2: nāma. Etaṃ mamātiādīni taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhavasena vuttāni. Nirodhaṃ disvāti khayavayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:115_3: ñatvā. Netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti samanupassāmīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti
atk-s0304a0:115_4: samanupassāmi. Ettakesu ṭhānesu channatthero sāriputtattherena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ arahatte
atk-s0304a0:115_5: pakkhipitvā kathesi. Sāriputtatthero pana tassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi taṃ “puthujjano”ti
atk-s0304a0:115_6: vā “khīṇāsavo”ti vā avatvā tuṇhīyeva ahosi. Cundatthero panassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:116_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto satthaṃ āharāmīti
atk-s0304a0:116_1: vadati, tasmā puthujjano āyasmā, tena idampi manasikarohīti dīpeti. Yasmā vā channaṃ
atk-s0304a0:116_2: āyatanānaṃ nirodhaṃ disvā cakkhādīni tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ vasena na samanupassāmīti vadasi.
atk-s0304a0:116_3: Tasmā idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ āyasmatā manasikātabbantipi puthujjanabhāvameva
atk-s0304a0:116_4: dīpento vadati. Niccakappanti niccakālaṃ. Nissitassāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi nissitassa.
atk-s0304a0:116_5: Calitanti vipphanditaṃ hoti. Yathayidaṃ āyasmato uppannaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkontassa
atk-s0304a0:116_6: “ahaṃ vedayāmi, mama vedanā”ti appahīnaggāhassa idāni vipphanditaṃ hoti, imināpi
atk-s0304a0:117_0: Passaddhīti kāyacittapassaddhi, kilesapassaddhi nāma hotīti attho. Natiyāti taṇhānatiyā.
atk-s0304a0:117_1: Asatīti bhavatthāya ālayanikantipariyuṭṭhāne asati. Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0304a0:117_2: āgati nāma, cutivasena gamanaṃ nāma na hoti. Cutūpapātoti cavanavasena cuti, upapajjanavasena
atk-s0304a0:117_3: upapāto. Nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti na idhaloke na paraloke na ubhayattha
atk-s0304a0:117_4: hoti. Esevanto dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhakilesadukkhassa ayameva anto ayaṃ paricchedo
atk-s0304a0:117_5: parivaṭumabhāvo hoti. Ayameva hi ettha attho. Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti vacanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:117_6: gahetvā antarābhavaṃ icchanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ. Antarābhavassa hi bhāvo
atk-s0304a0:117_7: abhidhamme paṭikkhittoyeva. “Antarenā”ti vacanaṃ pana vikappantaradīpanaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0304a0:117_8: ayamettha attho – neva idha na huraṃ, aparo vikappo na ubhayanti.
atk-s0304a0:118_0: Satthaṃ āharesīti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ āhari, āharitvā kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindi. Athassa
atk-s0304a0:118_1: tasmiṃ khaṇe maraṇabhayaṃ okkami, gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:118_2: ñatvā, saṃviggacitto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā, saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto arahattaṃ patvā,
atk-s0304a0:118_3: samasīsī hutvā parinibbuto. Sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatāti kiñcāpi idaṃ therassa
atk-s0304a0:118_4: puthujjanakāle byākaraṇaṃ hoti; etena pana byākaraṇena anantarāyamassa parinibbānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:118_5: ahosi. Tasmā bhagavā tadeva byākaraṇaṃ gahetvā kathesi.
atk-s0304a0:119_0: Upavajjakulānīti upasaṅkamitabbakulāni. Iminā thero, “bhante, evaṃ upaṭṭhākesu ca
atk-s0304a0:119_1: upaṭṭhāyikāsu ca vijjamānāsu so bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane parinibbāyissatī”ti pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:119_2: kulasaṃsaggadosaṃ dassento pucchati. Athassa bhagavā kulesu saṃsaggābhāvaṃ dīpento
atk-s0304a0:119_3: honti hete sāriputtātiādimāha. Imasmiṃ kira ṭhāne therassa kulesu asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo
atk-s0304a0:121_0: 88-89. Pañcame tañceti taṃ cakkhuñceva rūpañca. Nandisamudayā dukkhasamudayoti taṇhāya
atk-s0304a0:121_1: samodhānena pañcakkhandhadukkhassa samodhānaṃ hoti. Iti chasu dvāresu “nandisamudayā
atk-s0304a0:121_2: dukkhasamudayo”ti iminā dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0304a0:121_3: Dutiyanaye nirodho maggoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0304a0:121_4: Iminā tvaṃ puṇṇāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Evaṃ tāva vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ arahatte
atk-s0304a0:121_5: pakkhipitvā idāni puṇṇattheraṃ sattasu ṭhānesu sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ iminā tvantiādimāha.
atk-s0304a0:122_0: Caṇḍāti duṭṭhā kibbisā. Pharusāti kakkhaḷā akkosissantīti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosissanti.
atk-s0304a0:122_1: Paribhāsissantīti “kiṃ samaṇo nāma tvaṃ, idañcidañca te karissāmā”ti tajjessanti.
atk-s0304a0:122_2: Evametthāti evaṃ mayhaṃ ettha bhavissati. Daṇḍenāti catuhatthadaṇḍena vā khadiradaṇḍena
atk-s0304a0:122_3: vā ghaṭikamuggarena vā. Satthenāti ekatodhārādinā satthena. Satthahārakaṃ pariyesantīti
atk-s0304a0:122_4: jīvitahārakasatthaṃ pariyesanti. Idaṃ thero tatiyapārājikavatthusmiṃ asubhakathaṃ
atk-s0304a0:122_5: sutvā attabhāvena jigucchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satthahārakapariyesanaṃ sandhāyāha. Damūpasamenāti
atk-s0304a0:125_0: Ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto. “Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti
atk-s0304a0:125_1: ettha paññā damoti vuttā. “Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:125_2: damoti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte khanti damoti veditabbo. Upasamoti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:126: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇoti ko panesa puṇṇo, kasmā ca panettha gantukāmo ahosīti? Sunāparantavāsiko eva esa, sāvatthiyaṃ pana asappāyavihāraṃ sallakkhetvā tattha gantukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0304a0:127_0: Tatrāyaṃ anuppubbikathā – sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijagāme ete dve bhātaro.
atk-s0304a0:127_1: Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati, kadāci
atk-s0304a0:127_2: kaniṭṭho. Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā, jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni
atk-s0304a0:127_3: gahetvā, janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā, jetavanassa nātidūre
atk-s0304a0:127_4: sakaṭasatthaṃ nivesetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0304a0:128_0: Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suddhuttarāsaṅgā
atk-s0304a0:128_1: gandhapupphādihatthā yena buddho, yena dhammo, yena saṅgho, tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā
atk-s0304a0:128_2: hutvā, dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti. So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchantī”ti
atk-s0304a0:128_3: ekaṃ manussaṃ pucchi. Kiṃ tvaṃ, ayyo, na jānāsi? Loke buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni
atk-s0304a0:128_4: nāma uppannāni, icceso mahājano satthu santikaṃ dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti. Tassa
atk-s0304a0:128_5: “buddho”ti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. So attano
atk-s0304a0:128_6: parijanaparivuto tāya parisāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā, satthu madhurassarena dhammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:128_7: desentassa parisapariyante ṭhito, dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi. Atha
atk-s0304a0:128_8: tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā,
atk-s0304a0:128_9: svātanāya nimantetvā, dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā, āsanāni paññāpetvā, buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0304a0:128_10: saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, bhuttapātarāso uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
atk-s0304a0:128_11: pakkosāpetvā, “ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjitaṃ, ettakaṃ dhanaṃ na vissajjita”nti sabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:128_12: ācikkhitvā, “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyātetvā, satthu
atk-s0304a0:129_0: Athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti. Tato cintesi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:129_1: janapado mayhaṃ asappāyo, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaraṭṭhameva
atk-s0304a0:129_2: gaccheyya”nti. Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā, sāyanhe paṭisallānā vuṭṭhahitvā,
atk-s0304a0:129_3: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā, satta sīhanāde naditvā, pakkāmi.
atk-s0304a0:129_4: Tena vuttaṃ, “atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo…pe… viharatī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:130_0: Kattha panāyaṃ vihāsīti? Catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi. Sunāparantaraṭṭhaṃ tāva pavisitvā
atk-s0304a0:130_1: ca abbuhatthapabbataṃ nāma patvā vāṇijagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā
atk-s0304a0:130_2: sañjānitvā bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante, aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā tattheva vasāpesi.
atk-s0304a0:131_0: Tato samuddagirivihāraṃ nāma agamāsi. Tattha ayakantapāsāṇehi paricchinditvā katacaṅkamo
atk-s0304a0:131_1: atthi, koci taṃ caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakantapāsāṇesu
atk-s0304a0:131_2: paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Thero “kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontānaṃ phāsuvihāro hotū”ti
atk-s0304a0:132_0: Tato mātulagiriṃ nāma agamāsi. Tatthapi sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno rattiñca divā ca saddo
atk-s0304a0:132_1: ekābaddhova ahosi. Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ na phāsuka”nti tato makulakārāmavihāraṃ nāma
atk-s0304a0:132_2: gato. So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro naccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo.
atk-s0304a0:132_3: Thero “imaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsuka”nti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīni kāretvā
atk-s0304a0:132_4: vassaṃ upagacchi. Evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi.
atk-s0304a0:133_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijasatāni “parasamuddaṃ gacchāmā”ti nāvāya
atk-s0304a0:133_1: bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā, therassa
atk-s0304a0:133_2: santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā, vanditvā, “bhante, samuddo nāma asaddheyyo anekantarāyo,
atk-s0304a0:133_3: amhe āvajjeyyāthā”ti vatvā nāvaṃ āruhi. Nāvā uttamajavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:133_4: pāpuṇi. Manussā “pātarāsaṃ karissāmā”ti dīpake uttiṇṇā. Tasmiṃ pana dīpake aññaṃ
atk-s0304a0:134_0: Atheko vāsiyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “bho, mayaṃ lābhatthāya
atk-s0304a0:134_1: parasamuddaṃ gacchāma, ito ca uttari lābho nāma natthi, caturaṅgulamattā ghaṭikā
atk-s0304a0:134_2: satasahassaṃ agghati. Hāretabbayuttakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ hāretvā candanassa pūressāmā”ti te
atk-s0304a0:134_3: tathā kariṃsu. Candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā, “imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:134_4: nāsitaṃ ghātessāma ne”ti cintetvā – “idheva ghātitesu sabbaṃ ekakuṇapaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0304a0:134_5: samuddamajjhe nesaṃ nāvaṃ osīdessāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha muhuttaṃ
atk-s0304a0:134_6: gatakāleyeva uppātikaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:134_7: Bhītā manussā attano attano devatānaṃ namassanti. Therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko
atk-s0304a0:134_8: “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:135_0: Theropi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjetvā, tesaṃ byasanuppattiṃ ñatvā, vehāsaṃ uppatitvā,
atk-s0304a0:135_1: abhimukho aṭṭhāsi. Amanussā theraṃ disvāva “ayyo puṇṇatthero etī”ti apakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0304a0:135_2: uppātikaṃ sannisīdi. Thero “mā bhāyathā”ti te assāsetvā “kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0304a0:135_3: Bhante, amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmāti. Thero nāvaṅgaṇe akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:135_4: gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā,
atk-s0304a0:135_5: “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatāpi attano pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:135_6: tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa
atk-s0304a0:135_7: ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā, “ayaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāso”ti āhaṃsu. Thero mayhaṃ visuṃ
atk-s0304a0:135_8: koṭṭhāsakiccaṃ natthi. Satthā pana tumhehi diṭṭhapubboti. Na diṭṭhapubbo, bhanteti.
atk-s0304a0:135_9: Tena hi iminā satthu maṇḍalamāḷaṃ karotha. Evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti. Te sādhu,
atk-s0304a0:135_10: bhanteti. Tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsehi maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:136_0: Satthāpi kira taṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi. Ārakkhamanussā rattiṃ
atk-s0304a0:136_1: obhāsaṃ disvā, “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃ kariṃsu. Upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca
atk-s0304a0:136_2: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca senāsanāni niṭṭhāpetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā, “kataṃ, bhante,
atk-s0304a0:136_3: amhehi attano kiccaṃ, satthāraṃ pakkosathā”ti therassa ārocesuṃ. Thero sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0304a0:136_4: iddhiyā sāvatthiṃ gantvā, “bhante, vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā, tesaṃ anukampaṃ
atk-s0304a0:136_5: karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ yāci. Bhagavā adhivāsesi. Thero sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.
atk-s0304a0:137_0: Bhagavāpi ānandattheraṃ āmantesi, “ānanda, sve sunāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya carissāma,
atk-s0304a0:137_1: tvaṃ ekūnapañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ dehī”ti. Thero “sādhu, bhante”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0304a0:137_2: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “ākāsacārī bhikkhū salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha. Taṃdivasaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero
atk-s0304a0:137_3: paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahesi. Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti gāmamajjhe
atk-s0304a0:137_4: maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā, gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0304a0:137_5: pavisitvā, phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā, nisīdi. Sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:137_6: ahosi. So “kiṃ ida”nti āvajjetvā satthu sunāparantagamanaṃ disvā, vissakammaṃ āmantesi,
atk-s0304a0:137_7: “tāta, ajja bhagavā tiṃsamattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍacāraṃ gamissati. Pañca kūṭāgārasatāni
atk-s0304a0:137_8: māpetvā jetavanadvārakoṭṭhakamatthake gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapehī”ti. So tathā akāsi.
atk-s0304a0:137_9: Bhagavato kūṭāgāraṃ catumukhaṃ ahosi, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ dvimukhāni, sesāni ekamukhāni,
atk-s0304a0:137_10: satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitakūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0304a0:137_11: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāragatāni ahesuṃ. Ekaṃ tucchaṃ
atk-s0304a0:137_12: kūṭāgāraṃ ahosi, pañcapi kūṭāgārasatāni ākāse uppattiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:138_0: Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho
atk-s0304a0:138_1: nāma micchādiṭṭhikatāpaso mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0304a0:138_2: hutvā vasati, abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattaphalassa upanissayo
atk-s0304a0:138_3: jalati. Taṃ disvā “dhammamassa kathessāmī”ti gantvā dhammaṃ desesi. Tāpaso desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0304a0:138_4: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Maggenevassa abhiññā āgatā. So ehibhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo
atk-s0304a0:139_0: Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā, kūṭāgārāni
atk-s0304a0:139_1: adissamānakāni katvā, vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi. Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:139_2: datvā satthāraṃ makulakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu. Satthā maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pāvisi. Mahājano yāva
atk-s0304a0:139_3: satthā bhattadarathaṃ paṭippassambheti, tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya
atk-s0304a0:139_4: bahuṃ gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammassavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi. Satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:139_5: desesi. Mahājanassa bandhanamokkho jāto, mahantaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0304a0:140_0: Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthāya sattāhaṃ tattheva vasi, aruṇaṃ pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva
atk-s0304a0:140_1: uṭṭhapesi. Sattāhampi dhammadesanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0304a0:140_2: ahosi. Tattha sattāhaṃ vasitvā, vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā, “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti
atk-s0304a0:140_3: puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi, tassā tīraṃ agamāsi. Nammadā
atk-s0304a0:140_4: nāgarājā satthu paccuggamanaṃ katvā, nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:140_5: akāsi. Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami. So “mayhaṃ, bhante, paricaritabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:140_6: dethā”ti yāci. Bhagavā nammadānadītīre padacetiyaṃ dassesi. Taṃ vīcīsu āgatāsu pidhīyati,
atk-s0304a0:140_7: gatāsu vivarīyati. Mahāsakkārapattaṃ ahosi. Satthā tato nikkhamitvā saccabandhapabbataṃ
atk-s0304a0:140_8: gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha – “tayā mahājano apāyamagge otārito. Tvaṃ idheva vasitvā,
atk-s0304a0:140_9: etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā, nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī”ti. Sopi paricaritabbaṃ yāci.
atk-s0304a0:140_10: Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0304a0:140_11: Tato jetavanameva gato. Etamatthaṃ sandhāya teneva antaravassenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:141_0: Parinibbāyīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Mahājano therassa satta divasāni
atk-s0304a0:141_1: sarīrapūjaṃ katvā, bahūni gandhakaṭṭhāni samodhānetvā, sarīraṃ jhāpetvā dhātuyo ādāya
atk-s0304a0:141_2: cetiyaṃ akāsi. Sambahulā bhikkhūti therassa āḷāhanaṭṭhāne ṭhitabhikkhū. Sesaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0304a0:143_0: 90-91. Sattame ejāti taṇhā. Sā hi calanaṭṭhena ejāti vuccati. Sāva ābādhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:143_1: rogo, anto dussanaṭṭhena gaṇḍo, nikantanaṭṭhena sallaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā ejā rogo ceva
atk-s0304a0:143_2: gaṇḍo ca sallañca, tasmā. Cakkhuṃ na maññeyyātiādi vuttanayameva, idhāpi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0304a0:145_0: 92-93. Navame dvayanti dve dve koṭṭhāse. Dasame itthetaṃ dvayanti evametaṃ dvayaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:145_1: Calañceva byathañcāti attano sabhāvena asaṇṭhahanato calati ceva byathati ca. Yopi
atk-s0304a0:145_2: hetu yopi paccayoti cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthārammaṇaṃ hetu ceva paccayo ca. Kuto niccaṃ
atk-s0304a0:145_3: bhavissatīti kena kāraṇena niccaṃ bhavissati. Yathā pana dāsassa dāsiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0304a0:145_4: jāto putto parova dāso hoti, evaṃ aniccameva hotīti attho. Saṅgatīti sahagati. Sannipātoti
atk-s0304a0:145_5: ekato sannipatanaṃ. Samavāyoti ekato samāgamo. Ayaṃ vuccati cakkhusamphassoti iminā
atk-s0304a0:145_6: saṅgatisannipātasamavāyasaṅkhātena paccayena uppannattā paccayanāmeneva saṅgati sannipāto
atk-s0304a0:146_0: Sopi hetūti phassassa vatthu ārammaṇaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhāti ayaṃ hetu. Phuṭṭhoti
atk-s0304a0:146_1: upayogatthe paccattaṃ, phassena phuṭṭhameva gocaraṃ vedanā vedeti, cetanā ceteti,
atk-s0304a0:146_2: saññā sañjānātīti attho. Phuṭṭhoti vā phassasamaṅgīpuggalo, phassena phuṭṭhārammaṇameva
atk-s0304a0:146_3: vedanādīhi vedeti ceteti sañjānātītipi vuttaṃ hoti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte samatiṃsakkhandhā
atk-s0304a0:146_4: kathitā honti. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvāre tāva vatthu ceva ārammaṇañca rūpakkhandho, phuṭṭho
atk-s0304a0:146_5: vedetīti vedanākkhandho, cetetīti saṅkhārakkhandho, sañjānātīti saññākkhandho, vijānātīti
atk-s0304a0:146_6: viññāṇakkhandhoti. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Manodvārepi hi vatthurūpaṃ ekantato
atk-s0304a0:146_7: rūpakkhandho, rūpe pana ārammaṇe sati ārammaṇampi rūpakkhandhoti cha pañcakātiṃsa
atk-s0304a0:146_8: honti. Saṅkhepena panete chasupi dvāresu pañceva khandhāti sapaccaye pañcakkhandhe
atk-s0304a0:146_9: aniccāti vitthāretvā vuccamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena idaṃ suttaṃ desitanti.
atk-s0304a0:150_0: 94. Saḷavaggassa paṭhame adantāti adamitā. Aguttāti agopitā. Arakkhitāti na rakkhitā.
atk-s0304a0:150_1: Asaṃvutāti apihitā. Dukkhādhivāhā hontīti nerayikādibhedaṃ adhikadukkhaṃ āvahanakā
atk-s0304a0:150_2: honti. Sukhādhivāhā hontīti jhānamaggaphalapabhedaṃ adhikasukhaṃ āvahanakā honti.
atk-s0304a0:151_0: Saḷevāti cha eva. Asaṃvuto yattha dukkhaṃ nigacchatīti yesu āyatanesu saṃvaravirahito
atk-s0304a0:151_1: dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tesañca ye saṃvaraṇaṃ avedisunti ye tesaṃ āyatanānaṃ saṃvaraṃ vindiṃsu
atk-s0304a0:152_0: Asāditañca sādunti assādavantañca madhurañca. Phassadvayaṃ sukhadukkhe upekkheti
atk-s0304a0:152_1: sukhaphassañca dukkhaphassañcāti idaṃ phassadvayaṃ upekkhe, upekkhāmevettha uppādeyyāti
atk-s0304a0:152_2: attho. Phassadvayaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ upekkhoti vā pāṭho, phassahetukaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ upekkho,
atk-s0304a0:152_3: sukhe anurodhaṃ dukkhe ca virodhaṃ anuppādento upekkhako bhaveyyātipi attho. Anānuruddho
atk-s0304a0:152_4: aviruddho kenacīti kenaci saddhiṃ neva anuruddho na viruddho bhaveyya.
atk-s0304a0:153_0: Papañcasaññāti kilesasaññāya papañcasaññā nāma hutvā. Itarītarā narāti lāmakasattā
atk-s0304a0:153_1: papañcayantā upayantīti papañcayamānā vaṭṭaṃ upagacchanti. Saññinoti sasaññā sattā.
atk-s0304a0:153_2: Manomayaṃ gehasitañca sabbanti sabbameva pañcakāmaguṇagehanissitaṃ manomayaṃ vitakkaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:153_3: Panujjāti panuditvā nīharitvā. Nekkhammasitaṃ irīyatīti dabbajātiko bhikkhu nekkhammasitaṃ iriyena irīyati.
atk-s0304a0:154_0: Chassu yadā subhāvitoti chasu ārammaṇesu yadā suṭṭhu bhāvito. Phuṭṭhassa cittaṃ na
atk-s0304a0:154_1: vikampate kvacīti sukhaphassena vā dukkhaphassena vā phuṭṭhassa kismiñci cittaṃ na
atk-s0304a0:154_2: kampati na vedhati. Bhavattha jātimaraṇassa pāragāti jātimaraṇānaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamakā hotha.
atk-s0304a0:156_0: 95. Dutiye mālukyaputtoti mālukyabrāhmaṇiyā putto. Etthāti etasmiṃ tava ovādāyācane.
atk-s0304a0:156_1: Iminā theraṃ apasādetipi ussādetipi. Kathaṃ? Ayaṃ kira daharakāle rūpādīsu pamajjitvā
atk-s0304a0:156_2: pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṃ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. Atha bhagavā “ettha
atk-s0304a0:156_3: dahare kiṃ vakkhāma? Mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle pamajjitvā mahallakakāle
atk-s0304a0:156_4: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyāthā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ apasādeti nāma.
atk-s0304a0:157_0: Yasmā pana thero mahallakakālepi araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo, tasmā
atk-s0304a0:157_1: bhagavā “ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma? Ayaṃ amhākaṃ mālukyaputto mahallakakālepi araññaṃ
atk-s0304a0:157_2: pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kattukāmo kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tumhe nāma taruṇakālepi vīriyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:157_3: na karothā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ ussādeti nāma.
atk-s0304a0:158_0: Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma. Kiñcāpāhanti kiñcāpi “ahaṃ mahallako”ti ñātaṃ. Yadi ahaṃ
atk-s0304a0:158_1: mahallako, mahallako samānopi sakkhissāmi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, desetu me, bhante,
atk-s0304a0:158_2: bhagavāti adhippāyena mahallakabhāvaṃ anuggaṇhanto ovādañca pasaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0304a0:159_0: Adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbāti imasmiṃ attabhāve adiṭṭhā atītepi adiṭṭhapubbā. Na ca passasīti
atk-s0304a0:159_1: etarahipi na passasi. Na ca te hoti passeyyanti evaṃ samannāhāropi te yattha natthi,
atk-s0304a0:159_2: api nu te tattha chandādayo uppajjeyyunti pucchati.
atk-s0304a0:160_0: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0304a0:160_1: Cakkhuviññāṇañhi rūpe rūpamattameva passati, na niccādisabhāvaṃ, iti sesaviññāṇehipi
atk-s0304a0:160_2: me ettha diṭṭhamattameva cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. Atha vā diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:160_3: rūpe rūpavijānananti attho. Mattāti pamāṇaṃ, diṭṭhaṃ mattā assāti diṭṭhamattaṃ, cittaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:160_4: cakkhuviññāṇamattameva me cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā āpāthagatarūpe
atk-s0304a0:160_5: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati na dussati na muyhati, evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva
atk-s0304a0:160_6: javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇapamāṇeneva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmīti. Atha vā diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:160_7: nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭharūpaṃ, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tattheva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0304a0:160_8: cittattayaṃ. Yathā taṃ na rajjati, na dussati, na muyhati, evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva
atk-s0304a0:160_9: sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ uppādessāmi, nāhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjanādivasena
atk-s0304a0:160_10: uppajjituṃ dassāmīti ayamettha attho. Eseva nayo sutamutesu.
atk-s0304a0:161_0: Viññāte viññātamattanti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:161_1: tasmiṃ viññāte viññātamattanti āvajjanapamāṇaṃ. Yathā āvajjanena na rajjati na dussati
atk-s0304a0:161_2: na muyhati, evaṃ rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanapamāṇeneva cittaṃ ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0304a0:162_0: Yatoti yadā. Tatoti tadā. Na tenāti tena rāgena vā ratto, dosena vā duṭṭho, mohena
atk-s0304a0:162_1: vā mūḷho na bhavissati. Tato tvaṃ mālukyaputta na tatthāti yadā tvaṃ tena rāgena
atk-s0304a0:162_2: vā dosamohehi vā ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na bhavissasi, tadā tvaṃ na tattha tasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:162_3: diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā paṭibaddho allīno patiṭṭhito nāma bhavissasi. Nevidhātiādi vuttatthameva.
atk-s0304a0:163_0: Sati muṭṭhāti sati naṭṭhā. Tañca ajjhosāti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gilitvā. Abhijjhā ca vihesā
atk-s0304a0:163_1: cāti abhijjhāya ca vihiṃsāya ca. Atha vā “tassa vaḍḍhantī”ti padenāpi saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:163_2: abhijjhā ca vihesā cāti imepi dve dhammā tassa vaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0304a0:164_0: Cittamassūpahaññatīti abhijjhāvihesāhi assa cittaṃ upahaññati. Ācinatoti ācinantassa.
atk-s0304a0:164_1: Ārā nibbāna vuccatīti evarūpassa puggalassa nibbānaṃ nāma dūre pavuccati. Ghatvāti
atk-s0304a0:164_2: ghāyitvā. Bhotvāti bhutvā sāyitvā lehitvā. Phussāti phusitvā. Paṭissatoti paṭissatisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0304a0:164_3: satiyā yutto. Sevato cāpi vedananti catumaggasampayuttaṃ nibbattitalokuttaravedanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:164_4: sevantassa. Khīyatīti khayaṃ gacchati. Kiṃ taṃ? Dukkhampi kilesajātampi. Aññataroti
atk-s0304a0:164_5: asītiyā mahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro eko. Iti imasmiṃ sutte gāthāhipi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:166_0: 96. Tatiye parihānadhammanti parihānasabhāvaṃ. Abhibhāyatanānīti abhibhavitāni āyatanāni.
atk-s0304a0:166_1: Sarasaṅkappāti ettha sarantīti sarā, dhāvantīti attho. Sarā ca te saṅkappā ca sarasaṅkappā.
atk-s0304a0:166_2: Saṃyojaniyāti bandhaniyā bandhanassa paccayabhūtā. Tañce bhikkhūti taṃ evaṃ uppannaṃ
atk-s0304a0:166_3: kilesajātaṃ, taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ. Adhivāsetīti citte āropetvā vāseti. Nappajahatīti
atk-s0304a0:166_4: chandarāgappahānena na pajahati. Evaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. Abhibhāyatanañhetaṃ
atk-s0304a0:166_5: vuttaṃ bhagavatāti etaṃ buddhena bhagavatā abhibhavitaṃ āyatananti kathitaṃ. Idha
atk-s0304a0:166_6: dhammaṃ pucchitvā vibhajantena puggalena dhammo dassito.
atk-s0304a0:168_0: 97. Catutthe asaṃvutassāti apihitassa na pidahitvā sañchāditvā ṭhapitassa. Byāsiñcatīti
atk-s0304a0:168_1: viāsiñcati, kilesatintaṃ hutvā vattati. Pāmojjanti dubbalapīti. Pītīti balavapīti.
atk-s0304a0:168_2: Passaddhīti darathapassaddhi. Dhammā na pātubhavantīti samathavipassanādhammā na
atk-s0304a0:168_3: uppajjanti. Imasmiṃ sutte puggalaṃ pucchitvā vibhajantena dhammena puggalo dassito.
atk-s0304a0:170_0: 98. Pañcame kathañca, bhikkhave, asaṃvaroti idaṃ maggakusalassa vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:170_1: gaṇheyyāsīti paṭhamaṃ pahātabbamaggakkhānaṃ viya uddesakkamena avatvā desanākusalatāya
atk-s0304a0:170_2: paṭhamaṃ pahātabbadhammakkhānavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Idha dhammaṃ pucchitvā dhammova vibhatto.
atk-s0304a0:172: 99. Chaṭṭhe samādhinti cittekaggataṃ. Idañhi suttaṃ cittekaggatāya parihāyamāne disvā, “imesaṃ cittekaggataṃ labhantānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:174: 100. Sattame paṭisallānanti kāyavivekaṃ. Idañhi suttaṃ kāyavivekena parihāyamāne disvā, “imesaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhantānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:176_0: 101-102. Aṭṭhamaṃ upamāya parivāretvā kathite bujjhanakānaṃ, navamaṃ suddhikavaseneva
atk-s0304a0:176_1: bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Attho pana ubhayatthāpi khandhiyavagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0304a0:178_0: 103. Dasame udako sudanti ettha sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Udakoti tassa nāmaṃ. Idaṃ jātu
atk-s0304a0:178_1: vedagūti ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ. Atha vā idaṃ mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0304a0:178_2: Jātu vedagūti ahaṃ ekaṃseneva vedagū, vedasaṅkhātena ñāṇena neyyesu gato, vedaṃ vā
atk-s0304a0:178_3: gato adhigato, paṇḍitohamasmīti attho. Sabbajīti ekaṃsena sabbavaṭṭaṃ jinitvā abhibhavitvā
atk-s0304a0:178_4: ṭhitosmīti vadati. Apalikhataṃ gaṇḍamūlanti apalikhataṃ dukkhamūlaṃ. Palikhaṇinti
atk-s0304a0:179_0: Mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena
atk-s0304a0:179_1: sambhūtassa. Odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa.
atk-s0304a0:179_4: khuddakasambāhanena parimaddanadhammo, daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena
atk-s0304a0:179_5: dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0304a0:179_6: parimaddanadhammo, evaṃ pariharitopi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati
atk-s0304a0:180_1: parihāni. Purimehi vā tīhi samudayo, pacchimehi atthaṅgamoti. Evaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa
atk-s0304a0:185_0: 104. Yogakkhemivaggassa paṭhame yogakkhemipariyāyanti catūhi yogehi khemino kāraṇabhūtaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:185_1: Dhammapariyāyanti dhammakāraṇaṃ. Akkhāsi yoganti yuttiṃ kathesi. Tasmāti kasmā? Kiṃ
atk-s0304a0:185_2: akkhātattā, udāhu pahīnattāti? Pahīnattā. Na hi akkhānena yogakkhemi nāma hoti.
atk-s0304a0:187_0: 105-113. Dutiye vedanāsukhadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ pana vipākasukhadukkhaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0304a0:187_1: Tatiye dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa. Catutthe lokassāti saṅkhāralokassa. Pañcamādīsu
atk-s0304a0:187_2: yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ khandhiyavagge vuttanayameva.
atk-s0304a0:191_0: 114-115. Lokakāmaguṇavaggassa paṭhame āvāsagatoti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Mārassa vasaṃ
atk-s0304a0:191_1: gatoti tividhassāpi mārassa vasaṃ gato. Paṭimukka’ssa mārapāsoti assa gīvāya mārapāso
atk-s0304a0:193_0: 116. Tatiye lokassāti cakkavāḷalokassa. Lokassa antanti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ. Vihāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:193_1: pāvisīti “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe ime bhikkhū, imaṃ uddesaṃ ānandaṃ pucchissanti, so
atk-s0304a0:193_2: ca tesaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditvā kathessati. Tato naṃ thomessāmi, mama
atk-s0304a0:193_3: thomanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū ānandaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ, vacanañcassa sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:193_4: maññissanti, taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti cintetvā saṃkhittena
atk-s0304a0:193_5: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvāva nisinnāsane antarahito gandhakuṭiyaṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0304a0:194_0: Satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇitoti satthārā ca pasattho. Viññūnanti idampi karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:194_1: paṇḍitehi sabrahmacārīhi ca sambhāvitoti attho. Pahotīti sakkoti. Atikkammeva mūlaṃ
atk-s0304a0:194_2: atikkammeva khandhanti sāro nāma mūle vā khandhe vā bhaveyya, tampi atikkamitvāti
atk-s0304a0:194_3: attho. Evaṃsampadamidanti evaṃsampattikaṃ, īdisanti attho. Atisitvāti atikkamitvā.
atk-s0304a0:194_4: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbameva jānāti. Passaṃ passatīti passitabbameva passati. Yathā
atk-s0304a0:194_5: vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi na passati, na evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:194_6: bhagavā. Bhagavā pana jānanto jānāti, passanto passatiyeva. Svāyaṃ dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:194_8: vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūto.
atk-s0304a0:194_9: Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto. Evametesu padesu attho veditabbo. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:194_10: dhammassa vattanato vattā. Pavattanato pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvā nīharitvā dassanasamatthatāya
atk-s0304a0:194_11: atthassa ninnetā. Amatādhigamāya paṭipattiṃ desetīti amatassa dātā.
atk-s0304a0:195_0: Agaruṃ karitvāti punappunaṃ yācāpentopi hi garuṃ karoti nāma. Attano sekkhapaṭisambhidāñāṇe
atk-s0304a0:195_1: ṭhatvā sinerupādato vālikaṃ uddharamāno viya dubbiññeyyaṃ katvā kathentopi garuṃ
atk-s0304a0:195_2: karotiyeva nāma. Evaṃ akatvā amhe punappunaṃ ayācāpetvā suviññeyyampi no katvā kathehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:196_0: Yaṃ kho voti yaṃ kho tumhākaṃ. Cakkhunā kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī hoti lokamānīti
atk-s0304a0:196_1: cakkhuñhi loke appahīnadiṭṭhi puthujjano sattalokavasena lokoti sañjānāti ceva maññati
atk-s0304a0:196_2: ca, tathā cakkavāḷalokavasena. Na hi aññatra cakkhādīhi dvādasāyatanehi tassa sā
atk-s0304a0:196_3: saññā vā māno vā uppajjati. Tena vuttaṃ, “cakkhunā kho, āvuso, lokasmiṃ lokasaññī
atk-s0304a0:196_4: hoti lokamānī”ti. Imassa ca lokassa gamanena anto nāma ñātuṃ vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pattuṃ
atk-s0304a0:196_5: vā na sakkā. Lujjanaṭṭhena pana tasseva cakkhādibhedassa lokassa nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0304a0:196_6: antaṃ appatvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyā nāma natthīti veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:197_0: Evaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni “sāvakena pañho kathitoti mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha, ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:197_1: bhagavā sabbaññutaññāṇatulaṃ gahetvā nisinno. Icchamānā tameva upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkhā
atk-s0304a0:198_0: Imehi ākārehīti imehi kāraṇehi cakkavāḷalokassa antābhāvakāraṇehi ceva saṅkhāralokassa
atk-s0304a0:198_1: antāpattikāraṇehi ca. Imehi padehīti imehi akkharasampiṇḍanehi. Byañjanehīti pāṭiyekkaakkharehi.
atk-s0304a0:199_0: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito dhātukusalo āyatanakusalo
atk-s0304a0:199_1: paccayākārakusalo kāraṇākāraṇakusaloti. Mahāpaññoti mahante atthe mahante dhamme
atk-s0304a0:199_2: mahantā niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni paṭiggaṇhanasamatthatāya mahāpaññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0304a0:199_3: Yathā taṃ ānandenāti yathā ānandena byākataṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā ānandena
atk-s0304a0:199_4: taṃ byākataṃ, ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyyanti attho.
atk-s0304a0:201_0: 117. Catutthe ye meti ye mama. Cetaso samphuṭṭhapubbāti cittena anubhūtapubbā. Tatra
atk-s0304a0:201_1: me cittaṃ bahulaṃ gacchamānaṃ gaccheyyāti tesu pāsādattayatividhanāṭakādibhedasampattivasena
atk-s0304a0:201_2: anubhūtapubbesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu bahūsu vāresu uppajjamānaṃ uppajjeyyāti dīpeti.
atk-s0304a0:201_3: Paccuppannesu vāti idha padhānacariyakāle chabbassāni supupphitavanasaṇḍajātānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:201_4: dijagaṇādīnaṃ vasena diṭṭhasutādibhedaṃ manoramārammaṇaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ katvā dassento
atk-s0304a0:201_5: “evarūpesu paccuppannesu vā bahulaṃ uppajjeyyā”ti dasseti. Appaṃ vā anāgatesūti anāgate
atk-s0304a0:201_6: “metteyyo nāma buddho bhavissati, saṅkho nāma rājā, ketumatī nāma rājadhānī”tiādivasena
atk-s0304a0:201_7: parittakameva anāgatesu kāmaguṇesu uppajjeyyāti dasseti. Tatra me attarūpenāti tatra
atk-s0304a0:201_8: mayā attano hitakāmajātikena. Appamādoti sātaccakiriyā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa
atk-s0304a0:201_9: avossaggo. Satīti ārammaṇapariggahitasati. Ārakkhoti ayaṃ appamādo ca sati ca cetaso
atk-s0304a0:201_10: ārakkho karaṇīyo, evaṃ me ahosīti dasseti, ārakkhatthāya ime dve dhammā kātabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:202_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, se āyatane veditabbeti yasmā cetaso ārakkhatthāya appamādo
atk-s0304a0:202_1: ca sati ca kātabbā, yasmā tasmiṃ āyatane vidite appamādena vā satiyā vā kātabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:202_2: natthi, tasmā se āyatane veditabbe, taṃ kāraṇaṃ jānitabbanti attho. Saḷāyatananirodhanti
atk-s0304a0:202_3: saḷāyatananirodho vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti attho. Nibbānasmiñhi
atk-s0304a0:202_4: cakkhuādīni ceva nirujjhanti rūpasaññādayo ca nirujjhantīti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0304a0:204_0: 118-119. Pañcame diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Parinibbāyantīti kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0304a0:204_1: parinibbāyanti. Tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hotīti taṇhānissitaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ hoti. Tadupādānanti
atk-s0304a0:204_2: taṃgahaṇaṃ, taṇhāgahaṇena sahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ hotīti attho. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:206: 120. Sattame santānessatīti ghaṭessati, yogavicchedamassa pāpuṇituṃ na dassati.
atk-s0304a0:208: 121. Aṭṭhame vimuttiparipācaniyāti vimuttiṃ paripācentīti vimuttiparipācaniyā. Dhammāti pannarasa dhammā, te saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0304a0:209_0: “Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye
atk-s0304a0:209_1: suttante paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati. Kusīte puggale
atk-s0304a0:209_2: parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato,
atk-s0304a0:209_3: imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati. Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī
atk-s0304a0:209_4: puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi
atk-s0304a0:209_5: satindriyaṃ visujjhati. Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato
atk-s0304a0:209_6: bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:209_7: visujjhati. Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato,
atk-s0304a0:209_8: gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato, imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati. Iti
atk-s0304a0:209_9: ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pañca
atk-s0304a0:209_10: suttante paccavekkhato, imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:210_0: Aparepi pannarasa dhammā vimuttiparipācaniyā – saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni, aniccasaññā,
atk-s0304a0:210_1: anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññāti imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā
atk-s0304a0:210_2: saññā, meghiyattherassa kathitā kalyāṇamittatādayo pañca dhammāti. Kāya pana velāya
atk-s0304a0:211_0: Anekāni devatāsahassānīti āyasmatā rāhulena padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle pālitanāgarājakāle
atk-s0304a0:211_1: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentena saddhiṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapitadevatāsu pana kāci bhūmaṭṭhakā
atk-s0304a0:211_2: devatā, kāci antalikkhaṭṭhakā, kāci cātumahārājikā, kāci devaloke, kāci brahmaloke
atk-s0304a0:211_3: nibbattā. Imasmiṃ pana divase sabbāpi tā ekaṭṭhāne andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā,
atk-s0304a0:211_4: tā sandhāyāha – “anekāni devatāsahassānī”ti. Dhammacakkhunti imasmiṃ sutte cattāro
atk-s0304a0:211_5: ca maggā cattāri ca phalāni dhammacakkhunti veditabbāni. Tattha hi kāci devatā sotāpannā
atk-s0304a0:211_6: ahesuṃ, kāci sakadāgāmī, anāgāmī, khīṇāsavā. Tāsañca pana devatānaṃ ettakāti gaṇanavasena
atk-s0304a0:213: 122-123. Navamadasamāni iṭṭhārammaṇavasena kathiyamāne bujjhanakānaṃ vasena vuttānīti.
atk-s0304a0:217_0: 124-126. Gahapativaggassa paṭhame uggoti paṇītadāyakānaṃ aggauggo, so bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:217_1: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ paṇītadāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ uggo gahapatī”ti evaṃ etadagge
atk-s0304a0:217_2: ṭhapito. Sesametesu ceva dvīsu, tatiye ca vuttatthameva.
atk-s0304a0:219_0: 127-128. Catutthe piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo. So kira parijiṇṇabhogo
atk-s0304a0:219_1: brāhmaṇo ahosi. Atha bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā
atk-s0304a0:219_2: pabbajito. So mahantaṃ kapallapattaṃ gahetvā carati, tena kapallapūraṃ yāguṃ pivati,
atk-s0304a0:219_3: kapallapūre pūve khādati, kapallapūraṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjati. Athassa mahagghasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:219_4: satthu ārocayiṃsu. Satthā tassa pattatthavikaṃ nānujāni. Heṭṭhāmañce pattaṃ nikkujjitvā
atk-s0304a0:219_5: ṭhapeti. So ṭhapentopi ghaṃsantova paṇāmetvā ṭhapeti, gaṇhantopi ghaṃsantova ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0304a0:219_6: gaṇhāti. Taṃ gacchante kāle dhaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ nāḷikodanamattameva gaṇhanakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:219_7: jātaṃ. Tato satthu ārocesuṃ, athassa satthā pattatthavikaṃ anujāni. Thero aparena
atk-s0304a0:219_8: samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Iti so piṇḍatthāya
atk-s0304a0:219_9: pabbajitattā piṇḍolo, gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā piṇḍolabhāradvājoti vuccati.
atk-s0304a0:220_0: Upasaṅkamīti uggatuggatehi mahāamaccehi parivuto upasaṅkami. Thero kira ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0304a0:220_1: sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nidāghasamaye sītaṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisīdissāmīti
atk-s0304a0:220_2: ākāsena gantvā gaṅgātīre udenassa rañño udapānaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ atthi, tattha pavisitvā
atk-s0304a0:220_3: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi sītena udakavātena bījiyamāno.
atk-s0304a0:221_0: Udenopi kho nāma rājā sattāhaṃ mahāpānaṃ pivitvā sattame divase uyyānaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:221_1: mahājanaparivāro uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe atthatāya seyyāya nipajji. Tassa
atk-s0304a0:221_2: ekā paricārikā pāde sambāhamānā nisinnā. Rājā kamena niddaṃ okkami. Tasmiṃ niddaṃ
atk-s0304a0:221_3: okkante nāṭakitthiyo “yassatthāya mayaṃ gītādīni payojeyyāma, so niddaṃ upagato,
atk-s0304a0:221_4: na ca niddākāle mahāsaddaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano attano tūriyāni ṭhapetvā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:221_5: pakkantā. Tā tattha tattha phalāphalāni khādamānā pupphāni piḷandhamānā vicarantiyo
atk-s0304a0:221_6: theraṃ disvā “mā saddaṃ karitthā”ti aññamaññaṃ nivārayamānā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Thero
atk-s0304a0:221_7: “issā pahātabbā, maccheraṃ vinodetabba”ntiādinā nayena tāsaṃ anurūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0304a0:222_0: Sāpi kho rañño pāde sambāhamānā nisinnā itthī pāde cāletvā rājānaṃ pabodhesi. So
atk-s0304a0:222_1: “kahaṃ tā gatā”ti pucchi. Kiṃ tāsaṃ tumhehi? Tā ekaṃ samaṇaṃ parivāretvā nisinnāti.
atk-s0304a0:222_2: Rājā kuddho uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyamāno uṭṭhahitvā “tambakipillikāhi
atk-s0304a0:222_3: naṃ khādāpessāmī”ti gacchanto ekasmiṃ asokarukkhe tambakipillikānaṃ puṭaṃ disvā hatthenākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0304a0:222_4: sākhaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. Kipillikapuṭo chijjitvā rañño sīse pati, sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0304a0:222_5: sālithusehi parikiṇṇaṃ viya daṇḍadīpikāhi ḍayhamānaṃ viya ca ahosi. Thero rañño paduṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:222_6: ñatvā iddhiyā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Tāpi itthiyo uṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā sarīraṃ
atk-s0304a0:222_7: puñchantiyo viya bhūmiyaṃ patitapatitā kipillikāyo gahetvā sarīre khipamānā sabbā
atk-s0304a0:222_8: mukhasattīhi vijjhiṃsu – “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, aññe rājāno pabbajite disvā vandanti, pañhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:222_9: pucchanti, ayaṃ pana rājā kipillikapuṭaṃ sīse bhinditukāmo jāto”ti.
atk-s0304a0:223_0: Rājā attano aparādhaṃ disvā uyyānapālaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “kiṃ esa pabbajito?
atk-s0304a0:223_1: Aññesupi divasesu idha āgacchatī”ti? Āma, devāti. Idha tvaṃ āgatadivase mayhaṃ āroceyyāsīti.
atk-s0304a0:223_2: Theropi katipāheneva puna āgantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi. Uyyānapālo disvā – “mahanto
atk-s0304a0:223_3: me ayaṃ paṇṇākāro”ti vegena gantvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā uṭṭhahitvā saṅkhapaṇavādisaddaṃ
atk-s0304a0:223_4: nivāretvā uggatuggatehi amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “upasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:224_0: Anikīḷitāvino kāmesūti yā kāmesu kāmakīḷā, taṃ akīḷitapubbā, aparibhuttakāmāti attho.
atk-s0304a0:224_1: Addhānañca āpādentīti paveṇiṃ paṭipādenti, dīgharattaṃ anubandhāpenti. Mātumattīsūti
atk-s0304a0:224_2: mātupamāṇāsu. Lokasmiñhi mātā bhaginī dhītāti idaṃ tividhaṃ garukārammaṇaṃ nāma,
atk-s0304a0:224_3: iti garukārammaṇe upanibandhaṃ cittaṃ vimocetuṃ na labhatīti dassento evamāha. Athassa
atk-s0304a0:224_4: tena pañhena cittaṃ anotarantaṃ disvā bhagavatā paṭikūlamanasikāravasena cittūpanibandhanatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:225_0: Abhāvitakāyāti abhāvitapañcadvārikakāyā. Tesaṃ taṃ dukkaraṃ hotīti tesaṃ taṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:225_1: bhāvetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti. Itissa imināpi cittaṃ anotarantaṃ disvā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ
atk-s0304a0:225_2: kathesi. Indriyasaṃvarasmiñhi upanibandhacittaṃ viheṭhetuṃ na labhati. Rājā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0304a0:226_0: Arakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento gīvaṃ parivattento kāyaṃ na rakkhati
atk-s0304a0:226_1: nāma, nānappakāraṃ duṭṭhullaṃ kathento vacanaṃ na rakkhati nāma, kāmavitakkādayo
atk-s0304a0:226_2: vitakkento cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma. Rakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0304a0:227_0: Ativiya maṃ tasmiṃ samaye lobhadhammā parisahantīti maṃ tasmiṃ samaye atikkamitvā
atk-s0304a0:227_1: lobho adhibhavatīti attho. Upaṭṭhitāya satiyāti kāyagatāya satiyā supaṭṭhitāya. Na
atk-s0304a0:227_2: maṃ tathā tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ samaye maṃ yathā pubbe, na tathā lobho atikkamitvā
atk-s0304a0:227_3: uppajjatīti attho. Parisahantīti padassa uppajjantītipi atthoyeva. Iti imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0304a0:227_4: tayo kāyā kathitā. Kathaṃ? “Imameva kāya”nti ettha hi karajakāyo kathito, “bhāvitakāyo”ti
atk-s0304a0:227_5: ettha pañcadvārikakāyo, “rakkhiteneva kāyenā”ti ettha copanakāyo, kāyaviññattīti
atk-s0304a0:229_0: 129. Chaṭṭhe rūpā ca manāpāti rūpā ca manāpā saṃvijjanti. Cakkhuviññāṇañcāti cakkhuviññāṇañca
atk-s0304a0:229_1: saṃvijjati. Sukhavedaniyaṃ phassanti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttaṃ upanissayavasena javanakāle
atk-s0304a0:229_2: sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ phassaṃ. Sukhā vedanāti ekaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca javanavasena
atk-s0304a0:230_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tevīsati dhātuyo kathitā. Kathaṃ? Ettha hi cakkhupasādo cakkhudhātu,
atk-s0304a0:230_1: tassa ārammaṇaṃ rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viññāṇadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā sahajātā
atk-s0304a0:230_2: tayo khandhā dhammadhātu, evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vasena vīsati. Manodvāre
atk-s0304a0:230_3: “manodhātū”ti āvajjanacittaṃ gahitaṃ, ārammaṇañceva hadayavatthu ca dhammadhātu,
atk-s0304a0:230_4: vatthunissitaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ tevīsati honti. Evaṃ tevīsatiyā dhātūnaṃ vasena
atk-s0304a0:232_0: 130-131. Sattame manāpaṃ itthetanti pajānātīti yaṃ anena manāpaṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0304a0:232_1: itthetanti evametaṃ manāpameva tanti pajānāti. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sukhavedaniyañca phassaṃ
atk-s0304a0:232_2: paṭiccāti cakkhuviññāṇañceva, yo ca upanissayakoṭiyā vā anantarakoṭiyā vā samanantarakoṭiyā
atk-s0304a0:232_3: vā sampayuttakoṭiyā vā sukhavedanāya paccayo phasso, taṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ phassañca
atk-s0304a0:232_4: paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanāti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Iti imesu dvīsu suttesu kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-s0304a0:232_5: āvajjanakiccā, manodhātuyeva vā samānā manodhātunāmena vuttāti veditabbā. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:234_0: 132. Navame makkarakateti evaṃnāmake nagare araññakuṭikāyanti araññe katāya pāṭiyekkāya
atk-s0304a0:234_1: kuṭiyaṃ, na vihārapaccantakuṭiyaṃ. Māṇavakāti yepi tattha mahallakā, te mahallakakālepi
atk-s0304a0:234_2: antevāsikatāya māṇavakātveva vuttā. Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāto sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā sāyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:234_3: “ācariyassa kaṭṭhāni āharissāmā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā vicarantā yena sā kuṭikā, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:234_4: Parito parito kuṭikāyāti tassā kuṭikāya samantato samantato. Seleyyakānīti aññamaññassa
atk-s0304a0:234_5: piṭṭhiṃ gahetvā laṅghitvā ito cito caṅkamanakīḷanāni.
atk-s0304a0:235_0: Muṇḍakātiādīsu muṇḍe muṇḍāti, samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya, ime pana hīḷentā
atk-s0304a0:235_1: “muṇḍakā samaṇakā”ti āhaṃsu. Ibbhāti gahapatikā. Kaṇhāti kaṇhā, kāḷakāti attho. Bandhupādāpaccāti
atk-s0304a0:235_2: ettha bandhūti brahmā adhippeto. Tañhi brāhmaṇā pitāmahoti voharanti. Pādānaṃ apaccā
atk-s0304a0:235_3: pādāpaccā, brahmuno piṭṭhipādato jātāti adhippāyo. Tesaṃ kira ayaṃ laddhi “brāhmaṇā
atk-s0304a0:235_4: brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā, khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato”ti.
atk-s0304a0:235_5: Bharatakānanti kuṭimbikānaṃ. Kuṭimbikā hi yasmā raṭṭhaṃ bharanti, tasmā bharatāti
atk-s0304a0:235_6: vuccanti. Ime pana paribhavaṃ katvā vadamānā “bharatakāna”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:236_1: ramaṇīye pariveṇe kaṭṭhakalāpe bandhitvā khipamānā vālikaṃ āluḷetvā, hatthena hatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:236_2: ādāya paṇṇakuṭiṃ pariyāyantā ‘ime imesaṃ bharatakānaṃ sakkatā, ime imesaṃ bharatakānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:236_3: sakkatā’ti punappunaṃ viravantā ativiya ime māṇavakā kīḷaṃ karonti, vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:236_4: atthibhāvampi na jānanti, dassessāmi nesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāva”nti cintetvā paṇṇakuṭito nikkhami.
atk-s0304a0:237_0: Sīluttamā pubbatarā ahesunti guṇavantānaṃ guṇe kathite nigguṇānaṃ guṇābhāvo pākaṭova
atk-s0304a0:237_1: bhavissatīti porāṇakabrāhmaṇānaṃ guṇe kathento evamāha. Tattha sīluttamāti sīlajeṭṭhakā.
atk-s0304a0:237_2: Sīlañhi tesaṃ uttamaṃ, na jātigottaṃ. Ye purāṇaṃ sarantīti ye porāṇakaṃ brāhmaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:237_3: saranti. Abhibhuyya kodhanti kodhaṃ abhibhavitvā tesaṃ dvārāni suguttāni surakkhitāni
atk-s0304a0:237_4: ahesuṃ. Dhamme ca jhāne ca ratāti dasavidhe kusalakammapathadhamme aṭṭhasamāpattijhānesu ca ratā.
atk-s0304a0:238_0: Evaṃ porāṇānaṃ guṇaṃ kathetvā athetarahi brāhmaṇānaṃ mānaṃ nimmaddento ime ca vokkamma
atk-s0304a0:238_1: japāmasetiādimāha. Tattha vokkammāti etehi guṇehi apakkamitvā. Japāmaseti mayaṃ japāma
atk-s0304a0:238_2: sajjhāyāmāti ettakeneva brāhmaṇamhāti maññamānā brāhmaṇā mayanti iminā gottena mattā
atk-s0304a0:238_3: hutvā visamaṃ caranti, visamāni kāyakammādīni karontīti attho. Puthuattadaṇḍāti puthu
atk-s0304a0:238_4: attā daṇḍā etehīti puthuattadaṇḍā, gahitanānāvidhadaṇḍāti attho. Sataṇhātaṇhesūti
atk-s0304a0:238_5: sataṇhanittaṇhesu. Aguttadvārassa bhavanti moghāti asaṃvutadvārassa sabbepi vatasamādānā
atk-s0304a0:238_6: moghā bhavantīti dīpeti. Yathā kinti? Supineva laddhaṃ purisassa vittanti yathā supine
atk-s0304a0:238_7: purisassa laddhaṃ maṇimuttādinānāvidhaṃ vittaṃ moghaṃ hoti, pabujjhitvā kiñci na
atk-s0304a0:239_0: Anāsakāti ekāhadvīhādivasena anāhārakā. Thaṇḍilasāyikā cāti haritakusasanthate bhūmibhāge
atk-s0304a0:239_1: sayanaṃ, pāto sinānañca tayo ca vedāti pātova udakaṃ pavisitvā nhānañceva tayo ca
atk-s0304a0:239_2: vedā. Kharājinaṃ jaṭā paṅkoti kharasamphassaṃ ajinacammañceva jaṭākalāpo ca paṅko
atk-s0304a0:239_3: ca, paṅko nāma dantamalaṃ. Mantā sīlabbataṃ tapoti mantā ca ajasīlagosīlasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0304a0:239_4: sīlaṃ ajavatagovatasaṅkhātaṃ vatañca. Ayaṃ idāni brāhmaṇānaṃ tapoti vadati. Kuhanā
atk-s0304a0:239_5: vaṅkadaṇḍā cāti paṭicchannakūpo viya paṭicchannadosaṃ kohaññañceva vaṅkadaṇḍo, ca
atk-s0304a0:239_6: udumbarapalāsabeḷuvarukkhānaṃ aññatarato gahitaṃ vaṅkadaṇḍañcāti attho. Udakācamanāni
atk-s0304a0:239_7: cāti udakena mukhaparimajjanāni. Vaṇṇā ete brāhmaṇānanti ete brāhmaṇānaṃ parikkhārabhaṇḍakavaṇṇāti
atk-s0304a0:239_8: dasseti. Kata kiñcikkhabhāvanāti katā kiñcikkhabhāvanā. Ayameva vā pāṭho, āmisakiñcikkhassa
atk-s0304a0:240_0: Evaṃ etarahi brāhmaṇānaṃ mānaṃ nimmadditvā puna porāṇakabrāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento
atk-s0304a0:240_1: cittañca susamāhitantiādimāha. Tattha susamāhitanti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ cittaṃ upacārappanāsamādhīhi
atk-s0304a0:240_2: susamāhitaṃ ahosīti dasseti. Akhilanti mudu athaddhaṃ. So maggo brahmapattiyāti so
atk-s0304a0:240_3: seṭṭhapattiyā maggo, tumhe pana kiṃ brāhmaṇā nāmāti dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0304a0:241_0: Āgamaṃsu nu khvidhāti āgamaṃsu nu kho idha. Adhimuccatīti kilesavasena adhimutto
atk-s0304a0:241_1: giddho hoti. Byāpajjatīti byāpādavasena pūticittaṃ hoti. Parittacetasoti anupaṭṭhitasatitāya
atk-s0304a0:241_2: saṃkilesacittena parittacitto. Cetovimuttinti phalasamādhiṃ. Paññāvimuttinti phalapaññaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:243: 133. Dasame kāmaṇḍāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Yaggheti codanatthe nipāto. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0304a0:247: 134. Devadahavaggassa paṭhame devadahanti napuṃsakaliṅgena laddhanāmo nigamo. Manoramāti manaṃ ramayantā, manāpāti attho. Amanoramāti amanāpā.
atk-s0304a0:249_0: 135. Dutiye chaphassāyatanikā nāmāti visuṃ chaphassāyatanikā nāma nirayā natthi.
atk-s0304a0:249_1: Sabbesupi hi ekatiṃsamahānirayesu chadvāraphassāyatanapaññatti hotiyeva. Idaṃ pana
atk-s0304a0:249_2: avīcimahānirayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Saggāti idhāpi tāvatiṃsapurameva adhippetaṃ. Kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0304a0:249_3: pana ekasmimpi chaphassāyatanapaññattiyā abhāvo nāma natthi. Iminā kiṃ dīpeti? Niraye
atk-s0304a0:249_5: uppannapamādena maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkā. Manussaloko pana vokiṇṇasukhadukkho,
atk-s0304a0:249_6: idheva apāyopi saggopi paññāyati. Ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa kammabhūmi nāma, sā tumhehi
atk-s0304a0:249_7: laddhā. Tasmā ye vo ime mānussakā khandhā laddhā, te vo lābhā. Yañca vo idaṃ manussattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:249_8: laddhaṃ, paṭiladdho vo brahmacariyavāsassa khaṇo samayoti. Vuttampi hetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0304a0:255_0: 136. Tatiye rūpasammuditāti rūpe sammuditā pamoditā. Dukkhāti dukkhitā. Sukhoti nibbānasukhena
atk-s0304a0:255_1: sukhito. Kevalāti sakalā. Yāvatatthīti vuccatīti yattakā atthīti vuccati. Ete voti
atk-s0304a0:255_2: ettha vo-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Paccanīkamidaṃ hoti, sabbalokena passatanti yaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0304a0:255_3: passantānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ dassanaṃ, taṃ sabbalokena paccanīkaṃ hoti viruddhaṃ. Loko
atk-s0304a0:255_4: hi pañcakkhandhe niccā sukhā attā subhāti maññati, paṇḍitā aniccā dukkhā anattā asubhāti.
atk-s0304a0:255_5: Sukhato āhūti sukhanti kathenti. Sukhato vidūti sukhanti jānanti. Sabbametaṃ nibbānameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:256_0: Sammūḷhetthāti ettha nibbāne sammūḷhā. Aviddasūti bālā. Sabbepi hi channavutipāsaṇḍino
atk-s0304a0:256_1: “nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissāmā”ti saññino honti, te pana “nibbānaṃ nāma ida”ntipi na jānanti.
atk-s0304a0:256_2: Nivutānanti kilesanīvaraṇena nivutānaṃ pariyonaddhānaṃ. Andhakāro apassatanti apassantānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:256_3: andhakāro hoti. Kiṃ taṃ evaṃ hoti? Nibbānaṃ vā nibbānadassanaṃ vā apassantānañhi
atk-s0304a0:256_4: bālānaṃ nibbānampi nibbānadassanampi kāḷameghaavacchāditaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ kaṭāhena
atk-s0304a0:256_5: paṭikujjitapatto viya ca niccakālaṃ tamo ceva andhakāro ca sampajjati.
atk-s0304a0:257_0: Satañca vivaṭaṃ hoti, āloko passatāmivāti satañca sappurisānaṃ paññādassanena passantānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:257_1: nibbānaṃ āloko viya vivaṭaṃ hoti. Santike na vijānanti, magā dhammassa akovidāti
atk-s0304a0:257_2: yaṃ attano sarīre kese vā lomādīsu vā aññatarakoṭṭhāsaṃ paricchinditvā anantarameva
atk-s0304a0:257_3: adhigantabbato attano vā khandhānaṃ nirodhamaggato santike nibbānaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ santike
atk-s0304a0:257_4: samānampi maggabhūtā janā maggāmaggadhammassa catusaccadhammassa vā akovidā na jānanti.
atk-s0304a0:258_0: Māradheyyānupannehīti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ mārassa nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ anupannehi. Ko nu aññatra
atk-s0304a0:258_1: ariyebhīti ṭhapetvā ariye ko nu añño nibbānapadaṃ jānituṃ arahati. Sammadaññāya parinibbantīti
atk-s0304a0:258_2: arahattapaññāya sammā jānitvā anantarameva anāsavā hutvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbanti.
atk-s0304a0:258_3: Atha vā sammadaññāya anāsavā hutvā ante khandhaparinibbānena parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0304a0:260: 137-145. Catutthaṃ suddhikaṃ katvā desiyamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Pañcamādīni tathā tathā bujjhantānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni. Attho pana tesaṃ pākaṭoyevāti.
atk-s0304a0:264_0: 146. Navapurāṇavaggassa paṭhame navapurāṇānīti navāni ca purāṇāni ca. Cakkhu, bhikkhave,
atk-s0304a0:264_1: purāṇakammanti na cakkhu purāṇaṃ, kammameva purāṇaṃ, kammato pana nibbattattā paccayanāmena
atk-s0304a0:264_2: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Abhisaṅkhatanti paccayehi abhisamāgantvā kataṃ. Abhisañcetayitanti cetanāya
atk-s0304a0:264_3: pakappitaṃ. Vedaniyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti vedanāya vatthūti passitabbaṃ. Nirodhā vimuttiṃ
atk-s0304a0:264_4: phusatīti imassa tividhassa kammassa nirodhena vimuttiṃ phusati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:264_5: tassā vimuttiyā ārammaṇabhūto nirodho kammanirodhoti vuccati. Iti imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:266: 147-150. Dutiye nibbānasappāyanti nibbānassa sappāyaṃ upakārapaṭipadaṃ. Tatiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Paṭipāṭiyā pana catūsupi etesu suttesu saha vipassanāya cattāro maggā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:268_0: 151-152. Chaṭṭhe anantevāsikanti anto vasanakakilesavirahitaṃ. Anācariyakanti ācaraṇakakilesavirahitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:268_1: Antassa vasantīti anto assa vasanti. Te naṃ samudācarantīti te etaṃ adhibhavanti
atk-s0304a0:268_2: ajjhottharanti sikkhāpenti vā. “Evaṃ vejjakammaṃ karohi, evaṃ dūtakamma”nti iti sikkhāpanasaṅkhātena
atk-s0304a0:268_3: samudācaraṇatthenassa te ācariyā nāma honti, tehi ācariyehi sācariyakoti vuccati.
atk-s0304a0:268_4: Sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sattamaṃ heṭṭhā kathitanayameva.
atk-s0304a0:270_0: 153. Aṭṭhame yaṃ pariyāyaṃ āgammāti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgamma. Aññatreva saddhāyāti vinā
atk-s0304a0:270_1: saddhāya saddhaṃ apanetvā. Ettha ca saddhāti na paccakkhā saddhā. Yo pana parassa
