atk-s0304a0:270_2: evaṃ kira evaṃ kirāti kathentassa sutvā uppanno saddahanākāro, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:270_3: Ruciādīsupi rucāpetvā khamāpetvā atthetanti gahaṇākāro ruci nāma, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti
atk-s0304a0:270_4: anussavanaṃ anussavo, nisīditvā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ cintentassa kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:270_5: upaṭṭhitassa atthetanti gahaṇaṃ ākāraparivitakko nāma, kāraṇavitakkoti attho. Kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:270_6: cintentassa pāpikā laddhi uppajjati, taṃ atthesāti gahaṇākāro diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti
atk-s0304a0:270_7: nāma. Aññaṃ byākareyyāti imāni pañca ṭhānāni muñcitvā arahattaṃ byākareyya. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:272_0: 154-155. Navame indriyasampannoti paripuṇṇindriyo. Tattha yena cha indriyāni sammasitvā
atk-s0304a0:272_1: arahattaṃ pattaṃ, so tehi nibbisevanehi indriyehi samannāgatattā, cakkhādīni vā cha
atk-s0304a0:272_2: indriyāni sammasantassa uppannehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgatattā paripuṇṇindriyo
atk-s0304a0:272_3: nāma hoti, taṃ sandhāya bhagavā cakkhundriye cetiādinā nayena desanaṃ vitthāretvā
atk-s0304a0:272_4: ettāvatā kho bhikkhu indriyasampanno hotīti āha. Dasamaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0304a0:277_0: 156-159. Nandikkhayavaggassa paṭhame nandikkhayā rāgakkhayo, rāgakkhayā nandikkhayoti
atk-s0304a0:277_1: nandiyā ca rāgassa ca atthato ekattā vuttaṃ. Suvimuttanti arahattaphalavimuttivasena
atk-s0304a0:277_2: suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. Sesamettha dutiyādīsu ca uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:279_1: kāyavivekañca labhantānaṃ etesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gamissatīti ñatvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:279_2: Tattha okkhāyatīti (paccakkhāyati) paññāyati pākaṭaṃ hoti. Iti dvīsupi etesu saha
atk-s0304a0:281: 162-164. Sattamādīsu tīsu therassa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammāva kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:283: 165-167. Dasamādīni tīṇi pāṭiyekkena puggalajjhāsayavasena vuttāni. Tesaṃ attho vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-s0304a0:287_0: 168-227. Tadanantaro saṭṭhipeyyālo nāma hoti, so uttānatthova. Yāni panettha saṭṭhi
atk-s0304a0:287_1: suttāni vuttāni, tāni “chando pahātabbo”ti evaṃ tassa tasseva padassa vasena bujjhanakānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:287_2: ajjhāsayavasena vuttāni. Iti sabbāni tāni pāṭiyekkena puggalajjhāsayavasena kathitāni.
atk-s0304a0:287_3: Ekekasuttapariyosāne cettha saṭṭhi saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0304a0:291_0: 228. Samuddavaggassa paṭhame cakkhu, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddoti yadi duppūraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:291_1: yadi vā samuddanaṭṭhena samuddo, cakkhumeva samuddo. Tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
atk-s0304a0:291_2: nīlādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ duppūraṇaṭṭhenapi
atk-s0304a0:291_3: samuddo. Cakkhu ca tesu tesu nīlādīsu ārammaṇesu samuddati, asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:291_4: kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena sadosagamanena gacchatīti samuddanaṭṭhenapi samuddo.
atk-s0304a0:291_5: Tassa rūpamayo vegoti samuddassa appamāṇo ūmimayo vego viya tassāpi cakkhusamuddassa
atk-s0304a0:291_6: samosarantassa nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa vasena appameyyo rūpamayo vego veditabbo.
atk-s0304a0:291_7: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo taṃ cakkhusamudde samosaṭaṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ, manāpe
atk-s0304a0:291_8: rūpe rāgaṃ, amanāpe dosaṃ, asamapekkhite mohanti evaṃ rāgādikilese anuppādento upekkhakabhāvena sahati.
atk-s0304a0:292_0: Saūmintiādīsu kilesaūmīhi saūmiṃ. Kilesāvaṭṭehi sāvaṭṭaṃ. Kilesagāhehi sagāhaṃ. Kilesarakkhasehi
atk-s0304a0:292_1: sarakkhasaṃ. Kodhūpāyāsassa ca vasena saūmiṃ. Vutañhetaṃ “ūmibhayanti kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0304a0:292_3: kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacana”nti. Mātugāmavasena sagāhaṃ sarakkhasaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:292_4: Vuttañhetaṃ “gāharakkhasoti kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Sesavāresupi
atk-s0304a0:292_5: eseva nayo. Sabhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatarīti ūmibhayena sabhayaṃ duratikkamaṃ atikkami.
atk-s0304a0:292_6: Lokantagūti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ gato. Pāragatoti vuccatīti nibbānaṃ gatoti kathīyati.
atk-s0304a0:294_0: 229-230. Dutiye samuddoti samuddanaṭṭhena samuddo, kiledanaṭṭhena temanaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0304a0:294_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Yebhuyyenāti ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake. Samunnāti kilinnā tintā nimuggā.
atk-s0304a0:294_2: Tantākulakajātātiādi heṭṭhā vitthāritameva. Maccujahoti tayo maccū jahitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0304a0:294_3: Nirupadhīti tīhi upadhīhi anupadhi. Apunabbhavāyāti nibbānatthāya. Amohayī maccurājanti
atk-s0304a0:294_4: yathā tassa gatiṃ na jānāti, evaṃ maccurājānaṃ mohetvā gato. Tatiyaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0304a0:296_0: 231-233. Catutthe appahīnaṭṭhena atthi, tenevāha so appahīnoti. Parittāti, pabbatamattampi
atk-s0304a0:296_1: rūpaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ arajanīyaṃ parittaṃ nāma hoti, evarūpāpissa rūpā cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti
atk-s0304a0:296_2: dasseti. Ko pana vādo adhimattānanti iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ panassa rajanīyaṃ vatthu cittaṃ
atk-s0304a0:296_3: pariyādiyatīti ettha kā kathā? Ettha ca nakhapiṭṭhipamāṇampi maṇimuttādi rajanīyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:296_4: vatthu adhimattārammaṇamevāti veditabbaṃ. Daharotiādīni tīṇipi aññamaññavevacanāneva.
atk-s0304a0:296_5: Ābhindeyyāti pahareyya padāleyya vā. Pañcame tadubhayanti taṃ ubhayaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:298: 234. Sattame anekapariyāyenāti anekehi kāraṇehi. Itipāyanti itipi ayaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte aniccena anattalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:300_0: 235. Aṭṭhame anubyañjanaso nimittaggāhoti “hatthā sobhanā pādā sobhanā”ti evaṃ anubyañjanavasena
atk-s0304a0:300_1: nimittaggāho. Nimittaggāhoti hi saṃsandetvā gahaṇaṃ, anubyañjanaggāhoti vibhattigahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:300_2: Nimittaggāho kumbhīlasadiso sabbameva gaṇhāti, anubyañjanaggāho rattapāsadiso vibhajitvā
atk-s0304a0:300_3: hatthapādādīsu taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ. Ime pana dve gāhā ekajavanavārepi labbhanti, nānājavanavāre
atk-s0304a0:301_0: Nimittassādagathitanti nimittassādena ganthitaṃ baddhaṃ. Viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:301_1: Tasmiṃ ce samaye kālaṃ kareyyāti na koci saṃkiliṭṭhena cittena kālaṃ karonto nāma
atk-s0304a0:301_2: atthi. Sabbasattānañhi bhavaṅgeneva kālakiriyā hoti. Kilesabhayaṃ pana dassento evamāha.
atk-s0304a0:301_3: Samayavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Cakkhudvārasmiñhi āpāthagate ārammaṇe rattacittaṃ vā
atk-s0304a0:301_4: duṭṭhacittaṃ vā mūḷhacittaṃ vā ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, bhavaṅge
atk-s0304a0:301_5: ṭhatvā kālakiriyaṃ karoti. Tasmiṃ samaye kālaṃ karontassa dveva gatiyo pāṭikaṅkhā,
atk-s0304a0:302_0: Imaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ādīnavanti imaṃ anekāni vassasatasahassāni niraye anubhavitabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:302_1: dukkhaṃ sampassamāno evaṃ vadāmi tattāya ayosalākāya akkhīni añjāpetukāmoti. Iminā
atk-s0304a0:302_2: nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Ayosaṅkunāti ayasūlena. Sampalimaṭṭhanti dvepi
atk-s0304a0:303_0: Tatiyavāre sampalimaṭṭhanti nakhacchedanaṃ pavesetvā ukkhipitvā sahadhunaṭṭhena chinditvā
atk-s0304a0:303_1: pātanavasena sampalimaṭṭhaṃ. Catutthavāre sampalimaṭṭhanti bandhanamūlaṃ chetvā pātanavasena
atk-s0304a0:303_2: sampalimaṭṭhaṃ. Pañcamavāre sampalimaṭṭhanti tikhiṇāya sattiyā kāyapasādaṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0304a0:303_3: patanavasena sampalimaṭṭhaṃ. Sattiyāti ettha mahatī daṇḍakavāsi veditabbā. Sottanti
atk-s0304a0:303_4: nipajjitvā niddokkamanaṃ. Yathārūpānaṃ vitakkānaṃ vasaṃ gato saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti
atk-s0304a0:303_5: iminā vitakkānaṃ yāva saṅghabhedā pāpakammāvahanatā dassitā. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:305_0: 236-237. Navame hatthesu, bhikkhave, satīti hatthesu vijjamānesu. Dasame na hotīti
atk-s0304a0:305_1: vuccamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Dvīsupi cetesu vipākasukhadukkhameva
atk-s0304a0:309_1: sabhāgavuttino kārake yuttapayutte sabbepi dukkhalakkhaṇakammaṭṭhānike parivāretvā
atk-s0304a0:309_2: nisinne yogāvacare bhikkhū āmantesi. Idañhi suttaṃ puggalajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. Puggalesupi
atk-s0304a0:309_4: satthāraṃ parivāretvā nisinnānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi ugghaṭitaññūādīnaṃ catunnampi
atk-s0304a0:309_5: puggalānaṃ paccayabhūtamevetaṃ. Ugghaṭitaññū puggalo hi imassa suttassa mātikānikkhepeneva
atk-s0304a0:309_6: arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati, vipañcitaññū mātikāya vitthārabhājanena, neyyapuggalo imameva
atk-s0304a0:309_7: suttaṃ sajjhāyanto paripucchanto yoniso manasikaronto kalyāṇamitte sevanto bhajanto
atk-s0304a0:309_8: payirupāsanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati. Padaparamassetaṃ suttaṃ anāgate vāsanā bhavissatīti
atk-s0304a0:309_9: evaṃ sabbesampi upakārabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārento
atk-s0304a0:309_10: viya cakkavāḷapabbataṃ kampento viya ca mahantena ussāhena seyyathāpi, bhikkhaveti
atk-s0304a0:310_0: Tattha cattāro āsīvisāti kaṭṭhamukho, pūtimukho, aggimukho, satthamukhoti ime cattāro.
atk-s0304a0:310_1: Tesu kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ viya thaddhaṃ hoti, sandhipabbesu
atk-s0304a0:310_2: adhimattaṃ ayasūlasamappitaṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Pūtimukhena daṭṭhassa pakkapūtipanasaṃ
atk-s0304a0:310_3: viya vipubbakabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā paggharati, caṅgavāre pakkhittaudakaṃ viya hoti. Aggimukhena
atk-s0304a0:310_4: daṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ jhāyitvā bhasmamuṭṭhi viya thusamuṭṭhi viya ca vippakirīyati.
atk-s0304a0:310_5: Sattamukhena daṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ bhijjati, asanipātaṭṭhānaṃ viya mahānikhādanena
atk-s0304a0:310_6: khatasandhimukhaṃ viya ca hoti. Evaṃ visavasena vibhattā cattāro āsīvisā.
atk-s0304a0:311_0: Visavegavikārena panete soḷasa honti. Kaṭṭhamukho hi daṭṭhaviso, diṭṭhaviso, phuṭṭhaviso,
atk-s0304a0:311_1: vātavisoti catubbidho hoti. Tena hi daṭṭhampi diṭṭhampi phuṭṭhampi tassa vātena pahaṭampi
atk-s0304a0:311_2: sarīraṃ vuttappakārena thaddhaṃ hoti. Sesesupi eseva nayoti. Evaṃ visavegavikāravasena soḷasa honti.
atk-s0304a0:312_0: Puna puggalapaṇṇattivasena catusaṭṭhi honti. Kathaṃ? Kaṭṭhamukhesu tāva daṭṭhaviso
atk-s0304a0:312_1: ca āgataviso no ghoraviso, ghoraviso no āgataviso, āgataviso ceva ghoraviso ca, nevāgataviso
atk-s0304a0:312_2: na ghoravisoti catubbidho hoti. Tattha yassa visaṃ sampajjalitatiṇukkāya aggi viya
atk-s0304a0:312_3: sīghaṃ abhiruhitvā akkhīni gahetvā khandhaṃ gahetvā sīsaṃ gahetvā ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0304a0:312_4: āpajjati maṇisappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya, mantaṃ pana parivattetvā kaṇṇavātaṃ datvā daṇḍakena
atk-s0304a0:312_5: pahaṭamatte otaritvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ āgataviso no ghoraviso nāma.
atk-s0304a0:312_6: Yassa pana visaṃ saṇikaṃ abhiruhati, āruḷhāruḷhaṭṭhāne pana ayaṃ sītaudakaṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:312_7: hoti udakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya, dvādasavassaccayenāpi kaṇṇapiṭṭhikhandhapiṭṭhikādīsu
atk-s0304a0:312_8: gaṇḍapiḷakādivasena paññāyati, mantaparivattanādīsu ca kayiramānāsu sīghaṃ na otarati,
atk-s0304a0:312_9: ayaṃ ghoraviso no āgataviso nāma. Yassa pana visaṃ sīghaṃ abhiruhati, na sīghaṃ otarati
atk-s0304a0:312_10: aneḷakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya, ayaṃ āgataviso ceva ghoraviso ca. Yassa pana visaṃ
atk-s0304a0:312_11: mandaṃ hoti, otāriyamānampi sukheneva otarati nīlasappadhammanisappādīnaṃ visaṃ viya,
atk-s0304a0:312_12: ayaṃ nevāgataviso na ghoraviso nāma. Iminā upāyena kaṭṭhamukhe daṭṭhavisādayo pūtimukhādīsu
atk-s0304a0:312_13: ca daṭṭhavisādayo veditabbāti. Evaṃ puggalapaṇṇattivasena catusaṭṭhi.
atk-s0304a0:313_0: Tesu “aṇḍajā nāgā”tiādinā yonivasena ekekaṃ catudhā vibhajitvā chapaṇṇāsādhikāni
atk-s0304a0:313_1: dve satāni honti. Te jalajāthalajāti dviguṇitā dvādasādhikāni pañcasatāni honti,
atk-s0304a0:313_2: te kāmarūpaakāmarūpānaṃ vasena dviguṇitā catuvīsādhikasahassasaṅkhā honti. Puna gatamaggassa
atk-s0304a0:313_3: paṭilomato saṃkhippamānā kaṭṭhamukhādivasena cattārova hontīti. Te sandhāya bhagavā
atk-s0304a0:313_4: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisā”ti āha. Kulavasena hi ete gahitā.
atk-s0304a0:314_0: Tattha āsīvisāti āsittavisātipi āsīvisā, asitavisātipi āsīvisā, asisadisavisātipi
atk-s0304a0:314_1: āsīvisā. Āsittavisāti sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitavisā, parassa ca attano sarīre
atk-s0304a0:314_2: ca āsiñcanavisāti attho. Asitavisāti yaṃ yaṃ etehi asitaṃ hoti paribhuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ
atk-s0304a0:314_3: visameva sampajjati, tasmā asitaṃ visaṃ hoti etesanti āsīvisā. Asisadisavisāti asiviya
atk-s0304a0:314_4: tikhiṇaṃ paramammacchedanasamatthaṃ visaṃ etesanti āsīvisāti evamettha vacanattho
atk-s0304a0:314_5: veditabbo. Uggatejāti uggatatejā balavatejā. Ghoravisāti dunnimmaddanavisā.
atk-s0304a0:315_0: Evaṃ vadeyyunti paṭijaggāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ. Rājāno hi āsīvise gāhāpetvā – “tathārūpe
atk-s0304a0:315_1: core vā etehi ḍaṃsāpetvā māressāma, nagarūparodhakāle parasenāya vā taṃ khipissāma,
atk-s0304a0:315_2: parabalaṃ nimmaddetuṃ asakkontā subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā varasayanaṃ āruyha etehi attānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:315_3: ḍaṃsāpetvā sattūnaṃ vasaṃ anāgacchantā attano ruciyā marissāmā”ti āsīvise jaggāpenti.
atk-s0304a0:315_4: Te yaṃ coraṃ sahasāva māretuṃ na icchanti, “evamete dīgharattaṃ dukkhappatto hutvā
atk-s0304a0:315_5: marissantī”ti icchantā taṃ purisaṃ evaṃ vadanti ime te ambho purisa cattāro āsīvisāti.
atk-s0304a0:316_0: Tattha kālena kālanti kāle kāle. Saṃvesetabbāti nipajjāpetabbā. Aññataro vā aññataro
atk-s0304a0:316_1: vāti kaṭṭhamukhādīsu yo koci. Yaṃ te ambho purisa karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohīti idaṃ atthacarakassa
atk-s0304a0:316_2: vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tassa kira purisassa evaṃ āsīvise paṭipādetvā ‘ayaṃ vo upaṭṭhāko’ti
atk-s0304a0:316_3: catūsu peḷāsu ṭhapitānaṃ āsīvisānaṃ ārocenti. Atheko nikkhamitvā āgamma tassa purisassa
atk-s0304a0:316_4: dakkhiṇapādānusārena abhiruhitvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya veṭhetvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotamūle
atk-s0304a0:316_5: phaṇaṃ katvā susūti karonto nipajji. Aparo vāmapādānusārena abhiruhitvā tatheva vāmahatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:316_6: veṭhetvā vāmakaṇṇasotamūle phaṇaṃ katvā susūti karonto nipajji, tatiyo nikkhamitvā
atk-s0304a0:316_7: abhimukhaṃ abhiruhitvā kucchiṃ veṭhetvā galavāṭakamūle phaṇaṃ katvā susūti karonto
atk-s0304a0:316_8: nipajji, catuttho piṭṭhibhāgena abhiruhitvā gīvaṃ veṭhetvā uparimuddhani phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0304a0:317_0: Evaṃ catūsu āsīvisesu sarīraṭṭhakesuyeva jātesu eko tassa purisassa atthacarakapuriso
atk-s0304a0:317_1: taṃ disvā “kiṃ te, bho purisa, laddha”nti, pucchi. Tato tena “ime me, bho, hatthesu
atk-s0304a0:317_2: hatthakaṭakaṃ viya bāhāsu keyūraṃ viya kucchimhi kucchiveṭhanasāṭako viya kaṇṇesu
atk-s0304a0:317_3: kaṇṇacūḷikā viya gale muttāvaliyo viya sīse sīsapasādhanaṃ viya keci alaṅkāravisesā
atk-s0304a0:317_4: raññā dinnā”ti vutte so āha – “bho andhabāla, mā evaṃ maññittha ‘raññā me tuṭṭhenetaṃ
atk-s0304a0:317_5: pasādhanaṃ dinna’nti. Tvaṃ rañño āgucārī coro, ime ca cattāro āsīvisā durupaṭṭhāhā
atk-s0304a0:317_6: duppaṭijaggiyā, ekasmiṃ uṭṭhātukāme eko nhāyitukāmo hoti, ekasmiṃ nhāyitukāme eko
atk-s0304a0:317_7: bhuñjitukāmo, ekasmiṃ bhuñjitukāme eko nipajjitukāmo. Tesu yasseva icchā na pūrati,
atk-s0304a0:317_8: so tattheva ḍaṃsitvā māretī”ti. Atthi pana, bho, evaṃ sante koci sotthimaggoti? Āma,
atk-s0304a0:317_9: rājapurisānaṃ vikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā palāyanaṃ sotthibhāvoti vatvā “yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:318_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ pamādakkhaṇaṃ rājapurisehi ca pavivittaṃ disvā,
atk-s0304a0:318_1: vāmahatthena dakkhiṇahatthaṃ veṭhetvā, dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikāya phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā, sayitāsīvisassa
atk-s0304a0:318_2: sarīraṃ parimajjanto viya saṇikaṃ taṃ apanetvā, eteneva upāyena sesepi apanetvā tesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:318_3: bhīto palāyeyya. Atha naṃ te āsīvisā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ raññā upaṭṭhāko dinno”ti anubandhamānā
atk-s0304a0:318_4: āgaccheyyuṃ. Idaṃ sandhāya atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso bhīto catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ…pe… palāyethāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:319_0: Tasmiṃ pana purise evaṃ āgatamaggaṃ oloketvā oloketvā palāyante rājā “palāto so puriso”ti
atk-s0304a0:319_1: sutvā “ko nu kho taṃ anubandhitvā ghātetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti vicinanto tasseva paccatthike
atk-s0304a0:319_2: pañca jane labhitvā “gacchatha naṃ anubandhitvā ghātethā”ti peseyya. Athassa atthacarā
atk-s0304a0:319_3: purisā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā āroceyyuṃ. So bhiyyosomattāya bhīto palāyetha. Imamatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:320_0: Chaṭṭho antaracaro vadhakoti “paṭhamaṃ āsīvisehi anubaddho ito cito ca te vañcento
atk-s0304a0:320_1: palāyi, idāni pañcahi paccatthikehi anubaddho suṭṭhutaraṃ palāyati, na sakkā so evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:320_2: gahetuṃ, upalāḷanāya pana sakkā, tasmā daharakālato paṭṭhāya ekato khāditvā ca pivitvā
atk-s0304a0:320_3: ca santhavaṃ antaracaraṃ vadhakamassa pesethā”ti amaccehi vuttena raññā pariyesitvā
atk-s0304a0:321_0: So passeyya suññaṃ gāmanti nivattitvā olokento padaṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā vegenāgacchante
atk-s0304a0:321_1: cattāro āsīvise pañca vadhake paccatthike chaṭṭhañca antaracaraṃ vadhakaṃ “nivatta
atk-s0304a0:321_2: bho, mā palāyi, puttadārena saddhiṃ kāme paribhuñjanto sukhaṃ vasissasī”ti vatvā
atk-s0304a0:321_3: āgacchantaṃ disvā, bhiyyosomattāya yena vā tena vā palāyanto paccantaraṭṭhe abhimukhagataṃ
atk-s0304a0:321_4: ekaṃ chakuṭikaṃ suññaṃ gāmaṃ passeyya. Rittakaññeva paviseyyāti dhanadhaññamañcapīṭhādīhi
atk-s0304a0:321_5: virahitattā rittakaññeva paviseyya. Tucchakaṃ suññakanti etasseva vevacanaṃ. Parimaseyyāti
atk-s0304a0:321_6: “sace pānīyaṃ bhavissati, pivissāmi, sace bhattaṃ bhavissati, bhuñjissāmī”ti bhājanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:322_0: Tamenaṃ evaṃ vadeyyunti channaṃ gharānaṃ ekagharepi kiñci alabhitvā gāmamajjhe eko
atk-s0304a0:322_1: sandacchāyo rukkho atthi, tattha vaṅkaphalakaṃ atthataṃ disvā, “idha tāva nisīdissāmī”ti
atk-s0304a0:322_2: gantvā, tattha nisinnaṃ mandamandena vātena bījiyamānaṃ tattakamattampi sukhaṃ santato
atk-s0304a0:322_3: assādayamānaṃ, tamenaṃ purisaṃ kecideva atthacarakā bahi pavattiṃ ñatvā āgatā evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:322_4: vadeyyuṃ. Idāni ambho purisāti ambho, purisa, idāni. Corā gāmaghātakāti “yadevettha
atk-s0304a0:322_5: labhissāma, taṃ gaṇhissāma vā ghātessāma vā”ti āgatā cha gāmaghātakacorā.
atk-s0304a0:323_0: Udakaṇṇavanti gambhīraṃ puthulaṃ udakaṃ. Gambhīrampi hi aputhulaṃ, puthulaṃ vā agambhīraṃ,
atk-s0304a0:323_1: na aṇṇavoti vuccati, yampana gambhīrañca puthulañca, tassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayanti
atk-s0304a0:323_2: catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ pañcannaṃ vadhakānaṃ chaṭṭhassa antaracarassa channañca gāmaghātakacorānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:323_3: vasena sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ. Khemaṃ appaṭibhayanti tesaṃyeva āsīvisādīnaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0304a0:323_4: khemañca nibbhayañca vicitrauyyānavaraṃ bahvannapānaṃ devanagarasadisaṃ. Na cassa
atk-s0304a0:323_5: nāvā santāraṇīti “imāya nāvāya orimatīrato paratīraṃ gamissantī”ti evaṃ ṭhapitā ca
atk-s0304a0:323_6: santāraṇī nāvā na bhaveyya. Uttarasetu vāti rukkhasetu-jaṅghasetu-sakaṭasetūnaṃ aññataro
atk-s0304a0:323_7: uttarasetu vā na bhaveyya. Tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti na kho esa brāhmaṇo. Kasmā naṃ brāhmaṇoti
atk-s0304a0:323_8: āha? Ettakānaṃ paccatthikānaṃ bāhitattā, desanaṃ vā vinivattento ekaṃ khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ dassetumpi evamāha.
atk-s0304a0:324_0: Tasmiṃ pana evaṃ uttiṇṇe cattāro āsīvisā “na laddho vatāsi amhehi, ajja te murumurāya
atk-s0304a0:324_1: jīvitaṃ khāditvā chaḍḍeyyāma”. Pañca paccatthikā “na laddho vatāsi amhehi, ajja te
atk-s0304a0:324_2: parivāretvā aṅgamaṅgāni chinditvā rañño santikaṃ gatā sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā labheyyāma”.
atk-s0304a0:324_3: Chaṭṭho antaracaro “na laddho vatāsi mayā, ajja te phalikavaṇṇena asinā sīsaṃ chinditvā,
atk-s0304a0:324_4: senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā sampattiṃ anubhaveyyaṃ”. Cha corā “na laddho vatāsi amhehi,
atk-s0304a0:324_5: ajja te vividhāni kammakāraṇāni kāretvā bahudhanaṃ āharāpessāmā”ti cintetvā, udakaṇṇavaṃ
atk-s0304a0:324_6: otarituṃ asakkontā rañño āṇāya kopitattā parato gantumpi avisahantā tattheva sussitvā mareyyuṃ.
atk-s0304a0:325_0: Upamā kho myāyanti ettha evaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ – rājā
atk-s0304a0:325_1: viya hi kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, rājāparādhikapuriso viya vaṭṭanissito puthujjano. Cattāro
atk-s0304a0:325_2: āsīvisā viya cattāri mahābhūtāni, rañño tassa cattāro āsīvise paṭicchāpitakālo viya
atk-s0304a0:325_3: kammunā puthujjanassa paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ dinnakālo. “Imesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:325_4: āsīvisānaṃ pamādakkhaṇe rājapurisānañca vivittakkhaṇe nikkhamitvā yaṃ te ambho, purisa,
atk-s0304a0:325_5: karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohī”ti vacanena “palāyassū”ti vuttakālo viya satthārā imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0304a0:325_6: mahābhūtakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā “imesu catūsu mahābhūtesu nibbinda virajja, evaṃ vaṭṭato
atk-s0304a0:325_7: parimuccissasī”ti kathitakālo, tassa purisassa atthacarakavacanaṃ sutvā catunnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:325_8: āsīvisānaṃ pamādakkhaṇe rājapurisānañca vivittakkhaṇe nikkhamitvā yena vā tena vā
atk-s0304a0:325_9: palāyanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā mahābhūtāsīvisehi
atk-s0304a0:326_0: Idāni catunnetaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhivacanaṃ pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuyātiādīsu catumahābhūtakathā
atk-s0304a0:326_1: ca pañcupādānakkhandhakathā ca āyatanakathā ca visuddhimagge vitthāritanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:326_2: Ettha ca kaṭṭhamukhaāsīviso viya pathavīdhātu daṭṭhabbā, pūtimukhaaggimukhasatthamukhā
atk-s0304a0:326_3: viya sesadhātuyo. Yatheva hi kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhassa sakalakāyo thaddho hoti, evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:326_4: pathavīdhātupakopenāpi. Yathā ca pūtimukhādīhi daṭṭhassa paggharati ceva jhāyati
atk-s0304a0:326_5: ca chijjati ca, evaṃ āpodhātutejodhātuvāyodhātupakopenāpīti. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā –
atk-s0304a0:336_0: Avisesato pana āsayato visavegavikārato anatthaggahaṇato durupaṭṭhānato durāsadato
atk-s0304a0:336_1: akataññutato avisesakārito anantadosūpaddavatoti imehi kāraṇehi etesaṃ āsīvisasadisatā
atk-s0304a0:336_2: veditabbā. Tattha āsayatoti āsīvisānañhi vammiko āsayo, tattheva te vasanti. Mahābhūtānampi
atk-s0304a0:336_4: Etesupi hi te vasanti. Mahābhūtānampi kāyasusiraṃ kāyagahanaṃ kāyasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:336_5: āsayoti. Evaṃ tāva āsayato sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:337_0: Visavegavikāratoti āsīvisā hi kulavasena kaṭṭhamukhādibhedato cattāro. Tattha ekeko
atk-s0304a0:337_1: visavikārato vibhajjamāno daṭṭhavisādivasena catubbidho hoti. Mahābhūtānipi paccattalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0304a0:337_2: pathavīādibhedato cattāri. Ettha ekekaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:338_0: Anatthaggahaṇatoti āsīvise gaṇhantā pañca anatthe gaṇhanti – duggandhaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0304a0:338_1: asuciṃ gaṇhanti, byādhiṃ gaṇhanti, visaṃ gaṇhanti, maraṇaṃ gaṇhanti. Mahābhūtānipi
atk-s0304a0:338_2: gaṇhantā pañca anatthe gaṇhanti – duggandhaṃ gaṇhanti, asuciṃ gaṇhanti, byādhiṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0304a0:338_3: jaraṃ gaṇhanti, maraṇaṃ gaṇhanti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0304a0:348_0: Durupaṭṭhānatoti te āsīvisā durupaṭṭhānā, ekasmiṃ uṭṭhātukāme eko nhāyitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0304a0:348_1: tasmiṃ nhāyitukāme aparo bhuñjitukāmo, tasmiṃ bhuñjitukāme añño nipajjitukāmo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:348_2: Tesu yassa yasseva ajjhāsayo na pūrati, so tattheva ḍaṃsitvā māreti. Imehi pana āsīvisehi
atk-s0304a0:348_3: bhūtāneva durupaṭṭhānatarāni. Pathavīdhātuyā hi bhesajje kayiramāne āpodhātu kuppati,
atk-s0304a0:348_4: tasseva bhesajjaṃ karontassa tejodhātūti evaṃ ekissā bhesajje kayiramāne aparā kuppantīti.
atk-s0304a0:349_0: Durāsadatoti durāsadā hi āsīvisā, gehassa purimabhāge āsīvisaṃ disvā pacchimabhāgena
atk-s0304a0:349_1: palāyanti, pacchimabhāge disvā purimabhāgena, gehamajjhe disvā gabbhaṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0304a0:349_2: gabbhe disvā mañcapīṭhaṃ abhiruhanti. Mahābhūtāni tatopi durāsadatarāni. Tathārūpena
atk-s0304a0:349_3: hi kuṭṭharogena phuṭṭhassa kaṇṇanāsādīni chinditvā patanti, sarīraṃ samphuṭati nīlamakkhikā
atk-s0304a0:349_4: parivārenti, sarīragandho dūratova ubbāhati. Taṃ purisaṃ akkosamānampi paridevamānampi
atk-s0304a0:349_5: neva rosavasena, na kāruññena, upasaṅkamituṃ sakkonti, nāsikaṃ pidahitvā kheḷaṃ pātentā
atk-s0304a0:349_6: dūratova naṃ vivajjenti. Evaṃ aññesampi bhagandarakucchirogavātarogādīnaṃ bībhacchajegucchabhāvakarānañca
atk-s0304a0:349_7: rogānaṃ vasena ayamevattho vibhāvetabboti. Evaṃ durāsadato sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:350_0: Akataññutatoti āsīvisā hi akataññuno honti, nhāpiyamānāpi bhojiyamānāpi gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0304a0:350_1: pūjiyamānāpi peḷāyaṃ pakkhipitvā parihariyamānāpi otārameva gavesanti. Yattha otāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:350_2: labhanti, tattheva naṃ ḍaṃsitvā mārenti. Āsīvisehipi mahābhūtāneva akataññutarāni.
atk-s0304a0:350_3: Etesañhi kataṃ nāma natthi, sītena vā uṇhena vā nimmalena jalena nhāpiyamānānipi
atk-s0304a0:350_5: varabhojanaṃ bhojiyamānānipi, varapānaṃ pāyāpiyamānānipi otārameva gavesanti. Yattha
atk-s0304a0:350_6: otāraṃ labhanti, tattheva kuppitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpentīti. Evaṃ akataññutato sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:351_0: Avisesakāritoti āsīvisā hi “ayaṃ khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho
atk-s0304a0:351_1: vā pabbajito vā”ti visesaṃ na karonti, sampattasampattameva ḍaṃsitvā mārenti. Mahābhūtānipi
atk-s0304a0:351_2: “ayaṃ khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā devo vā
atk-s0304a0:351_3: manusso vā māro vā brahmā vā nigguṇo vā saguṇo vā”ti visesaṃ na karonti. Yadi hi
atk-s0304a0:351_4: nesaṃ “ayaṃ guṇavā”ti lajjā uppajjeyya, sadevake loke aggapuggale tathāgate lajjaṃ
atk-s0304a0:351_5: uppādeyyuṃ. Athāpi nesaṃ “ayaṃ mahāpañño ayaṃ mahiddhiko ayaṃ dhutavādo”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0304a0:351_6: lajjā uppajjeyya, dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherādīsu lajjaṃ uppādeyyuṃ. Athāpi nesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:351_7: “ayaṃ nigguṇo dāruṇo thaddho”ti bhayaṃ uppajjeyya, sadevake loke nigguṇathaddhadāruṇānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:351_8: aggassa devadattassa channaṃ vā satthārānaṃ bhāyeyyuṃ, na ca lajjanti na ca bhāyanti,
atk-s0304a0:351_9: kuppitvā yaṃkiñci anayabyasanaṃ āpādentiyeva. Evaṃ avisesakārito sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:352_0: Anantadosūpaddavatoti āsīvise nissāya uppajjanakānañhi dosūpaddavānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0304a0:352_1: Tathā hete ḍaṃsitvā kāṇampi karonti khujjampi pīṭhasappimpi ekapakkhalampīti evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:352_2: aparimāṇaṃ vippakāraṃ dassenti. Bhūtānipi kuppitāni na kāṇādibhāvesu na kiñci vippakāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:352_3: na karonti, appamāṇo etesaṃ dosūpaddavoti. Evaṃ anantadosūpaddavato sadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:353: Idānettha catumahābhūtavasena yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge catudhātuvavatthānaniddese kathitameva.
atk-s0304a0:354_0: Pañca vadhakā paccatthikāti kho bhikkhave pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacananti
atk-s0304a0:354_1: ettha dvīhi ākārehi khandhānaṃ vadhakapaccatthikasadisatā veditabbā. Khandhā hi aññamaññañca
atk-s0304a0:354_2: vadhenti, tesu ca santesu vadho nāma paññāyati. Kathaṃ? Rūpaṃ tāva rūpampi vadheti
atk-s0304a0:354_3: arūpampi, tathā arūpaṃ arūpampi vadheti rūpampi. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi pathavīdhātu bhijjamānā
atk-s0304a0:354_4: itarā tisso dhātuyo gahetvāva bhijjati, āpodhātuādīsupi eseva nayo, evaṃ tāva rūpaṃ
atk-s0304a0:354_5: rūpameva vadheti. Rūpakkhandho pana bhijjamāno cattāro arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati,
atk-s0304a0:354_6: evaṃ rūpaṃ arūpampi vadheti. Vedanākkhandhopi bhijjamāno saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhe
atk-s0304a0:354_7: gahetvāva bhijjati. Saññākkhandhādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ arūpaṃ arūpameva vadheti.
atk-s0304a0:354_8: Cutikkhaṇe pana cattāro arūpakkhandhā bhijjamānā vatthurūpampi gahetvāva bhijjanti,
atk-s0304a0:354_9: evaṃ arūpaṃ rūpampi vadheti. Evaṃ tāva aññamaññaṃ vadhentīti vadhakā. Yattha pana
atk-s0304a0:354_10: khandhā atthi, tattha chedanabhedanavadhabandhanādayo honti, na aññatthāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:355_0: Idāni pañcakkhandhe rūpārūpavasena dve koṭṭhāse katvā, rūpavasena vā nāmavasena vā
atk-s0304a0:355_1: rūpapariggahaṃ ādiṃ katvā, yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ siyā tampi visuddhimagge kathitameva.
atk-s0304a0:356_0: Chaṭṭho antaracaro vadhako ukkhittāsikoti kho, bhikkhave, nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacananti
atk-s0304a0:356_1: ettha dvīhākārehi nandīrāgassa ukkhittāsikavadhakasadisatā veditabbā paññāsirapātanato
atk-s0304a0:356_2: ca yonisampaṭipādanato ca. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ
atk-s0304a0:356_3: ārammaṇaṃ nissāya lobho uppajjati, ettāvatā paññāsīsaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti, sotadvārādīsupi
atk-s0304a0:356_4: eseva nayo. Evaṃ tāva paññāsirapātanato sadisatā veditabbā. Nandīrāgo panesa aṇḍajādibhedā
atk-s0304a0:356_5: catasso yoniyo upaneti. Tassa yoniupagamanamūlakāni pañcavīsati mahābhayāni dvattiṃsa
atk-s0304a0:356_6: kammakāraṇāni ca āgatāneva hontīti evaṃ yonisampaṭipādanatopissa ukkhittāsikavadhakasadisatā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:357_0: Iti nandīrāgavasenāpi ekassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitameva hoti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi
atk-s0304a0:357_1: nandīrāgo saṅkhārakkhandho, taṃ saṅkhārakkhandhoti vavatthapetvā taṃsampayuttā vedanā
atk-s0304a0:357_2: vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, tesaṃ vatthārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:357_3: rūpakkhandhoti, evaṃ pañcakkhandhe vavatthapeti. Idāni te pañcakkhandhe nāmarūpavasena
atk-s0304a0:357_4: vavatthapetvā, tesaṃ paccayapariyesanato paṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, anupubbena
atk-s0304a0:357_5: eko arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti evaṃ nandīrāgavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:358_0: Channaṃ ajjhattikāyatanānaṃ suññagāmena sadisatā pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatā. Ayaṃ panettha
atk-s0304a0:358_1: kammaṭṭhānanayo – yathā ca te cha corā chakuṭikaṃ suññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0304a0:358_2: vicarantā kiñci alabhitvā gāmena anatthikā honti, evamevaṃ bhikkhu chasu ajjhattikāyatanesu
atk-s0304a0:358_3: abhinivisitvā vicinanto “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ kiñci adisvā tehi anatthiko
atk-s0304a0:358_6: sabbānipetāni nāmañceva rūpañcāti nāmarūpavasena vavatthapetvā, tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesitvā
atk-s0304a0:358_7: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, saṅkhāre sammasanto anupubbena arahatte patiṭṭhāti. Idaṃ ekassa
atk-s0304a0:358_8: bhikkhuno yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:359_0: Idāni bāhirānaṃ gāmaghātakacorehi sadisataṃ dassento corā gāmaghātakāti khotiādimāha.
atk-s0304a0:359_1: Tattha manāpāmanāpesūti karaṇatthe bhummaṃ, manāpāmanāpehīti attho. Tattha coresu
atk-s0304a0:359_2: gāmaṃ hanantesu pañca kiccāni vattanti – corā tāva gāmaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā aggiṃ
atk-s0304a0:359_3: datvā kaṭakaṭasaddaṃ uṭṭhāpenti, tato manussā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā bahi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0304a0:359_4: Tato tehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍakassa kāraṇā hatthaparāmāsaṃ karonti. Keci panettha pahāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:359_5: pāpuṇanti, keci pahāraṭṭhāne patanti, avasese pana arogajane bandhitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:360_0: Tattha gāmaghātakacorānaṃ gāmaṃ parivāretvā aggidānaṃ viya chasu dvāresu ārammaṇe
atk-s0304a0:360_1: āpāthagate kilesapariḷāhuppatti veditabbā, hatthasāraṃ ādāya bahi nikkhamanaṃ viya.
atk-s0304a0:360_2: Taṅkhaṇe kusaladhammaṃ pahāya akusalasamaṅgitā, bhaṇḍakassa kāraṇā hatthaparāmasanāpajjanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:360_4: saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjanakālo, pahāraṃ laddhā pana pahāraṭṭhāne patitakālo viya pārājikaṃ
atk-s0304a0:360_5: āpajjitvā assamaṇakālo, avasesajanassa bandhitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā dāsaparibhogena
atk-s0304a0:360_6: paribhuñjanakālo viya tameva ārammaṇaṃ nissāya sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva cūḷasīlamajjhimasīlamahāsīlāni
atk-s0304a0:360_7: bhinditvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gihibhāvaṃ āpajjanakālo. Tatrassa puttadāraṃ posentassa
atk-s0304a0:360_8: sandiṭṭhiko dukkhakkhandho veditabbo, kālaṃ katvā apāye nibbattassa samparāyiko.
atk-s0304a0:361_0: Imānipi bāhirāyatanāni ekassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānavaseneva kathitāni. Ettha hi rūpādīni
atk-s0304a0:361_1: cattāri upādārūpāni, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ tisso dhātuyo, dhammāyatane āpodhātuyā saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:361_2: tā catassoti imāni cattāri bhūtāni, tesaṃ paricchedavasena ākāsadhātu, lahutādivasena
atk-s0304a0:361_3: lahutādayoti evamidaṃ sabbampi bhūtupādāyarūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, tadārammaṇā vedanādayo
atk-s0304a0:361_4: cattāro arūpakkhandhā. Tattha “rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ, cattāro arūpino khandhā nāma”nti.
atk-s0304a0:361_5: Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā purimanayeneva paṭipajjantassa yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:362_0: Oghānanti ettha duruttaraṇaṭṭho oghaṭṭho. Ete hi “sīlasaṃvaraṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:362_1: pāpuṇissāmī”ti ajjhāsayaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kalyāṇamitte nissāya sammā vāyamantena taritabbā,
atk-s0304a0:362_2: yena vā tena vā duruttarā. Iminā duruttaraṇaṭṭhena oghāti vuccanti. Tepi ekassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0304a0:362_3: kammaṭṭhānavasena kathitā. Cattāropi hi ete eko saṅkhārakkhandho vāti. Sesaṃ nandīrāge
atk-s0304a0:363_0: Sakkāyassetaṃ adhivacananti, sakkāyopi hi āsīvisādīhi udakaṇṇavassa orimatīraṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:363_1: catumahābhūtādīhi sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo, sopi ekassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānavaseneva
atk-s0304a0:363_2: kathito. Sakkāyo hi tebhūmakapañcakkhandhā, te ca samāsato nāmarūpamevāti. Evamettha
atk-s0304a0:363_3: nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vitthāretabbanti.
atk-s0304a0:364_0: Nibbānassetaṃ adhivacananti nibbānañhi udakaṇṇavassa pārimatīraṃ viya catumahābhūtādīhi
atk-s0304a0:364_1: khemaṃ appaṭibhayaṃ. Vīriyārambhassetaṃ adhivacananti ettha cittakiriyadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:364_2: heṭṭhā vuttavāyāmameva vīriyanti gaṇhitvā dasseti. Tiṇṇo pāraṅgatoti taritvā pāraṃ gato.
atk-s0304a0:365_0: Tattha yathā sāsaṅkaorimatīre ṭhitena udakaṇṇavaṃ taritukāmena katipāhaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0304a0:365_1: saṇikaṃ nāvaṃ sajjetvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷantena viya na nāvā abhiruhitabbā. Evaṃ karonto
atk-s0304a0:365_2: hi anāruḷhova byasanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Evameva kilesaṇṇavaṃ taritukāmena “taruṇo tāvamhi,
atk-s0304a0:365_3: mahallakakāle aṭṭhaṅgikamaggakullaṃ bandhissāmī”ti papañco na kātabbo. Evaṃ karonto
atk-s0304a0:365_4: hi mahallakakālaṃ apatvāpi vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti, patvāpi kātuṃ na sakkoti. Bhaddekarattādīni
atk-s0304a0:365_5: pana anussaritvā vegeneva ayaṃ ariyamaggakullo bandhitabbo.
atk-s0304a0:366_0: Yathā ca kullaṃ bandhantassa hatthapādapāripūri icchitabbā. Kuṇṭhapādo hi khañjapādo
atk-s0304a0:366_1: vā patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, phaṇahatthakādayo tiṇapaṇṇādīni gahetuṃ na sakkonti. Evamimampi
atk-s0304a0:366_2: ariyamaggakullaṃ bandhantassa sīlapādānañceva saddhāhatthassa ca pāripūri icchitabbā.
atk-s0304a0:366_3: Na hi dussīlo assaddho sāsane appatiṭṭhito paṭipattiṃ assaddahanto ariyamaggakullaṃ
atk-s0304a0:366_4: bandhituṃ sakkoti. Yathā ca paripuṇṇahatthapādopi dubbalo byādhipīḷito kullaṃ bandhituṃ
atk-s0304a0:366_5: na sakkoti, thāmasampannova sakkoti, evaṃ sīlavā saddhopi alaso kusīto imaṃ maggakullaṃ
atk-s0304a0:366_6: bandhituṃ na sakkoti, āraddhavīriyova sakkotīti imaṃ bandhitukāmena āraddhavīriyena
atk-s0304a0:366_7: bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā so puriso kullaṃ bandhitvā tīre ṭhatvā yojanavitthāraṃ udakaṇṇavaṃ
atk-s0304a0:366_8: “ayaṃ mayā paccattapurisakāraṃ nissāya nittharitabbo”ti mānasaṃ bandhati, evaṃ yogināpi
atk-s0304a0:366_9: caṅkamā oruyha “ajja mayā catumaggavajjhaṃ kilesaṇṇavaṃ taritvā arahatte patiṭṭhātabba”nti
atk-s0304a0:367_0: Yathā ca so puriso kullaṃ nissāya udakaṇṇavaṃ taranto gāvutamattaṃ gantvā nivattitvā
atk-s0304a0:367_1: olokento “ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ atikkantomhi, aññe tayo sesā”ti jānāti, aparampi gāvutamattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_2: gantvā nivattitvā olokento “dve atikkantomhi, dve sesā”ti jānāti, aparampi gāvutamattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_3: gantvā nivattitvā olokento “tayo atikkantomhi, eko seso”ti jānāti, tampi atikkamma
atk-s0304a0:367_4: nivattitvā olokento “cattāropi me koṭṭhasā atikkantā”ti jānāti, tañca kullaṃ pādena
atk-s0304a0:367_5: akkamitvā sotābhimukhaṃ khipitvā uttaritvā tīre tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu ariyamaggakullaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_6: nissāya kilesaṇṇavaṃ taranto sotāpattimaggena paṭhamamaggavajjhe kilese taritvā maggānantare
atk-s0304a0:367_7: phale ṭhito paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nivattitvā olokento “catumaggavajjhānaṃ me kilesānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_8: eko koṭṭhāso pahīno, itare tayo sesā”ti jānāti. Puna tatheva indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0304a0:367_9: samodhānetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto sakadāgāmimaggena dutiyamaggavajjhe kilese taritvā
atk-s0304a0:367_10: maggānantare phale ṭhito paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nivattitvā, olokento “catumaggavajjhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_11: me kilesānaṃ dve koṭṭhāsā pahīnā, itare dve sesā”ti jānāti. Puna tatheva indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0304a0:367_12: samodhānetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto anāgāmimaggena tatiyamaggavajjhe kilese taritvā
atk-s0304a0:367_13: maggānantare phale ṭhito paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nivattitvā olokento “catumaggavajjhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:367_14: me kilesānaṃ tayo koṭṭhāsā pahīnā, eko seso”ti jānāti. Puna tatheva indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0304a0:367_15: samodhānetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattamaggena catutthamaggavajjhe kilese taritvā
atk-s0304a0:367_16: maggānantare phale ṭhito paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nivattitvā olokento “sabbakilesā me pahīnā”ti jānāti.
atk-s0304a0:368_0: Yathā so puriso taṃ kullaṃ sote pavāhetvā uttaritvā thale ṭhito nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0304a0:368_1: uparipāsādavaragato “ettakena vatamhi anatthena mutto”ti ekaggacitto tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0304a0:368_2: nisīdati, evaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā āsane aññesu vā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu yattha katthaci
atk-s0304a0:368_3: nisinno “ettakena vatamhi anatthena mutto”ti nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā
atk-s0304a0:368_4: ekaggacitto tuṭṭhamānaso nisīdati. Idaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale
atk-s0304a0:368_5: tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, arahato etaṃ adhivacananti. Evaṃ tāvettha nānākammaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0304a0:368_6: kathitāni, samodhānetvā pana sabbānipi ekameva katvā dassetabbāni. Ekaṃ katvā dassentenāpi
atk-s0304a0:369_0: Kathaṃ? Ettha hi cattāri mahābhūtāni ajjhattikāni pañcāyatanāni bāhirāni pañcāyatanāni
atk-s0304a0:369_1: dhammāyatane pannarasa sukhumarūpāni sakkāyassa ekadesoti ayaṃ rūpakkhandho, manāyatanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:369_2: viññāṇakkhandho dhammāyatanekadeso cattāro oghā sakkāyekadesoti ime cattāro arūpino
atk-s0304a0:369_3: khandhā. Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ, cattāro arūpino khandhā nāmanti idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:369_4: Tassa nandīrāgo kāmogho bhavogho dhammāyatanekadeso sakkāyekadesoti ime paccayā.
atk-s0304a0:369_5: Iti sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti nāma. Sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā
atk-s0304a0:369_6: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0304a0:370_0: Tattha cattāro mahābhūtā pañcupādānakkhandhā ajjhattikabāhirāni ekādasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso
atk-s0304a0:370_1: diṭṭhogho avijjogho sakkāyekadesoti idaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, nandīrāgo dhammāyatanekadeso
atk-s0304a0:370_2: kāmogho bhavogho sakkāyekadesoti idaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, pārimatīrasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:370_3: nirodhasaccaṃ, ariyamaggo maggasaccaṃ. Tattha dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, dve vivaṭṭaṃ, dve
atk-s0304a0:370_4: lokiyāni, dve lokuttarānīti cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhinayasahassehi vibhajitvā
atk-s0304a0:370_5: dassetabbānīti. Desanāpariyosāne vipañcitaññū pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:372_1: assāti sukhasomanassabahulo. Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti kāraṇañcassa paripuṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0304a0:372_2: Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti idha āsavakkhayoti arahattamaggo adhippeto, tadatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0304a0:372_3: Odhastapatodoti rathamajjhe tiriyaṃ ṭhapitapatodo. Yenicchakanti yena disābhāgena
atk-s0304a0:372_4: icchati. Yadicchakanti yaṃ yaṃ gamanaṃ icchati. Sāreyyāti peseyya. Paccāsāreyyāti
atk-s0304a0:372_5: paṭivinivatteyya. Ārakkhāyāti rakkhaṇatthāya. Saṃyamāyāti veganiggahaṇatthāya. Damāyāti
atk-s0304a0:373_0: Evameva khoti ettha yathā akusalassa sārathino adante sindhave yojetvā visamamaggena
atk-s0304a0:373_1: rathaṃ pesentassa cakkānipi bhijjanti, akkhopi sindhavānañca khurā, attanāpi anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:373_2: pāpuṇāti, na ca icchiticchitena gamanena sāretuṃ sakkoti; evaṃ chasu indriyesu aguttadvāro
atk-s0304a0:373_3: bhikkhu na icchiticchitaṃ samaṇaratiṃ anubhavituṃ sakkoti. Yathā pana cheko sārathi
atk-s0304a0:373_4: dante sindhave yojetvā, same bhūmibhāge rathaṃ otāretvā rasmiyo gahetvā, sindhavānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:373_5: khuresu satiṃ ṭhapetvā, patodaṃ ādāya nibbisevane katvā, pesento icchiticchitena
atk-s0304a0:373_6: gamanena sāreti. Evameva chasu indriyesu guttadvāro bhikkhu imasmiṃ sāsane icchiticchitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:373_7: samaṇaratiṃ anubhoti, sace aniccānupassanābhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetukāmo hoti, tadabhimukhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:374_0: Bhojane mattaññūti bhojanamhi pamāṇaññū. Tattha dve pamāṇāni – paṭiggahaṇapamāṇañca
atk-s0304a0:374_1: paribhogapamāṇañca. Tattha paṭiggahaṇapamāṇe dāyakassa vaso veditabbo, deyyadhammassa
atk-s0304a0:374_2: vaso veditabbo, attano thāmo jānitabbo. Evarūpo hi bhikkhu sace deyyadhammo bahuko
atk-s0304a0:374_3: hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo appo, dāyako
atk-s0304a0:374_4: bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi bahu, dāyakopi
atk-s0304a0:374_5: bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇena gaṇhāti. So tāya paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya
atk-s0304a0:374_6: anuppannañca lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannañca thāvaraṃ karoti dhammikatissamahārājakāle
atk-s0304a0:375_0: Rañño kira pañcahi sakaṭasatehi guḷaṃ āhariṃsu. Rājā “manāpo paṇṇākāro, ayyehi vinā
atk-s0304a0:375_1: na khādissāmā”ti aḍḍhateyyāni sakaṭasatāni mahāvihāraṃ pesetvā sayampi bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0304a0:375_2: agamāsi. Bheriyā pahaṭāya dvādasa bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu. Rājā ekamante ṭhito
atk-s0304a0:375_3: ārāmikaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “rañño nāma dāne pattapūrova pamāṇaṃ, gahitabhājanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:375_4: pūretvāva dehi, sace koci mattapaṭiggahaṇe ṭhito na gaṇhāti, mayhaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:376_0: Atheko mahāthero “mahābodhimahācetiyāni vandissāmī”ti cetiyapabbatā āgantvā, vihāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:376_1: pavisanto mahāmaṇḍapaṭṭhāne bhikkhū guḷaṃ gaṇhante disvā pacchato āgacchantaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0304a0:376_2: āha, “natthi te guḷena attho”ti. “Āma, bhante, natthī”ti. Sāmaṇera mayaṃ maggakilantā,
atk-s0304a0:376_3: ekena kapiṭṭhaphalamattena piṇḍakena amhākaṃ atthoti. Sāmaṇero thālakaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0304a0:376_4: therassa vassaggapaṭipāṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ārāmiko gahaṇamānaṃ pūretvā ukkhipi, sāmaṇero
atk-s0304a0:376_5: aṅguliṃ cālesi. Tāta sāmaṇera, rājakulānaṃ dāne bhājanapūrameva pamāṇaṃ, thālakapūraṃ
atk-s0304a0:376_6: gaṇhāhīti. Āma, upāsaka, rājāno nāma mahajjhāsayā honti, amhākaṃ pana upajjhāyassa ettakeneva atthoti.
atk-s0304a0:377_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā, “kiṃ bho sāmaṇero bhaṇatī”ti? Tassa santikaṃ gato. Ārāmiko
atk-s0304a0:377_1: āha – “sāmi, sāmaṇerassa bhājanaṃ khuddakaṃ, bahuṃ na gaṇhātī”ti. Rājā āha, “ānītabhājanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:377_2: pūretvā gaṇhatha, bhante”ti. Mahārāja, rājāno nāma mahajjhāsayā honti, ukkhittabhājanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:377_3: pūretvāva dātukāmā, amhākaṃ pana upajjhāyassa ettakeneva atthoti. Rājā cintesi –
atk-s0304a0:377_4: “ayaṃ sattavassikadārako, ajjāpissa mukhato khīragandho na muccati, gahetvā kuṭe
atk-s0304a0:377_5: vā kuṭumbe vā pūretvā svepi punadivasepi khādissāmāti na vadati, sakkā buddhasāsanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:377_6: pariggahetu”nti purise āṇāpesi, “bho, pasannomhi sāmaṇerassa, itarānipi aḍḍhateyyāni
atk-s0304a0:378_0: Soyeva pana rājā ekadivasaṃ tittiramaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo cintesi – “sace ahaṃ aṅgārapakkaṃ
atk-s0304a0:378_1: tittiramaṃsaṃ khāditukāmosmīti aññassa kathessāmi, samantā yojanaṭṭhāne tittirasamugghātaṃ
atk-s0304a0:378_2: karissantī”ti uppannaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsento tīṇi saṃvaccharāni vītināmesi. Athassa
atk-s0304a0:378_3: kaṇṇesu pubbo saṇṭhāsi, so adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “atthi nu kho, bho, amhākaṃ koci
atk-s0304a0:378_4: upaṭṭhākupāsako sīlarakkhako”ti pucchi. Āma, deva, atthi, tisso nāma so akhaṇḍasīlaṃ
atk-s0304a0:378_5: rakkhatīti. Atha naṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo pakkosāpesi. So āgantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:378_6: Tato naṃ āha – “tvaṃ, tāta, tisso nāmā”ti? “Āma devā”ti. Tena hi gacchāti. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:378_7: gate ekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ āharāpetvā ekaṃ purisaṃ āṇāpesi, “gaccha tissaṃ vadāhi, imaṃ tīhi
atk-s0304a0:378_8: pākehi pacitvā amhākaṃ upaṭṭhāpehī”ti. So gantvā tathā avoca. So āha – “sace, bho,
atk-s0304a0:378_9: ayaṃ matako assa, yathā jānāmi, tathā pacitvā upaṭṭhaheyyaṃ. Pāṇātipātaṃ panāhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:378_10: na karomī”ti. So āgantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0304a0:379_0: Rājā puna “ekavāraṃ gacchā”ti pesesi. So gantvā, “bho, rājupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhāriyaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:379_1: mā evaṃ kari, punapi sīlaṃ sakkā samādātuṃ, paceta”nti āha. Atha naṃ tisso avoca,
atk-s0304a0:379_2: “bho, ekasmiṃ nāma attabhāve dhuvaṃ ekaṃ maraṇaṃ, nāhaṃ pāṇātipātaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:379_3: So punapi rañño ārocesi. Rājā tatiyampi pesetvā asampaṭicchantaṃ pakkosāpetvā attanā
atk-s0304a0:379_4: pucchi. Raññopi tatheva paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. Atha rājā purise āṇāpesi, “ayaṃ rañño
atk-s0304a0:379_5: āṇaṃ kopeti, gacchathetassa āghātanabhaṇḍikāyaṃ ṭhapetvā, sīsaṃ chindathā”ti. Raho
atk-s0304a0:379_6: ca pana nesaṃ saññamadāsi – “imaṃ santajjayamānā netvā sīsamassa āghātanabhaṇḍikāyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:380_0: Te taṃ āghātanabhaṇḍikāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā tamassa kukkuṭaṃ hatthesu ṭhapayiṃsu. So
atk-s0304a0:380_1: taṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā “ahaṃ, tāta, mama jīvitaṃ tuyhaṃ demi, tava jīvitaṃ ahaṃ gaṇhāmi,
atk-s0304a0:380_2: tvaṃ nibbhayo gacchā”ti vissajjesi. Kukkuṭo pakkhe papphoṭetvā ākāsena gantvā vaṭarukkhe
atk-s0304a0:380_3: nilīyi. Tassa kukkuṭassa abhayadinnaṭṭhānaṃ kukkuṭagiri nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:381_0: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā amaccaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā sabbābharaṇehi alaṅkaritvā āha
atk-s0304a0:381_1: – “tāta, mayā tvaṃ etadatthameva vīmaṃsito, mayhaṃ tittiramaṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa tīṇi
atk-s0304a0:381_2: saṃvaccharāni atikkantāni, sakkhissasi me tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ katvā upaṭṭhāpetu”nti.
atk-s0304a0:381_3: “Etaṃ nāma, deva, mayhaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā dvārantare ṭhito ekaṃ purisaṃ pātova
atk-s0304a0:381_4: tayo tittire gahetvā pavisantaṃ disvā, dve kahāpaṇe datvā tittire ādāya parisodhetvā,
atk-s0304a0:381_5: jīrakādīhi vāsetvā, aṅgāresu supakke pacitvā rañño upaṭṭhāpesi. Rājā mahātale sirīpallaṅke
atk-s0304a0:381_6: nisinnova ekaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ chinditvā mukhe pakkhipi, tāvadevassa sattarasaharaṇīsahassāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:382_0: Tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhusaṅghaṃ saritvā, “mādiso nāma pathavissaro rājā tittiramaṃsaṃ
atk-s0304a0:382_1: khāditukāmo tīṇi saṃvaccharāni na labhi, apaccamāno bhikkhusaṅgho kuto labhissatī”ti?
atk-s0304a0:382_2: Mukhe pakkhittakkhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ chaḍḍesi. Amaccaputto jaṇṇukehi patitvā mukhena
atk-s0304a0:382_3: gaṇhi. Rājā “apehi, tāta, jānāmahaṃ tava niddosabhāvaṃ, iminā nāma kāraṇena mayā
atk-s0304a0:382_4: etaṃ chaḍḍita”nti kathetvā, “sesakaṃ tatheva saṅgopetvā ṭhapehī”ti āha.
atk-s0304a0:383_0: Punadivase rājakulūpako thero piṇḍāya pāvisi. Amaccaputto taṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0304a0:383_1: rājagehaṃ pavesesi. Aññataro vuḍḍhapabbajitopi therassa pacchāsamaṇo viya hutvā anubandhanto
atk-s0304a0:383_2: pāvisi. Thero “raññā pakkosāpitabhikkhu bhavissatī”ti pamajji. Amaccaputtopi “therassa
atk-s0304a0:383_3: upaṭṭhāko bhavissatī”ti pamādaṃ āpajji. Tesaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ adaṃsu. Yāguyā pītāya
atk-s0304a0:383_4: rājā tittire upanesi. Thero ekaṃ gaṇhi, itaropi ekaṃ gaṇhi. Rājā “anubhāgo atthi,
atk-s0304a0:383_5: anāpucchitvā khādituṃ na yutta”nti mahātheraṃ āpucchi. Thero hatthaṃ pidahi, mahallakatthero
atk-s0304a0:383_6: sampaṭicchi. Rājā anattamano hutvā katabhattakiccaṃ theraṃ pattaṃ ādāya anugacchanto
atk-s0304a0:383_7: āha – “bhante, kulagehaṃ āgacchantehi uggahitavattaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:383_8: Thero tasmiṃ khaṇe aññāsi “na esa raññā pakkosāpito”ti.
atk-s0304a0:384_0: Punadivase upaṭṭhākasāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā pāvisi. Rājā tadāpi yāguyā pītāya tittire upanāmesi.
atk-s0304a0:384_1: Thero ekaṃ aggahesi, sāmaṇero aṅguliṃ cāletvā majjhe chindāpetvā ekakoṭṭhāsameva
atk-s0304a0:384_2: aggahesi. Rājā taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ mahātherassa upanāmesi. Mahāthero hatthaṃ pidahi, sāmaṇeropi
atk-s0304a0:384_3: pidahi. Rājā avidūre nisīditvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ chinditvā khādanto “uggahitavatte nissāya
atk-s0304a0:384_4: diyaḍḍhatittire khādituṃ labhimhā”ti āha. Tassa maṃse khāditamatteva kaṇṇehi pubbo
atk-s0304a0:384_5: nikkhami. Tato mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sāmaṇeraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “pasannosmi, tāta, aṭṭha
atk-s0304a0:384_6: te dhuvabhattāni demī”ti āha. Ahaṃ, mahārāja, upajjhāyassa dammīti. Aparāni aṭṭha
atk-s0304a0:384_7: demīti. Tāni amhākaṃ ācariyassa dammīti. Aparānipi aṭṭha demīti. Tāni samānupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:384_8: dammīti. Aparānipi aṭṭha demīti. Tāni bhikkhusaṅghassa dammīti. Aparānipi aṭṭha demīti.
atk-s0304a0:384_9: Sāmaṇero adhivāsesi. Evaṃ paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ jānanto anuppannañceva lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0304a0:384_10: uppannañca thāvaraṃ karoti. Idaṃ paṭiggahaṇapamāṇaṃ nāma. Tattha paribhogapamāṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:384_12: payojanattā paribhogapamāṇaṃyeva nāma, taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Teneva paṭisaṅkhā yonisotiādimāha,
atk-s0304a0:385_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogiseyyā, petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso
atk-s0304a0:385_1: seyyā. Tattha “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā.
atk-s0304a0:385_2: Tesañhi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0304a0:386: “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā uttānā sentī”ti ayaṃ petaseyyā. Petā hi appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva sayanti.
atk-s0304a0:387_0: “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena
atk-s0304a0:387_1: passena sayatī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā. Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ,
atk-s0304a0:387_2: pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:387_3: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati, divasampi
atk-s0304a0:387_4: sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrasanto pabujjhati, sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:387_5: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti. Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, “nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:387_6: jātiyā sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya
atk-s0304a0:387_7: pakkamati. Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti
atk-s0304a0:387_8: haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0304a0:388: Catutthajjhānaseyyā pana tathāgataseyyāti vuccati. Tāsu idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. Ayañhi tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma.
atk-s0304a0:389_0: Pāde pādanti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya, īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0304a0:389_1: Gopphakena hi gopphake, jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0304a0:389_2: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, seyyā aphāsukā hoti. Yathā pana na saṅghaṃṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma
atk-s0304a0:389_3: ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, seyyā phāsukā hoti. Tasmā evaṃ seyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0304a0:390_0: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato. Kathaṃ niddāyanto sato
atk-s0304a0:390_1: sampajāno hotīti? Satisampajaññassa appahānena. Ayañhi divasañceva sakalayāmañca
atk-s0304a0:390_2: āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā paṭhamayāmāvasāne caṅkamā oruyha pāde dhovantopi
atk-s0304a0:390_3: mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantova dhovati, taṃ avijahantova dvāraṃ vivarati, mañce nisīdati,
atk-s0304a0:390_4: avijahantova niddaṃ okkamati. Pabujjhanto pana mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati.
atk-s0304a0:390_5: Evaṃ niddaṃ okkamantopi sato sampajāno hoti. Evaṃ pana ñāṇadhātukanti na rocayiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:391_0: Vuttanayena panesa cittaṃ parisodhetvā paṭhamayāmāvasāne “upādinnakaṃ sarīraṃ niddāya
atk-s0304a0:391_1: samassāsessāmī”ti caṅkamā oruyha mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantova pāde dhovati, dvāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:391_2: vivarati, mañce pana nisīditvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya, “khandhāva khandhesu, dhātuyova
atk-s0304a0:391_3: dhātūsu paṭihaññantī”ti senāsanaṃ paccavekkhanto kamena niddaṃ okkamati, pabujjhanto
atk-s0304a0:391_4: pana mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati. Evaṃ niddaṃ okkamantopi sato sampajāno
atk-s0304a0:392_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tivaṅgikā pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā. Ettakeneva pana vosānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:392_1: anāpajjitvā tāneva indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhikkhu
atk-s0304a0:392_2: arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Evaṃ yāva arahattā desanā kathetabbā.
atk-s0304a0:394_0: 240. Tatiye kummoti aṭṭhikummo. Kacchapoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anunadītīreti nadiyā
atk-s0304a0:394_1: anutīre. Gocarapasutoti “sace kiñci phalāphalaṃ labhissāmi, khādissāmī”ti gocaratthāya
atk-s0304a0:394_2: pasuto ussukko tannibandho. Samodahitvāti samugge viya pakkhipitvā. Saṅkasāyatīti
atk-s0304a0:394_3: acchati. Samodahanti samodahanto ṭhapento. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā kummo aṅgāni
atk-s0304a0:394_4: sake kapāle samodahanto siṅgālassa otāraṃ na deti, na ca naṃ siṅgālo pasahati, evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:394_5: bhikkhu attano manovitakke sake ārammaṇakapāle samodahanto kilesamārassa otāraṃ na
atk-s0304a0:394_6: deti, na ca naṃ māro pasahati.
atk-s0304a0:395_0: Anissitoti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito. Aññamaheṭhayānoti aññaṃ kañci puggalaṃ
atk-s0304a0:395_1: aviheṭhento. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Nūpavadeyya kañcīti aññaṃ
atk-s0304a0:395_2: kañci puggalaṃ sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā attānaṃ ukkaṃsetukāmatāya vā paraṃ
atk-s0304a0:395_3: vambhetukāmatāya vā na upavadeyya, aññadatthu pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā,
atk-s0304a0:395_4: “kālena vakkhāmi, no akālena, bhūtena vakkhāmi, no abhūtena, saṇhena vakkhāmi, no
atk-s0304a0:395_5: pharusena, atthasaṃhitena vakkhāmi, no anatthasaṃhitena, mettacitto vakkhāmi, no
atk-s0304a0:397_0: 241. Catutthe addasāti gaṅgātīre paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno addasa. Vuyhamānanti
atk-s0304a0:397_1: caturassaṃ tacchetvā pabbatantare ṭhapitaṃ vātātapena suparisukkhaṃ pāvussake meghe
atk-s0304a0:397_2: vassante udakena uplavitvā anupubbena gaṅgāya nadiyā sote patitaṃ tena sotena vuyhamānaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:397_3: Bhikkhū āmantesīti “iminā dārukkhandhena sadisaṃ katvā mama sāsane saddhāpabbajitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:397_4: kulaputtaṃ dassessāmī”ti dhammaṃ desetukāmatāya āmantesi. Amuṃ mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:397_5: gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamānanti idaṃ pana aṭṭhadosavimuttattā sotapaṭipannassa
atk-s0304a0:397_6: dārukkhandhassa apare samuddapattiyā antarāyakare aṭṭha dose dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0304a0:398_0: Tatrassa evaṃ aṭṭhadosavimuttatā veditabbā – eko hi gaṅgāya nadiyā avidūre pabbatatale
atk-s0304a0:398_1: jāto nānāvallīhi paliveṭhito paṇḍupalāsataṃ āpajjitvā upacikādīhi khajjamāno tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0304a0:398_2: ṭhāne apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ dārukkhandho gaṅgaṃ otaritvā vaṅkaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0304a0:398_3: vilāsamāno sāgaraṃ patvā maṇivaṇṇe ūmipiṭṭhe sobhituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0304a0:399_0: Aparo gaṅgātīre bahimūlo antosākho hutvā jāto, ayaṃ kiñcāpi kālena kālaṃ olambinīhi
atk-s0304a0:399_1: sākhāhi udakaṃ phusati, bahimūlattā pana gaṅgaṃ otaritvā vaṅkaṭṭhānesu vilāsamāno
atk-s0304a0:399_2: sāgaraṃ patvā maṇivaṇṇe ūmipiṭṭhe sobhituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0304a0:400_0: Aparo majjhe gaṅgāya jāto, daḷhamūlena pana suppatiṭṭhito, bahi cassa gatā vaṅkasākhā
atk-s0304a0:400_1: nānāvallīhi ābaddhā, ayampi daḷhamūlattā bahiddhā vallīhi ābaddhattā ca gaṅgaṃ otaritvā…pe…
atk-s0304a0:401: Aparo patitaṭṭhāneyeva vālikāya otthaṭo pūtibhāvaṃ āpajjati, ayampi gaṅgaṃ otaritvā…pe… na labhati.
atk-s0304a0:402: Aparo dvinnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ antare jātattā, sunikhāto viya niccalo ṭhito, āgatāgataṃ udakaṃ dvidhā phāleti, ayaṃ pāsāṇantare suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitattā gaṅgaṃ otaritvā…pe… na labhati.
atk-s0304a0:403_0: Aparo abbhokāsaṭṭhāne nabhaṃ pūretvā vallīhi ābaddho ṭhito. Ekaṃ dve saṃvacchare
atk-s0304a0:403_1: atikkamitvā āgate mahoghe sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā temeti, ayampi nabhaṃ pūretvā ṭhitatāya
atk-s0304a0:403_2: ceva ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā saṃvaccharānaṃ accayena sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā temanatāya
atk-s0304a0:404_0: Aparopi majjhe gaṅgāya dīpake jāto mudukkhandhasākho oghe āgate anusotaṃ nipajjitvā,
atk-s0304a0:404_1: udake gate sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā, naccanto viya tiṭṭhati. Yassatthāya sāgaro gaṅgaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:404_2: viya vadati, “bhoti gaṅge tvaṃ mayhaṃ candanasārasalaḷasārādīni nānādārūni āharasi,
atk-s0304a0:404_3: dārukkhandhaṃ pana nāharasī”ti. Sulabho esa, deva, punavāre jānissāmīti. Punavāre
atk-s0304a0:404_4: tambavaṇṇena udakena āliṅgamānā viya āgacchati. Sopi tatheva anusotaṃ nipajjitvā,
atk-s0304a0:404_5: udake gate sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā, naccanto viya tiṭṭhati. Ayaṃ attano mudutāya gaṅgaṃ
atk-s0304a0:405_0: Aparo gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṃ patito vālikāya ottharito antarasetu viya bahūnaṃ paccayo
atk-s0304a0:405_1: jāto, ubhosu tīresu veḷunaḷakarañjakakudhādayo uplavitvā tattheva lagganti. Tathā
atk-s0304a0:405_3: tattheva lagganti. Mahāgaṅgāpi naṃ āsajja bhijjitvā dvidhā gacchati, macchakacchapakumbhīlamakarādayopi
atk-s0304a0:405_4: tattheva vāsaṃ kappenti. Ayampi tiriyaṃ patitvā mahājanassa paccayattakatabhāvena
atk-s0304a0:405_5: gaṅgaṃ otaritvā vaṅkaṭṭhānesu vilāsamāno sāgaraṃ patvā maṇivaṇṇe ūmipiṭṭhe sobhituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0304a0:406_0: Iti bhagavā imehi aṭṭhahi dosehi vimuttattā sotapaṭipannassa dārukkhandhassa apare
atk-s0304a0:406_1: samuddapattiyā antarāyakare aṭṭha dose dassetuṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya
atk-s0304a0:406_2: nadiyā sotena vuyhamānantiādimāha. Tattha na thale ussīdissatīti thalaṃ nābhiruhissati.
atk-s0304a0:406_3: Na manussaggāho gahessatīti “mahā vatāyaṃ dārukkhandho”ti disvā, uḷumpena taramānā
atk-s0304a0:406_4: gantvā, gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya manussā na gaṇhissanti. Na amanussaggāho gahessatīti
atk-s0304a0:406_5: “mahaggho ayaṃ candanasāro, vimānadvāre naṃ ṭhapessāmā”ti maññamānā na amanussā gaṇhissanti.
atk-s0304a0:407_0: Evameva khoti ettha saddhiṃ bāhirehi aṭṭhahi dosehi evaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:407_1: – gaṅgāya avidūre pabbatatale jāto tattheva upacikādīhi khajjamāno apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:407_2: gatadārukkhandho viya hi “natthi dinna”ntiādikāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato puggalo
atk-s0304a0:407_3: veditabbo. Ayañhi sāsanassa dūrībhūtattā ariyamaggaṃ oruyha samādhikulle nisinno
atk-s0304a0:408_0: Gaṅgātīre bahimūlo antosākho hutvā jāto viya acchinnagihibandhano samaṇakuṭimbikapuggalo
atk-s0304a0:408_1: daṭṭhabbo. Ayañhi “cittaṃ nāmetaṃ anibaddhaṃ, ‘samaṇomhī’ti vadantova gihī hoti,
atk-s0304a0:408_2: ‘gihīmhī’ti vadantova samaṇo hoti. Ko jānissati, kiṃ bhavissatī”ti? Mahallakakāle
atk-s0304a0:408_3: pabbajantopi gihibandhanaṃ na vissajjeti. Mahallakapabbajitānañca sampatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0304a0:408_4: Tassa sace cīvaraṃ pāpuṇāti, antacchinnakaṃ vā jiṇṇadubbaṇṇaṃ vā pāpuṇāti. Senāsanampi
atk-s0304a0:408_5: vihārapaccante paṇṇasālā vā maṇḍapo vā pāpuṇāti. Piṇḍāya carantenāpi puttanattakānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:408_6: dārakānaṃ pacchato caritabbaṃ hoti, pariyante nisīditabbaṃ hoti. Tena so dukkhī dummano
atk-s0304a0:408_7: assūni muñcanto, “atthi me kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ, kappati nu kho taṃ khādantena jīvitu”nti
atk-s0304a0:408_8: cintetvā ekaṃ vinayadharaṃ pucchati – “kiṃ, bhante ācariya, attano santakaṃ vicāretvā
atk-s0304a0:408_9: khādituṃ kappati, no kappatī”ti? “Natthettha doso, kappateta”nti. So attano bhajamānake
atk-s0304a0:408_10: katipaye dubbace durācāre bhikkhū gahetvā, sāyanhasamaye antogāmaṃ gantvā, gāmamajjhe
atk-s0304a0:408_11: ṭhito gāmike pakkosāpetvā, “amhākaṃ payogato uṭṭhitaṃ āyaṃ kassa dethā”ti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0304a0:408_12: tumhe pabbajitā, mayaṃ kassa dassāmāti? Kiṃ pabbajitānaṃ attano santakaṃ na vaṭṭatīti?
atk-s0304a0:408_13: Kuddāla-piṭakaṃ gahetvā, khettamariyādabandhanādīni karonto nānāppakāraṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇañceva
atk-s0304a0:408_14: phalāphale ca saṅgaṇhitvā, hemantagimhavassānesu yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ pacāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:408_15: khādanto samaṇakuṭumbiko hutvā jīvati. Kevalamassa pañcacūḷakena dārakena saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:408_16: pādaparicārikāva ekā natthi. Ayaṃ puggalo kiñcāpi olambinīhi sākhāhi udakaṃ phusamāno
atk-s0304a0:408_17: antosākho rukkho viya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇādīsu bhikkhūnaṃ kāyasāmaggiṃ deti, gihibandhanassa
atk-s0304a0:408_18: pana acchinnatāya bahimūlattā ariyamaggaṃ otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:409_0: Gaṅgāya majjhe jāto bahiddhā vallīhi ābaddhavaṅkasākhā viya saṅghasantakaṃ nissāya
atk-s0304a0:409_1: jīvamāno bhinnājīvapuggalo daṭṭhabbo. Ekacco gihibandhanaṃ pahāya pabbajantopi sāruppaṭṭhāne
atk-s0304a0:409_2: pabbajjaṃ na labhati. Pabbajjā hi nāmesā paṭisandhiggahaṇasadisā. Yathā manussā yattha
atk-s0304a0:409_3: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti, tesaṃyeva kulānaṃ ācāraṃ sikkhanti, evaṃ bhikkhūpi yesaṃ santike
atk-s0304a0:409_4: pabbajanti, tesaṃyeva ācāraṃ gaṇhanti. Tasmā ekacco asāruppaṭṭhāne pabbajitvā ovādānusāsanīuddesaparipucchādīhi
atk-s0304a0:409_5: paribāhiro hutvā pātova muṇḍaghaṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchati, ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:409_6: bhattatthāya khandhe pattaṃ katvā bhattasālaṃ gacchati, dubbacasāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:410_0: So daharabhikkhukāle attano anurūpehi daharabhikkhūhi ceva ārāmikehi ca saddhiṃ saṅghabhogaṃ
atk-s0304a0:410_1: gantvā, “ayaṃ khīṇāsavehi asukarañño santikā paṭiggahitasaṅghabhogo, tumhe saṅghassa
atk-s0304a0:410_2: idañcidañca na detha, na hi tumhākaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rājā vā rājamahāmattā vā attamanā
atk-s0304a0:410_3: bhavissanti, etha dāni idañcidañca karothā”ti kuddāla-piṭakāni gāhāpetvā heṭṭhā taḷākamātikāsu
atk-s0304a0:410_4: kattabbakiccāni kārāpetvā bahuṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ vihāraṃ pavesetvā ārāmikehi attano
atk-s0304a0:410_5: upakārabhāvaṃ saṅghassa ārocāpeti. Saṅgho “ayaṃ daharo bahūpakāro, imassa sataṃ vā
atk-s0304a0:410_6: dvisataṃ vā dethā”ti dāpeti. Iti so ito cito ca saṅghasantakeneva vaḍḍhanto bahiddhā
atk-s0304a0:410_7: ekavīsatividhāhi anesanāhi baddho ariyamaggaṃ otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:411_0: Patitaṭṭhāneyeva vālikāya ottharitvā pūtibhāvaṃ āpāditarukkho viya ālasiyamahagghaso
atk-s0304a0:411_1: veditabbo. Evarūpañhi puggalaṃ āmisacakkhuṃ paccayalolaṃ vissaṭṭhaācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:411_2: uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāravajjitaṃ sandhāya pañca nīvaraṇāni atthato evaṃ vadanti
atk-s0304a0:411_3: – “bho, kassa santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti? Atha thinamiddhaṃ uṭṭhāya evamāha – “kiṃ na passatha?
atk-s0304a0:411_4: Eso asukavihāravāsī kusītapuggalo asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā yāgumatthake yāguṃ, pūvamatthake
atk-s0304a0:411_5: pūvaṃ, bhattamatthake bhattaṃ ajjhoharitvā vihāraṃ āgamma vissaṭṭhasabbavatto uddesādivirahito
atk-s0304a0:412_0: Tato kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ uṭṭhāyāha – “bho, tava okāse kate mayhaṃ katova hoti, idāneva
atk-s0304a0:412_1: so niddāyitvā kilesānurañjitova pabujjhitvā kāmavitakkaṃ vitakkessatī”ti. Tato byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:412_2: uṭṭhāyāha – “tumhākaṃ okāse kate mayhaṃ katova hoti. Idāneva niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito
atk-s0304a0:412_3: ‘vattapaṭivattaṃ karohī’ti vuccamāno, ‘bho, ime attano kammaṃ akatvā amhesu byāvaṭā’ti
atk-s0304a0:412_4: nānappakāraṃ pharusavacanaṃ vadanto akkhīni nīharitvā vicarissatī”ti. Tato uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:412_5: uṭṭhāyāha – “tumhākaṃ okāse kate mayhaṃ katova hoti, kusīto nāma vātāhato aggikkhandho
atk-s0304a0:412_6: viya uddhato hotī”ti. Atha kukuccanīvaraṇaṃ uṭṭhāyāha – “tumhākaṃ okāse kate mayhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:412_7: katova hoti, kusīto nāma kukkuccapakatova hoti, akappiye kappiyasaññaṃ kappiye ca
atk-s0304a0:412_8: akappiyasaññaṃ uppādetī”ti. Atha vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ uṭṭhāyāha – “tumhākaṃ okāse
atk-s0304a0:412_9: kate mayhaṃ katova hoti. Evarūpo hi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mahāvicikicchaṃ uppādesī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:412_10: Evaṃ ālasiyamahagghasaṃ pañca nīvaraṇāni caṇḍasunakhādayo viya siṅgacchinnaṃ jaraggavaṃ
atk-s0304a0:412_11: ajjhottharitvā gaṇhanti. Sopi ariyamaggasotaṃ otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:413_0: Dvinnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ antare nikhātamūlākārena ṭhitarukkho viya diṭṭhiṃ uppādetvā ṭhito
atk-s0304a0:413_1: diṭṭhigatiko veditabbo. So hi “arūpabhave rūpaṃ atthi, asaññībhave cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0304a0:413_2: bahucittakkhaṇiko lokuttaramaggo, anusayo cittavippayutto, te ca sattā sandhāvanti
atk-s0304a0:413_3: saṃsarantī”ti vadanto ariṭṭho viya kaṇṭakasāmaṇero viya ca vicarati. Pisuṇavāco pana
atk-s0304a0:413_4: hoti, upajjhāyādayo saddhivihārikādīhi bhindanto vicarati. Sopi ariyamaggasotaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0304a0:413_5: samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0304a0:414_0: Abbhokāse nabhaṃ pūretvā vallīhi ābaddho ṭhito ekaṃ dve saṃvacchare atikkamitvā āgate
atk-s0304a0:414_1: mahoghe sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā temanarukkho viya mahallakakāle pabbajitvā paccante
atk-s0304a0:414_2: vasamāno dullabhasaṅghadassano ceva dullabhadhammassavano ca puggalo veditabbo. Ekacco
atk-s0304a0:414_3: hi vuḍḍhakāle pabbajito katipāhena upasampadaṃ labhitvā pañcavassakāle pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:414_4: paguṇaṃ katvā dasavassakāle vinayadharattherassa santike vinayakathākāle maricaṃ
atk-s0304a0:414_5: vā harītakakhaṇḍaṃ vā mukhe ṭhapetvā bījanena mukhaṃ pidhāya niddāyanto nisīditvā
atk-s0304a0:414_6: lesakappena katavinayo nāma hutvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya paccantaṃ gacchati. Tatra naṃ
atk-s0304a0:414_7: manussā sakkaritvā bhikkhudassanassa dullabhatāya “idheva, bhante, vasathā”ti vihāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:415_0: Atha mahāvihārasadisavihārā bahussutā bhikkhū, “janapade cīvararajanādīni katvā āgamissāmā”ti
atk-s0304a0:415_1: tattha gacchanti. So te disvā, haṭṭhatuṭṭho vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā, punadivase ādāya
atk-s0304a0:415_2: bhikkhācāragāmaṃ pavisitvā, “asuko thero suttantiko, asuko abhidhammiko, asuko vinayadharo,
atk-s0304a0:415_3: asuko tepiṭako, evarūpe there kadā labhissatha, dhammasavanaṃ kārethā”ti vadati.
atk-s0304a0:415_4: Upāsakā “dhammassavanaṃ kāressāmā”ti vihāramaggaṃ sodhetvā, sappitelādīni ādāya,
atk-s0304a0:415_5: mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, dhammassavanaṃ kāressāma, dhammakathikānaṃ vicārethā”ti
atk-s0304a0:416_0: Nevāsikatthero āgantukānaṃ pattacīvarāni paṭisāmento antogabbheyeva divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0304a0:416_1: vītināmeti. Divākathiko uṭṭhito sarabhāṇako ghaṭena udakaṃ vamento viya sarabhāṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:416_2: bhaṇitvā uṭṭhito, tampi so na jānāti. Rattikathiko sāgaraṃ khobhento viya rattiṃ
atk-s0304a0:416_3: kathetvā uṭṭhito, tampi so na jānāti. Paccūsakathiko kathetvā uṭṭhāsi, tampi so na
atk-s0304a0:416_4: jānāti. Pātova pana uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ dhovitvā, therānaṃ pattacīvarāni upanāmetvā, bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:416_5: upagacchanto mahātheraṃ āha – “bhante, divākathiko kataraṃ jātakaṃ nāma kathesi,
atk-s0304a0:416_6: sarabhāṇako kataraṃ suttaṃ nāma bhaṇi, rattikathiko kataraṃ dhammakathaṃ nāma kathesi,
atk-s0304a0:416_7: paccūsakathiko kataraṃ jātakaṃ nāma kathesi, khandhā nāma kati, dhātuyo nāma kati,
atk-s0304a0:416_8: āyatanā nāma katī”ti. Evarūpo ekaṃ dve saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā bhikkhudassanañceva
atk-s0304a0:416_9: dhammassavanañca labhantopi oghe āgate udakena sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā temitarukkhasadiso
atk-s0304a0:416_10: hoti. So evaṃ saṅghadassanato ca dhammassavanato ca paṭikkamma dūre vasanto ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0304a0:416_11: otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0304a0:417_0: Majjhe gaṅgāya dīpake jāto mudurukkho viya madhurassarabhāṇakapuggalo veditabbo.
atk-s0304a0:417_1: So hi abhiññātāni abhiññātāni vessantarādīni jātakāni uggaṇhitvā, dullabhabhikkhudassanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:417_2: paccantaṃ gantvā, tattha dhammakathāya pasāditahadayena janena upaṭṭhiyamāno attānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:417_3: uddissa kate sampannapupphaphalarukkhe nandanavanābhirāme vihāre vasati. Athassa
atk-s0304a0:417_4: bhārahārabhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā, “asuko kira evaṃ upaṭṭhākesu paṭibaddhacitto
atk-s0304a0:417_5: viharati. Paṇḍito bhikkhu paṭibalo buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikātuṃ,
atk-s0304a0:417_6: ānetvā tena saddhiṃ asukattherassa santike dhammaṃ uggaṇhissāma, asukattherassa santike
atk-s0304a0:418_0: So tesaṃ vattaṃ katvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vihāracārikaṃ nikkhantehi tehi “imaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0304a0:418_1: cetiyaṃ tayā kārita”nti puṭṭho, “āma, bhante”ti vadati. “Ayaṃ bodhi, ayaṃ maṇḍapo,
atk-s0304a0:418_2: idaṃ uposathāgāraṃ, esā aggisālā, ayaṃ caṅkamo tayā kārito. Ime rukkhe ropāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:418_3: tayā nandanavanābhirāmo vihāro kārito”ti. “Āma, bhante”ti, vadati.
atk-s0304a0:419_0: So sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā pucchati – “kasmā, bhante, āgatatthā”ti?
atk-s0304a0:419_1: “Āvuso, taṃ ādāya gantvā, asukattherassa santike dhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā, asukattherassa
atk-s0304a0:419_2: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ, asukasmiṃ nāma araññe samaggā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmāti iminā
atk-s0304a0:419_3: kāraṇena āgatamhā”ti. Sādhu, bhante, tumhe nāma mayhaṃ atthāya āgatā, ahampi ciranivāsena
atk-s0304a0:419_4: idha ukkaṇṭhito gacchāmi, pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhāmi, bhanteti. Āvuso, sāmaṇeradaharā maggakilantā,
atk-s0304a0:419_5: ajja vasitvā sve pacchābhattaṃ gamissāmāti. Sādhu, bhanteti punadivase tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:419_6: piṇḍāya pavisati. Gāmavāsino “amhākaṃ ayyo bahū āgantuke bhikkhū gahetvā āgato”ti
atk-s0304a0:419_7: āsanāni paññāpetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā sukhanisinnakathaṃ sutvā bhattaṃ adaṃsu. Therā “tvaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:419_8: āvuso, anumodanaṃ katvā nikkhama, mayaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne bhattakiccaṃ karissāmā”ti nikkhantā.
atk-s0304a0:420_0: Gāmavāsino anumodanaṃ sutvā pucchiṃsu, “kuto, bhante, therā āgatā”ti? Ete amhākaṃ
atk-s0304a0:420_1: ācariyupajjhāyā samānupajjhāyā sandiṭṭhā sambhattāti. Kasmā āgatāti? Maṃ gahetvā
atk-s0304a0:420_2: gantukāmatāyāti. Tumhe pana gantukāmāti? Āmāvusoti. Kiṃ vadetha, bhante, amhehi kassa
atk-s0304a0:420_3: uposathāgāraṃ kāritaṃ, kassa bhojanasālā, kassa aggisālādayo kāritā, mayaṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalesu
atk-s0304a0:420_4: kassa santikaṃ gamissāmāti? Mahāupāsikāyopi tattheva nisīditvā assūni pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:420_5: Daharo “tumhesu evaṃ dukkhitesu ahaṃ gantvā kiṃ karissāmi? There uyyojessāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0304a0:421_0: Therāpi katabhattakiccā pattacīvarāni gahetvā nisinnā taṃ disvāva, “kiṃ, āvuso, cirāyasi,
atk-s0304a0:421_1: divā hoti, gacchāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Āma, bhante, tumhe sukhitā, asukagehassa iṭṭhakāmūlaṃ
atk-s0304a0:421_2: ṭhitasaṇṭhāneneva ṭhitaṃ, asukagehādīnaṃ cittakammamūlādīni atthi, gatassāpi me cittavikkhepo
atk-s0304a0:421_3: bhavissati, tumhe purato gantvā asukavihāre cīvaradhovanarajanādīni karotha, ahaṃ
atk-s0304a0:421_4: tattha sampāpuṇissāmīti. Te tassa osakkitukāmataṃ ñatvā tvaṃ pacchā āgaccheyyāsīti pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:422_0: So there anugantvā nivatto vihārameva āgantvā bhojanasālādīni olokento vihāraṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:422_1: disvā cintesi – “sādhu vatamhi na gato. Sace agamissaṃ, koci, deva, dhammakathiko
atk-s0304a0:422_2: āgantvā, sabbesaṃ manaṃ bhinditvā, vihāraṃ attano nikāyasantakaṃ kareyya, atha mayā
atk-s0304a0:422_3: pacchā āgantvā etassa pacchato laddhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantena caritabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:423_0: So aparena samayena suṇāti, “te kira bhikkhū gataṭṭhāne ekanikāyadvenikāyaekapiṭakadvepiṭakādivasena
atk-s0304a0:423_1: buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā aṭṭhakathācariyā jātā vinayadharā jātā sataparivārāpi sahassaparivārāpi
atk-s0304a0:423_2: caranti. Ye panettha samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ gatā, te ghaṭentā vāyamantā sotāpannā jātā,
atk-s0304a0:423_3: sakadāgāmino anāgāmino arahanto jātā, mahāsakkārena parinibbutā”ti. So cintesi –
atk-s0304a0:423_4: “sace ahampi agamissaṃ, mayhampesā sampatti abhavissa, imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ muñcituṃ
atk-s0304a0:423_5: asakkonto ativiya parihīnamhī”ti. Ayaṃ puggalo attano mudutāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ amuñcanto
atk-s0304a0:423_6: ariyamaggaṃ otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0304a0:424_0: Gaṅgāya nadiyā tiriyaṃ patitvā, vālikāya otthaṭabhāvena antarasetu viya hutvā, bahūnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:424_2: paṭipadaṃ uggahetvā ṭhito olīnavuttiko puggalo veditabbo. So hi taṃ paṭipattinissitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:424_3: dhammaṃ uggahetvā pakatiyā mañjussaro cittalapabbatādisadisaṃ mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0304a0:424_4: cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni karoti. Atha naṃ dhammassavanaggaṃ pattaṃ āgantukā daharā “dhammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:424_5: kathehī”ti vadanti. So sammā uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ paṭipadaṃ dīpetvā katheti. Athassa
atk-s0304a0:424_6: paṃsukūlikapiṇḍapātikādayo sabbe theranavamajjhimā bhikkhū “aho sappuriso”ti attamanā bhavanti.
atk-s0304a0:425_0: So kassaci nidānamattaṃ, kassaci upaḍḍhagāthaṃ, kassaci gāthaṃ upaṭṭhāpento ayapaṭṭakena
atk-s0304a0:425_1: ābandhanto viya daharasāmaṇere saṅgaṇhitvā mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:425_2: porāṇakavihāro atthi, ettha koci tatruppādo”ti?, Pucchati. Therā – “kiṃ vadesi, āvuso,
atk-s0304a0:425_3: catuvīsati karīsasahassāni tatruppādo”ti. Bhante, tumhe evaṃ vadetha, uddhane pana
atk-s0304a0:425_4: aggipi na jalatīti. Āvuso, mahāvihāravāsīhi laddhā nāma evameva nassanti, na koci
atk-s0304a0:425_5: saṇṭhapetīti. Bhante, porāṇakarājūhi dinnaṃ khīṇāsavehi paṭiggahitaṃ kasmā ete nāsentīti?
atk-s0304a0:425_6: Āvuso, tādisena dhammakathikena sakkā bhaveyya laddhunti. Bhante, mā evaṃ vadetha,
atk-s0304a0:425_7: amhe paṭipattidīpakadhammakathikā nāma, tumhe maṃ “saṅghakuṭumbiko vihārupaṭṭhāko”ti
atk-s0304a0:425_8: maññamānā kātukāmāti. Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, akappiyametaṃ, tumhādisehi pana kathite
atk-s0304a0:425_9: amhākaṃ uppajjeyyāti? Tena hi, bhante, ārāmikesu āgatesu amhākaṃ bhāraṃ karotha,
atk-s0304a0:426_0: So pātova gantvā, sannipātasālāyaṃ ṭhatvā, ārāmikesu āgatesu “upāsakā asukakhette
atk-s0304a0:426_1: bhāgo kuhiṃ, asukakhette kahāpaṇaṃ kuhi”ntiādīni vatvā, aññassa khettaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0304a0:426_2: aññassa deti. Evaṃ anukkamena taṃ taṃ paṭisedhento tassa tassa dento tathā akāsi,
atk-s0304a0:426_3: yathā yāguhatthā pūvahatthā bhattahatthā telamadhuphāṇitaghatādihatthā ca attanova
atk-s0304a0:426_4: santikaṃ āgacchanti. Sakalavihāro ekakolāhalo hoti, pesalā bhikkhū nibbijja apakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:427_0: Sopi ācariyupajjhāyehi vissaṭṭhakānaṃ bahūnaṃ dubbacapuggalānaṃ upajjhaṃ dento vihāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:427_1: pūreti. Āgantukā bhikkhū vihāradvāre ṭhatvāva “vihāre ke vasantī”ti, pucchitvā, “evarūpā
atk-s0304a0:427_2: nāma bhikkhū”ti sutvā bāhireneva pakkamanti. Ayaṃ puggalo sāsane tiriyaṃ nipannatāya
atk-s0304a0:427_3: mahājanassa paccayabhāvaṃ upagato ariyamaggaṃ otaritvā samādhikulle nisinno nibbānasāgaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:428_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti “nibbānapabbhārā”ti padena osāpitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ñatvā anusandhikusalatāya
atk-s0304a0:428_1: etaṃ “kiṃ nu kho, bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tathāgatopi hi imissaṃ parisati nisinno
atk-s0304a0:428_2: “anusandhikusalo bhikkhu atthi, so maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti tasseva okāsakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0304a0:429_0: Idāni orimaṃ tīrantiādinā nayena vuttesu ajjhattikāyatanādīsu evaṃ upagamanānupagamanādīni
atk-s0304a0:429_1: veditabbāni. “Mayhaṃ cakkhu-pasannaṃ, ahaṃ appamattakampi rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0304a0:429_2: sakkomī”ti etaṃ nissāya cakkhuṃ assādentopi timirakavātādīhi upahatapasādo “amanāpaṃ
atk-s0304a0:429_3: mayhaṃ cakkhu, mahantampi rūpārammaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ na sakkomī”ti domanassaṃ āpajjantopi
atk-s0304a0:429_4: cakkhāyatanaṃ upagacchati nāma. Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena
atk-s0304a0:429_5: vipassanto pana na upagacchati nāma. Sotādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0304a0:430_0: Manāyatane pana “manāpaṃ vata me mano, kiñci vāmato aggahetvā sabbaṃ dakkhiṇatova
atk-s0304a0:430_1: gaṇhātī”ti vā “manena me cintitacintitassa alābho nāma natthī”ti vā evaṃ assādentopi,
atk-s0304a0:430_2: “ducintitacintitassa me mano appadakkhiṇaggāhī”ti evaṃ domanassaṃ uppādentopi manāyatanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:430_3: upagacchati nāma. Iṭṭhe pana rūpe rāgaṃ, aniṭṭhe paṭighaṃ uppādento rūpāyatanaṃ upagacchati
atk-s0304a0:431_0: Nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi majjhe saṃsīditvā thalaṃ pattaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:431_1: saṇhathūlavālikā pidahati, so puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ nandīrāgena
atk-s0304a0:431_2: ābaddho puggalo catūsu mahāapāyesu patito mahādukkhena pidhīyati, so anekehipi vassasahassehi
atk-s0304a0:431_3: puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkoti. Tena vuttaṃ “nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
atk-s0304a0:432_0: Asmimānassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi thale āruḷho dārukkhandho heṭṭhā gaṅgodakena
atk-s0304a0:432_1: ceva upari vassena ca temento anukkamena sevālapariyonaddho “pāsāṇo nu kho esa khāṇuko”ti
atk-s0304a0:432_2: vattabbataṃ āpajjati, evameva asmimānena unnato puggalo paṃsukūlikaṭṭhāne paṃsukūliko
atk-s0304a0:432_3: hoti, dhammakathikaṭṭhāne dhammakathiko, bhaṇḍanakārakaṭṭhāne bhaṇḍanakārako, vejjaṭṭhāne
atk-s0304a0:432_4: vejjo, pisuṇaṭṭhāne pisuṇo. So nānappakāraṃ anesanaṃ āpajjanto tāhi tāhi āpattīhi
atk-s0304a0:432_5: paliveṭhito “atthi nu kho assa abbhantare kiñci sīlaṃ, udāhu natthī”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0304a0:433_0: Pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi āvaṭṭe patitadārukhandho antoyeva
atk-s0304a0:433_1: pāsāṇādīsu āhatasamabbhāhato bhijjitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe
atk-s0304a0:433_2: patitapuggalo catūsu apāyesu kammakāraṇakhuppipāsādidukkhehi āhatasamabbhāhato dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0304a0:433_3: cuṇṇavicuṇṇataṃ āpajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacana”nti.
atk-s0304a0:434_0: Dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Asucīti na suci. Saṅkassarasamācāroti
atk-s0304a0:434_1: “imassa maññe imassa maññe idaṃ kamma”nti evaṃ parehi saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
atk-s0304a0:434_2: Saṅkāya vā paresaṃ samācāraṃ saratītipi saṅkassarasamācāro. Tassa hi dve tayo jane
atk-s0304a0:434_3: kathente disvā, “mama dosaṃ maññe kathentī”ti tesaṃ samācāraṃ saṅkassarati dhāvatīti saṅkassarasamācāro.
atk-s0304a0:435_0: Samaṇapaṭiññoti salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā vihāre samaṇā”ti gaṇanāya āraddhāya “ahampi
atk-s0304a0:435_1: samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo”ti paṭiññaṃ deti, salākaggahaṇādīni karoti. Brahmacāripaṭiññoti
atk-s0304a0:435_2: uposathapavāraṇādīsu “ahampi brahmacārī”ti paṭiññāya tāni kammāni pavisati. Antopūtīti
atk-s0304a0:435_3: vakkahadayādīsu apūtikassapi guṇānaṃ pūtibhāvena, antopūti. Avassutoti rāgena tinto.
atk-s0304a0:436_0: Etadavocāti gogaṇaṃ gaṅgātīrābhimukhaṃ katvā parisapariyante ṭhito ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0304a0:436_1: yāva pariyosānā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā, “satthā orimatīrādīnaṃ anupagacchantādivasena
atk-s0304a0:436_2: sakkā paṭipattiṃ pūretunti vadati. Yadi evaṃ pūretuṃ sakkā, ahaṃ pabbajitvā pūressāmī”ti
atk-s0304a0:437_0: Vacchagiddhiniyoti vacchesu sasnehā thanehi khīraṃ paggharantehi vacchakasnehena
atk-s0304a0:437_1: sayameva gamissantīti. Niyyātehevāti niyyātehiyeva. Gāvīsu hi aniyyātitāsu gosāmikā
atk-s0304a0:437_2: āgantvā, “ekā gāvī na dissati, eko goṇo, eko vacchako na dissatī”ti tuyhaṃ piṭṭhito
atk-s0304a0:437_3: piṭṭhito vicarissanti, iti te aphāsukaṃ bhavissati. Pabbajjā ca nāmesā saiṇassa na
atk-s0304a0:437_4: ruhati, aṇaṇā pabbajjā ca buddhādīhi saṃvaṇṇitāti dassanatthaṃ evamāha. Niyyātāti
atk-s0304a0:439_0: 242. Pañcame kimilāyanti kimilānāmake nagare. Saṃkiliṭṭhanti paṭicchannakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0304a0:439_1: asaṃkiliṭṭhā nāma āpatti natthi, evarūpaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ. Na vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatīti
atk-s0304a0:441_0: 243. Chaṭṭhe navaṃ santhāgāranti adhunā kāritaṃ santhāgāraṃ, ekā mahāsālāti attho.
atk-s0304a0:441_1: Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā, “ettakā purato gacchantu, ettakā pacchā,
atk-s0304a0:441_2: ettakā ubhohi passehi, ettakā hatthī abhiruhantu, ettakā asse, ettakā rathesu tiṭṭhantū”ti
atk-s0304a0:441_3: evaṃ santhaṃ karonti, mariyādaṃ bandhanti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ santhāgāranti vuccati.
atk-s0304a0:441_4: Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehesu allagomayaparibhaṇḍādīni kārenti, tāva dve
atk-s0304a0:441_5: tīṇi divasāni te rājāno tattha santharantītipi santhāgāraṃ. Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:441_6: agārantipi santhāgāraṃ. Gaṇarājāno hi te, tasmā uppannaṃ kiccaṃ ekassa vasena na
atk-s0304a0:441_7: chijjati, sabbesaṃ chandopi laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā sabbe tattha sannipatitvā anusāsanti.
atk-s0304a0:441_8: Tena vuttaṃ “saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāra”nti. Yasmā pana te tattha
atk-s0304a0:441_9: sannipatitvā, “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”nti evamādinā nayena
atk-s0304a0:441_10: gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti, tasmā chiddāvachiddaṃ gharāvāsaṃ tattha santharantītipi,
atk-s0304a0:441_12: devavimānaṃ viya adhunā niṭṭhāpitaṃ. Samaṇena vāti ettha yasmā gharavatthupariggahaṇakāleyeva
atk-s0304a0:441_13: devatā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhanti, tasmā “devena vā”ti avatvā, “samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena
atk-s0304a0:442_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti santhāgāraṃ niṭṭhitanti sutvā “gacchāma naṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0304a0:442_1: gantvā dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ santhāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ
atk-s0304a0:442_2: sassirikaṃ. Kena paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti
atk-s0304a0:442_3: cintetvā – “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhassa paṭhamaṃ diyyamānepi satthunova anucchavikaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyavasena
atk-s0304a0:442_4: diyyamānepi satthunova anucchavikaṃ, tasmā satthāraṃ paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma,
atk-s0304a0:442_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca āgamanaṃ karissāma, bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:442_6: āgatameva bhavissati, satthāraṃ tiyāmarattiṃ amhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathāpessāma, iti
atk-s0304a0:442_7: tīhi ratanehi paribhuttaṃ pacchā mayaṃ paribhuñjissāma, evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0304a0:443_0: Yena navaṃ santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti taṃdivasaṃ kira santhāgāraṃ kiñcāpi rājakulānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:443_1: dassanatthāya devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ hoti supaṭijaggitaṃ, buddhārahaṃ pana katvā
atk-s0304a0:443_2: apaññattaṃ. Buddhā hi nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vaseyyuṃ vā no vā,
atk-s0304a0:443_3: tasmā “bhagavato manaṃ jānitvāva, paññāpessāmā”ti cintetvā, te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
