atk-s0304a0:443_4: idāni pana manaṃ labhitvā paññāpetukāmā yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:444_0: Sabbasanthariṃ santhāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0304a0:444_1: santharāpetvā. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vaṭṭatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi
atk-s0304a0:444_2: bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñjāpetvā, parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā, yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ
atk-s0304a0:444_3: paññāyati, evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpāpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā
atk-s0304a0:444_5: nānāvaṇṇehi attharakehi santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0304a0:445_0: Āsanāni paññāpetvāti majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalathambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:445_1: paññāpetvā, tattha tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā
atk-s0304a0:445_2: ubhatolohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakavicittavitānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:445_3: bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne
atk-s0304a0:445_4: pupphajālaṃ kāretvā, tiṃsahatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ
atk-s0304a0:445_6: setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā pācīnabhittiṃ nissāya attano attano mahāpiṭṭhikakojave
atk-s0304a0:445_7: paññāpetvā manoramāni haṃsalomādipūritāni upadhānāni ṭhapāpesuṃ “evaṃ akilamamānā
atk-s0304a0:445_8: sabbarattiṃ dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āsanāni paññāpetvā”ti.
atk-s0304a0:446_0: Udakamaṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti mahākucchikaṃ udakacāṭiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “evaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0304a0:446_1: ca bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā hatthe vā dhovissanti pāde vā, mukhaṃ vā vikkhālessantī”ti
atk-s0304a0:446_2: tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūrāpetvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva udakavāsacuṇṇāni
atk-s0304a0:446_3: ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “udakamaṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā”ti.
atk-s0304a0:447_1: hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu ca telappadīpaṃ jālāpetvāti attho. Yena
atk-s0304a0:447_2: bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te sakyarājāno na kevalaṃ santhāgārameva, atha
atk-s0304a0:447_3: kho yojanāvaṭṭe kapilavatthusmiṃ nagaravīthiyopi sammajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu
atk-s0304a0:447_4: puṇṇaghaṭe ca kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetevā sakalanagaraṃ dīpamālādīhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:447_5: viya katvā “khīrūpage dārake khīraṃ pāyetha, dahare kumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojetvā sayāpetha,
atk-s0304a0:447_6: uccāsaddaṃ mā karittha, ajja ekarattiṃ satthā antogāme vasissati, buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā
atk-s0304a0:447_7: hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:448_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena navaṃ santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:448_1: tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira kāle ārocite
atk-s0304a0:448_2: bhagavā lākhārasatintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ rattadupaṭṭaṃ kattariyā padumaṃ kantento
atk-s0304a0:448_3: viya, saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ
atk-s0304a0:448_4: parikkhipanto viya, vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:448_5: pariyonandhanto viya, ratanasatubbedhe suvaṇṇagghike pavāḷajālaṃ khipamāno viya suvaṇṇacetiye
atk-s0304a0:448_6: rattakambalakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya, gacchantaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ rattavaṇṇavalāhakena
atk-s0304a0:448_7: paṭicchādayamāno viya, kañcanapabbatamatthake supakkalākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya,
atk-s0304a0:448_8: cittakūṭapabbatamatthakaṃ vijjulatāya parikkhipanto viya ca sacakkavāḷasineruyugandharaṃ
atk-s0304a0:448_9: mahāpathaviṃ sañcāletvā gahitaṃ nigrodhapallavasamānavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā,
atk-s0304a0:448_10: gandhakuṭidvārato nikkhami kañcanaguhato sīho viya udayapabbatakūṭato puṇṇacando
atk-s0304a0:448_11: viya ca. Nikkhamitvā pana gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:449_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhehi vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalaviṭape
atk-s0304a0:449_1: viya ārāmarukkhe kariṃsu. Tāvadeva ca attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0304a0:449_2: bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. Te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ – appicchā
atk-s0304a0:449_3: santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino
atk-s0304a0:449_6: viya suvaṇṇanāvā, pavāḷavedikāparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇapāsādo virocittha. Sāriputtamoggallānādayo
atk-s0304a0:449_7: mahātherāpi naṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammikā viya mahānāgā parivārayiṃsu
atk-s0304a0:449_8: vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0304a0:450_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi, vītadoso vītadosehi, vītamoho vītamohehi,
atk-s0304a0:450_1: nittaṇho nittaṇhehi, nikkileso nikkilesehi, sayaṃ buddho bahussutabuddhehi parivārito
atk-s0304a0:450_2: pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ, kesaraparivāritā viya kaṇṇikā, aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivārito
atk-s0304a0:450_3: viya chaddanto nāgarājā, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā,
atk-s0304a0:450_4: senaṅgaparivārito viya cakkavattirājā, marugaṇaparivārito viya sakko devarājā, brahmagaṇaparivārito
atk-s0304a0:450_5: viya hāritamahābrahmā, tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando asamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena
atk-s0304a0:451_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi
atk-s0304a0:451_1: pacchima-kāyato, dakkhiṇahatthato, vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:451_2: aggahesi. Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi moragīvavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0304a0:451_3: gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0304a0:451_4: ghanapathaviṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Evaṃ samantā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā
atk-s0304a0:451_5: buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi niccharitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandajālā
atk-s0304a0:451_6: viya cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya vidhāviṃsu. Sabbadisābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi
atk-s0304a0:451_7: vikiriyamānā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi siñcamānā viya, pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭaparikkhittā
atk-s0304a0:452_1: viya gaganatalaṃ, vikasitamiva padumavanaṃ, sabbapāliphullo viya yojanasatiko pāricchattako,
atk-s0304a0:452_3: dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
atk-s0304a0:452_4: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhi sammadeva
atk-s0304a0:452_5: pūritāhi samatiṃsapāramitāhi alaṅkataṃ. Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0304a0:452_6: dinnadānaṃ rakkhitasīlaṃ katakalyāṇakammaṃ ekasmiṃ attabhāve otaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0304a0:452_7: ṭhānaṃ alabhamānaṃ sambādhapattaṃ viya ahosi. Nāvāsahassabhaṇḍaṃ ekanāvaṃ āropanakālo
atk-s0304a0:452_8: viya, sakaṭasahassabhaṇḍaṃ ekasakaṭaṃ āropanakālo viya, pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ oghassa
atk-s0304a0:452_9: sambhijja mukhadvāre ekato rāsibhūtakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0304a0:453_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassāpi ca bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni
atk-s0304a0:453_4: thutighosā ca sabbā disā pūrayiṃsu. Devamanussanāgasupaṇṇagandhabbayakkhādīnaṃ akkhīni
atk-s0304a0:453_5: amatapānaṃ viya labhiṃsu. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassena gamanavaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ
atk-s0304a0:461: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0304a0:465: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0304a0:467: Na cāpi saṇikaṃ yāti, gacchamāno samāhito.
atk-s0304a0:468: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0304a0:469: Na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattañhi pekkhati.
atk-s0304a0:473: Tosayanto bahū satte, puraṃ seṭṭhaṃ upāgamī”ti.
atk-s0304a0:474_0: Vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa, evaṃvidhesu kālesu buddhassa sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa
atk-s0304a0:474_1: thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthābandhena vā yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:474_2: Dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. Appamāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā. Tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:474_3: vattuṃ asamatthā, pageva itarā pajāti. Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ
atk-s0304a0:474_4: pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena gandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjiyamāno santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:474_5: pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0304a0:475_0: Bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā. Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva
atk-s0304a0:475_1: upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ katvā
atk-s0304a0:475_3: viya ativirocittha. Ayaṃ panettha porāṇānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamaggo –
atk-s0304a0:488_0: Kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti ettha dhammakathā nāma santhāgārānumodanāpaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0304a0:488_1: pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā. Tadā hi bhagavā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto
atk-s0304a0:488_2: viya mahājambuṃ matthake gahetvā cālento viya yojanikaṃ madhubhaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena
atk-s0304a0:488_3: pīḷetvā madhupānaṃ pāyamāno viya kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ sakyānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ
atk-s0304a0:488_4: kathesi. “Āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ, mahārāja, mahantaṃ, tumhākaṃ āvāso mayā paribhutto,
atk-s0304a0:488_5: bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto, mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto pana dhammaratanena
atk-s0304a0:488_6: paribhuttoyevāti tīhi ratanehi paribhutto nāma hoti. Āvāsadānasmiñhi dinne sabbadānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:488_7: dinnameva hoti. Bhummaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vāpi ānisaṃso nāma paricchindituṃ
atk-s0304a0:488_8: na sakkā. Āvāsadānānubhāvena hi bhave bhave nibbattassāpi sambādhitagabbhavāso na
atk-s0304a0:488_9: hoti, dvādasahattho ovarako viya mātukucchi asambādhova hotī”ti. Evaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ
atk-s0304a0:490: Sirīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0304a0:494: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0304a0:499: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0304a0:500_0: Evaṃ “ayampi āvāse ānisaṃso, ayampi āvāse ānisaṃso”ti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekataraṃ
atk-s0304a0:500_1: diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi. Tattha imā tāva gāthāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā,
atk-s0304a0:500_2: pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā pana saṅgahaṃ nārohati. Sandassetvātiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0304a0:501_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā dve yāmā gatā. Yassa dāni kālaṃ maññathāti yassa tumhe gamanassa
atk-s0304a0:501_1: kālaṃ maññatha, gamanakālo tumhākaṃ, gacchathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā pana bhagavā
atk-s0304a0:501_2: te uyyojesīti? Anukampāya. Sukhumālā hi te, tiyāmarattiṃ nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:501_3: sarīre ābādho uppajjeyya. Bhikkhusaṅghopi mahā, tassa ṭhānanisajjānaṃ okāso laddhuṃ
atk-s0304a0:502_0: Vigatathinamiddhoti tatra kira bhikkhū yāmadvayaṃ ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi acālayiṃsu, pacchimayāme
atk-s0304a0:502_1: pana āhāro pariṇamati, tassa pariṇatattā bhikkhusaṅgho vigatathinamiddho jātoti akāraṇametaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:502_2: Buddhānañhi kathaṃ suṇantassa kāyikacetasikadarathā na honti, kāyacittalahutādayo
atk-s0304a0:502_3: uppajjanti, tena tesaṃ dve yāme ṭhitānampi nisinnānampi dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ thinamiddhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:502_4: vigataṃ, pacchimayāmepi sampatte tathā vigatameva jātaṃ. Tenāha “vigatathinamiddho”ti.
atk-s0304a0:503_0: Piṭṭhi me āgilāyatīti kasmā āgilāyati? Bhagavato hi chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa
atk-s0304a0:503_1: mahantaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ ahosi, athassa aparabhāge mahallakakāle piṭṭhivāto uppajjīti.
atk-s0304a0:503_2: Akāraṇaṃ vā etaṃ. Pahoti hi bhagavā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā ekampi dvepi sattāhāni
atk-s0304a0:503_3: ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ. Santhāgārasālaṃ pana catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo
atk-s0304a0:503_4: ahosi. Tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi, ettake ṭhāne gamanaṃ nipphannaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:503_5: Dhammāsanaṃ pattaṃ thokaṃ ṭhatvā nisīdi, ettake ṭhāne ṭhānaṃ nipphannaṃ. Dveyāmaṃ
atk-s0304a0:503_6: dhammāsane nisīdi, ettake ṭhāne nisajjā nipphannā. Idāni dakkhiṇena passena thokaṃ
atk-s0304a0:503_7: nipanne sayanaṃ nipphajjissatīti evaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0304a0:503_8: Upādinnakasarīrañca nāma “no āgilāyatī”ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā ciranisajjāya sañjātaṃ
atk-s0304a0:504_0: Saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvāti santhāgārassa kira ekapasse te rājāno paṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:504_1: kappiyamañcakaṃ paññāpetvā kappiyapaccattharaṇena attharitvā upari suvaṇṇatārakagandhamālādidāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:504_2: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhatelappadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu, “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato
atk-s0304a0:504_3: vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamanto idha nipajjeyya, evaṃ no imaṃ santhāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi
atk-s0304a0:504_4: iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti. Satthāpi tadeva
atk-s0304a0:504_5: sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nipajji. Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvāti “ettakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:504_6: kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapetvā, tañca kho aniddāyantova
atk-s0304a0:505_0: Avassutapariyāyanti avassutassa pariyāyaṃ, avassutassa kāraṇanti attho. Adhimuccatīti
atk-s0304a0:505_1: kilesādhimuccanena adhimuccati, giddho hoti. Byāpajjatīti byāpādavasena pūticitto
atk-s0304a0:505_2: hoti. Cakkhutoti cakkhubhāvena. Māroti kilesamāropi devaputtamāropi. Otāranti vivaraṃ.
atk-s0304a0:505_3: Ārammaṇanti paccayaṃ. Naḷāgāratiṇāgāraṃ viya hi savisevanāni āyatanāni, tiṇukkā viya
atk-s0304a0:505_4: kilesuppattirahaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tiṇukkāya ṭhapitaṭhapitaṭṭhāne aṅgārassujjalanaṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:505_5: ārammaṇe āpāthamāgate kilesānaṃ uppatti. Tena vuttaṃ labhetha māro otāranti.
atk-s0304a0:506_0: Sukkapakkhe bahalamattikapiṇḍāvalepanaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya nibbisevanāni āyatanāni, tiṇukkā
atk-s0304a0:506_1: viya vuttapakārārammaṇaṃ, tiṇukkāya ṭhapitaṭhapitaṭṭhāne nibbāpanaṃ viya nibbisevanānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:506_2: āyatanānaṃ ārammaṇe āpāthamāgate kilesapariḷāhassa anuppatti. Tena vuttaṃ neva labhetha māro otāranti.
atk-s0304a0:508_0: 244. Sattame dukkhadhammānanti dukkhasambhavadhammānaṃ. Pañcasu hi khandhesu sati
atk-s0304a0:508_1: chedanavadhabandhanādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ sambhavati, tasmā te dukkhasambhavadhammattā
atk-s0304a0:508_2: dukkhadhammāti vuccanti. Tathā kho panassāti tenākārenassa. Yathāssa kāme passatoti
atk-s0304a0:508_3: yenākārenassa kāme passantassa. Yathā carantanti yenākārena cārañca vihārañca anubandhitvā
atk-s0304a0:508_4: carantaṃ. Aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā diṭṭhā hontīti pariyeṭṭhimūlakassa ceva paṭisandhimūlakassa
atk-s0304a0:508_5: ca dukkhassa vasena aṅgārakāsu viya mahāpariḷāhāti diṭṭhā honti. Kāme pariyesantānañhi
atk-s0304a0:508_7: pariyeṭṭhimūlakampi, kāme paribhuñjantānaṃ kāmaparibhogacetanāya catūsu apāyesu dinnapaṭisandhimūlakampi
atk-s0304a0:508_8: mahāpariḷāhadukkhaṃ uppajjati. Evametassa duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vasena aṅgārakāsu
atk-s0304a0:509_0: Dāyanti aṭaviṃ. Puratopi kaṇṭakoti purimapasse vijjhitukāmo viya āsannaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0304a0:509_1: ṭhitakaṇṭako. Pacchatotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Heṭṭhā pana pādehi akkantaṭṭhānassa santike,
atk-s0304a0:509_2: na akkantaṭṭhāneyeva. Evaṃ so kaṇṭakagabbhaṃ paviṭṭho viya bhaveyya. Mā maṃ kaṇṭakoti
atk-s0304a0:509_3: mā maṃ kaṇṭako vijjhīti kaṇṭakavedhaṃ rakkhamāno.
atk-s0304a0:510_0: Dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādoti satiyā uppādoyeva dandho, uppannamattāya pana tāya
atk-s0304a0:510_1: kāci kilesā niggahitāva honti, na saṇṭhātuṃ sakkonti. Cakkhudvārasmiñhi rāgādīsu
atk-s0304a0:510_2: uppannesu dutiyajavanavārena “kilesā me uppannā”ti ñatvā tatiye javanavāre saṃvarajavanaṃyeva
atk-s0304a0:510_3: javati. Anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ vipassako tatiyajavanavāre kilese niggaṇheyya. Cakkhudvāre
atk-s0304a0:510_4: pana iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā āvajjanādīsu uppannesu voṭṭhabbanānantaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:510_5: sampattakilesajavanavāraṃ nivattetvā kusalameva uppādeti. Āraddhavipassakānañhi ayamānisaṃso
atk-s0304a0:511_0: Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyunti sudinnattherassa viya raṭṭhapālakulaputtassa viya ca kāyena
atk-s0304a0:511_1: vā satta ratanāni abhiharitvā vācāya vā “amhākaṃ dhanato yattakaṃ icchasi, tattakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:511_2: gaṇhā”ti vadantā pavāreyyuṃ. Anudahantīti sarīre paliveṭhitattā uṇhapariḷāhaṃ janetvā
atk-s0304a0:511_3: anudahanti. Sañjātasede vā sarīre laggantā anusentītipi attho. Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0304a0:511_4: cittanti idaṃ yasmā citte anāvaṭṭante puggalassa āvaṭṭanaṃ nāma natthi. Evarūpañhi
atk-s0304a0:511_5: cittaṃ anāvaṭṭanti, tasmā vuttaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ sutte vipassanābalameva dīpitaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:513_0: 245. Aṭṭhame dassananti paṭhamamaggassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paṭhamamaggo hi kilesapahānakiccaṃ
atk-s0304a0:513_1: sādhento paṭhamaṃ nibbānaṃ passati, tasmā dassananti vuccati. Gotrabhuñāṇaṃ pana
atk-s0304a0:513_2: kiñcāpi maggato paṭhamataraṃ passati, passitvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesapahānassa
atk-s0304a0:513_3: abhāvena na dassananti vuccati. Apica cattāropi maggā dassanameva. Kasmā? Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0304a0:513_5: visujjhati, phalakkhaṇe visuddhanti evaṃ kathentānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sutvā so bhikkhu
atk-s0304a0:513_6: “ahampi dassanaṃ visodhetvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhito dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:513_7: sacchikatvā viharissāmī”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ pucchi. So phassāyatanakammaṭṭhāniko
atk-s0304a0:513_8: channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ vasena rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā arahattaṃ patto. Ettha
atk-s0304a0:513_9: hi purimāni pañca āyatanāni rūpaṃ, manāyatanaṃ arūpaṃ. Iti so attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0304a0:514_0: Asantuṭṭhoti padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitattā asantuṭṭho. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0304a0:514_1: “ayaṃ padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathesi. Sakkā nu kho padesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā dassanavisuddhikaṃ
atk-s0304a0:514_2: nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitu”nti? Tato naṃ pucchi – “āvuso, tvaṃyeva nu kho idaṃ dassanavisuddhikaṃ
atk-s0304a0:514_3: nibbānaṃ jānāsi, udāhu aññepi jānantā atthī”ti. Atthāvuso, asukavihāre asukatthero
atk-s0304a0:514_4: nāmāti. So tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. Etenupāyena aññampi aññampīti.
atk-s0304a0:515_0: Ettha ca dutiyo pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhāniko rūpakkhandhavasena rūpaṃ, sesakkhandhavasena
atk-s0304a0:515_1: nāmanti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā anukkamena arahattaṃ patto. Tasmā sopi attanā adhigatamaggameva
atk-s0304a0:515_2: kathesi. Ayaṃ pana “imesaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sameti, paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvāva
atk-s0304a0:515_3: kathitaṃ, iminā nippadesesū”ti asantuṭṭho hutvā tatheva taṃ pucchitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0304a0:516_0: Tatiyo mahābhūtakammaṭṭhāniko cattāri mahābhūtāni saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca pariggahetvā
atk-s0304a0:516_1: arahattaṃ patto, tasmā ayampi attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi. Ayaṃ pana “imesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:516_2: aññamaññaṃ na sameti, paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitaṃ, dutiyena nippadesesu,
atk-s0304a0:516_3: tatiyena atisappadesesū”ti asantuṭṭho hutvā tatheva taṃ pucchitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0304a0:517_0: Catuttho tebhūmakakammaṭṭhāniko. Tassa kira samappavattā dhātuyo ahesuṃ, kallasarīraṃ
atk-s0304a0:517_1: balapattaṃ, kammaṭṭhānānipissa sabbāneva sappāyāni, atītā vā saṅkhārā hontu anāgatā
atk-s0304a0:517_2: vā paccuppannā vā kāmāvacarā vā rūpāvacarā vā arūpāvacarā vā, sabbepi sappāyāva.
atk-s0304a0:517_3: Asappāyakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Kālesupi purebhattaṃ vā hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā paṭhamayāmādayo
atk-s0304a0:517_4: vā, asappāyo kālo nāma natthi. Yathā nāma cāribhūmiṃ otiṇṇo mahāhatthī hatthena gahetabbaṃ
atk-s0304a0:517_5: hattheneva luñcitvā gaṇhāti, pādehi paharitvā gahetabbaṃ pādehi paharitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0304a0:517_6: evameva sakale tebhūmakadhamme kalāpaggāhena gahetvā sammasanto arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0304a0:517_7: tasmā esopi attanā adhigatamaggameva kathesi. Ayaṃ pana “imesaṃ aññamaññaṃ na sameti.
atk-s0304a0:517_8: Paṭhamena sappadesasaṅkhāresu ṭhatvā kathitaṃ, dutiyena nippadesesu, puna tatiyena
atk-s0304a0:517_9: sappadesesu, catutthena nippadesesuyevā”ti asantuṭṭho hutvā taṃ pucchi – “kiṃ nu
atk-s0304a0:517_10: kho, āvuso, idaṃ dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānaṃ tumhehi attanova dhammatāya ñātaṃ, udāhu
atk-s0304a0:517_11: kenaci vo akkhāta”nti? Āvuso, mayaṃ kiṃ jānāma? Atthi pana sadevake loke sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0304a0:517_12: taṃ nissāyetaṃ amhehi ñātanti. So cintesi – “ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0304a0:517_13: kathetuṃ na sakkonti, ahaṃ sabbaññubuddhameva pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī”ti yena
atk-s0304a0:518_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “yehi te pañho kathito, te cattāropi khīṇāsavā, sukathitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:518_1: tehi, tvaṃ pana attano andhabālatāya taṃ na sallakkhesī”ti na evaṃ vihesesi. Kārakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0304a0:518_2: panassa ñatvā “atthagavesako esa, dhammadesanāya eva naṃ bujjhāpessāmī”ti kiṃsukopamaṃ
atk-s0304a0:518_3: āhari. Tattha bhūtaṃ vatthuṃ katvā evamattho vibhāvetabbo – ekasmiṃ kira mahānagare
atk-s0304a0:518_4: eko sabbaganthadharo brāhmaṇavejjo paṇḍito paṭivasati. Atheko nagarassa pācīnadvāragāmavāsī
atk-s0304a0:518_5: paṇḍurogapuriso tassa santikaṃ āgantvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Vejjapaṇḍito tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0304a0:518_6: sammoditvā “kenatthena āgatosi bhadramukhā”ti, pucchi. Rogenamhi, ayya, upadduto,
atk-s0304a0:518_7: bhesajjaṃ me kathehīti. Tena hi, bho, gaccha, kiṃsukarukkhaṃ chinditvā, sosetvā jhāpetvā,
atk-s0304a0:518_8: tassa khārodakaṃ gahetvā iminā ciminā ca bhesajjena yojetvā, ariṭṭhaṃ katvā piva,
atk-s0304a0:518_9: tena te phāsukaṃ bhavissatīti. So tathā katvā nirogo balavā pāsādiko jāto.
atk-s0304a0:519_0: Athañño dakkhiṇadvāragāmavāsī puriso teneva rogena āturo “asuko kira bhesajjaṃ katvā
atk-s0304a0:519_1: arogo jāto”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “kena te, samma, phāsukaṃ jāta”nti.
atk-s0304a0:519_2: Kiṃsukāriṭṭhena nāma, gaccha tvampi karohīti. Sopi tathā katvā tādisova jāto.
atk-s0304a0:520_0: Athañño pacchimadvāragāmavāsī…pe… uttaradvāragāmavāsī puriso teneva rogena āturo
atk-s0304a0:520_1: “asuko kira bhesajjaṃ katvā arogo jāto”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “kena te, samma,
atk-s0304a0:520_2: phāsukaṃ jāta”nti? Kiṃsukāriṭṭhena nāma, gaccha tvampi karohīti. Sopi tathā katvā tādisova jāto.
atk-s0304a0:521_0: Athañño paccantavāsī adiṭṭhapubbakiṃsuko eko puriso teneva rogena āturo ciraṃ tāni
atk-s0304a0:521_1: tāni bhesajjāni katvā roge avūpasamamāne “asuko kira nagarassa pācīnadvāragāmavāsī
atk-s0304a0:521_2: puriso bhesajjaṃ katvā arogo jāto”ti sutvā “gacchāmahampi, tena katabhesajjaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0304a0:521_3: daṇḍamolubbha anupubbena tassa santikaṃ gantvā, “kena te, samma, phāsukaṃ jāta”nti
atk-s0304a0:521_4: pucchi. Kiṃsukāriṭṭhena sammāti. Kīdiso pana so kiṃsukoti. Jhāpitagāme ṭhitajhāmathūṇo
atk-s0304a0:521_5: viyāti. Iti so puriso attanā diṭṭhākārenava kiṃsukaṃ ācikkhi. Tena hi diṭṭhakāle
atk-s0304a0:521_6: kiṃsuko patitapatto khāṇukakāle diṭṭhattā tādisova hoti.
atk-s0304a0:522_0: So pana puriso sutamaṅgalikattā “ayaṃ ‘jhāpitagāme jhāmathūṇo viyā’ti āha, amaṅgalametaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:522_1: Etasmiñhi me bhesajje katepi rogo na vūpasamissatī”ti tassa veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho
atk-s0304a0:522_2: taṃ pucchi – “kiṃ nu kho, bho, tvaññeva kiṃsukaṃ jānāsi, udāhu aññopi atthī”ti. Atthi,
atk-s0304a0:522_3: bho, dakkhiṇadvāragāme asuko nāmāti. So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, svāssa pupphitakāle
atk-s0304a0:522_4: diṭṭhattā attano dassanānurūpena “lohitako kiṃsuko”ti āha. So “ayaṃ purimena viruddhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:522_5: āha, kāḷako lohitakato suvidūradūre”ti tassapi veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭho “atthi pana,
atk-s0304a0:522_6: bho, aññopi koci kiṃsukadassāvī, yena kiṃsuko diṭṭhapubbo”ti? Pucchitvā, “atthi pacchimadvāragāme
atk-s0304a0:522_7: asuko nāmā”ti vutte tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. Svāssa phalitakāle diṭṭhattā attano
atk-s0304a0:522_8: dassanānurūpena “ocirakajāto ādinnasipāṭiko”ti āha. Phalitakālasmiñhi kiṃsuko olambamānacīrako
atk-s0304a0:522_9: viya adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitaasikoso viya ca sirīsarukkho viya ca lambamānaphalo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:522_10: So “ayaṃ purimehi viruddhaṃ āha, na sakkā imassa vacanaṃ gahetu”nti tassapi veyyākaraṇena
atk-s0304a0:522_11: asantuṭṭho “atthi pana, bho, aññopi koci kiṃsukadassāvī, yena kiṃsuko diṭṭhapubbo”ti?
atk-s0304a0:522_12: Pucchitvā, “atthi uttaradvāragāme asuko nāmā”ti vutte tampi upasaṅkamitvā pucchi.
atk-s0304a0:522_13: So assa sañchannapattakāle diṭṭhattā attano dassanānurūpena “bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo”ti
atk-s0304a0:523_0: So “ayampi purimehi viruddhaṃ āha, na sakkā imassa vacanaṃ gahetu”nti tassapi veyyākaraṇena
atk-s0304a0:523_1: asantuṭṭho taṃ āha, “kiṃ nu kho, bho, tumhe attanova dhammatāya kiṃsukaṃ jānātha,
atk-s0304a0:523_2: udāhu kenaci vo akkhāto”ti? Kiṃ, bho, mayaṃ jānāma? Atthi pana mahānagarassa majjhe
atk-s0304a0:523_3: amhākaṃ ācariyo vejjapaṇḍito, taṃ nissāya amhehi ñātanti. “Tena hi ahampi ācariyameva
atk-s0304a0:523_4: upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī”ti tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0304a0:523_5: Vejjapaṇḍito tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā, “kenatthena āgatosi bhadramukhā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0304a0:523_6: Rogenamhi, ayya, upadduto, bhesajjaṃ me kathethāti. Tena hi, bho, gaccha, kiṃsukarukkhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:523_7: chinditvā sosetvā jhāpetvā tassa khārodakaṃ gahetvā iminā ciminā ca bhesajjena yojetvā
atk-s0304a0:523_8: ariṭṭhaṃ katvā piva, etena te phāsukaṃ bhavissatīti. So tathā katvā nirogo balavā pāsādiko jāto.
atk-s0304a0:524_0: Tattha mahānagaraṃ viya nibbānanagaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vejjapaṇḍito viya sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0304a0:524_1: Vuttampi ce taṃ “bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:524_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti catūsu dvāragāmesu cattāro vejjantevāsikā viya cattāro
atk-s0304a0:524_3: dassanavisuddhipattā khīṇāsavā. Paccantavāsī paṭhamapuriso viya pañhapucchako bhikkhu.
atk-s0304a0:524_4: Paccantavāsino catunnaṃ vejjantevāsikānaṃ kathāya asantuṭṭhassa ācariyameva upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0304a0:524_5: pucchanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ dassanavisuddhipattānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:525_0: Yathā yathā adhimuttānanti yena yenākārena adhimuttānaṃ. Dassanaṃ suvisuddhanti nibbānadassanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:525_1: suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ. Tathā tathā kho tehi sappurisehi byākatanti tena tenevākārena tuyhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:525_2: tehi sappurisehi kathitaṃ. Yathā hi “kāḷako kiṃsuko”ti kathento na aññaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0304a0:525_3: attanā diṭṭhanayena kiṃsukameva kathesi, evameva chaphassāyatanānaṃ vasena dassanavisuddhipattakhīṇāsavopi
atk-s0304a0:525_4: imaṃ pañhaṃ kathento na aññaṃ kathesi, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ
atk-s0304a0:526_0: Yathā ca “lohitako ocirakajāto bahalapattapalāso kiṃsuko”ti kathentopi na aññaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0304a0:526_1: attanā diṭṭhanayena kiṃsukameva kathesi, evameva pañcupādānakkhandhavasena catumahābhūtavasena
atk-s0304a0:526_2: tebhūmakadhammavasena dassanavisuddhipattakhīṇāsavopi imaṃ pañhaṃ kathento na aññaṃ
atk-s0304a0:526_3: kathesi, attanā adhigatamaggena dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathesi.
atk-s0304a0:527_0: Tattha yathā kāḷakakāle kiṃsukadassāvinopi taṃ dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ na tena aññaṃ
atk-s0304a0:527_1: diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃsukova diṭṭho, evameva chaphassāyatanavasena dassanavisuddhipattassāpi
atk-s0304a0:527_2: khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ kathitaṃ, attanā adhigatamaggena
atk-s0304a0:527_3: dassanavisuddhikaṃ nibbānameva kathitaṃ. Yathā ca lohitakāle ocirakajātakāle bahalapattapalāsakāle
atk-s0304a0:527_4: kiṃsukadassāvinopi taṃ dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃsukova
atk-s0304a0:527_6: dassanavisuddhipattassāpi khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ, na tena aññaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:528_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu rañño paccantimaṃ nagaranti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Sace tena bhikkhunā
atk-s0304a0:528_1: taṃ sallakkhitaṃ, athassa dhammadesanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. Sace na sallakkhitaṃ, athassa
atk-s0304a0:528_2: iminā nagaropamena tassevatthassa dīpanatthāya āvibhāvanatthāya āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0304a0:528_3: yasmā majjhimapadese nagarassa pākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā, sabbaso
atk-s0304a0:528_4: vā mā hontu, corāsaṅkā na honti, tasmā taṃ aggahetvā “paccantimaṃ nagara”nti āha.
atk-s0304a0:528_6: Toraṇāni nāma hi purisubbedhāni nagarassa alaṅkāratthaṃ karīyanti, coranivāraṇatthānipi
atk-s0304a0:528_7: hontiyeva. Atha vā toraṇanti piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassetaṃ nāmaṃ, thirapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭantipi
atk-s0304a0:528_8: attho. Chadvāranti nagaradvāraṃ nāma ekampi hoti dvepi satampi sahassampi, idha pana
atk-s0304a0:528_9: satthā chadvārikanagaraṃ dassento evamāha. Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Byattoti
atk-s0304a0:528_10: veyyattiyena samannāgato visadañāṇo. Medhāvīti ṭhānuppattikapaññāsaṅkhātāya medhāya samannāgato.
atk-s0304a0:529_0: Puratthimāya disāyātiādimhi bhūtamatthaṃ katvā evamattho veditabbo – samiddhe kira
atk-s0304a0:529_1: mahānagare sattaratanasampanno rājā cakkavatti rajjaṃ anusāsati, tassetaṃ paccantanagaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:529_2: rājāyuttavirahitaṃ, atha purisā āgantvā “amhākaṃ, deva, nagare āyuttako natthi, dehi
atk-s0304a0:529_3: no kiñci āyuttaka”nti āhaṃsu. Rājā ekaṃ puttaṃ datvā “gacchatha, etaṃ ādāya tattha
atk-s0304a0:529_4: abhisiñcitvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni katvā vasathā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu. Rājaputto pāpamittasaṃsaggena
atk-s0304a0:529_5: katipāheyeva surāsoṇḍo hutvā, sabbāni vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni hāretvā, nagaramajjhe
atk-s0304a0:529_6: dhuttehi parivārito suraṃ pivanto naccagītādiratiyā vītināmeti. Atha rañño āgantvā ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0304a0:530_0: Rājā ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha kumāraṃ ovaditvā, vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni
atk-s0304a0:530_1: kāretvā, puna abhisekaṃ katvā, ehī”ti. Na sakkā, deva, kumāraṃ ovadituṃ, caṇḍo kumāro
atk-s0304a0:530_2: ghāteyyāpi manti. Athekaṃ balasampannaṃ yodhaṃ āṇāpesi – “tvaṃ iminā saddhiṃ gantvā
atk-s0304a0:530_3: sace so ovāde na tiṭṭhati, sīsamassa chindāhī”ti. Iti so amacco yodho cāti idaṃ sīghaṃ
atk-s0304a0:530_4: dūtayugaṃ tattha gantvā dovārikaṃ pucchi – “kahaṃ, bho, nagarassa sāmi kumāro”ti.
atk-s0304a0:530_5: Esa majjhesiṅghāṭake suraṃ pivanto dhuttaparivārito gītādiratiṃ anubhonto nisinnoti.
atk-s0304a0:530_6: Atha taṃ dūtayugaṃ gantvā amacco tāvettha, “sāmi, vinicchayaṭṭhānādīni kira kāretvā
atk-s0304a0:530_7: sādhukaṃ rajjaṃ anusāsā”ti āha. Kumāro asuṇanto viya nisīdi. Atha naṃ yodho sīse
atk-s0304a0:530_8: gahetvā, “sace rañño āṇaṃ karosi, kara, no ce, ettheva te sīsaṃ pātessāmī”ti khaggaṃ
atk-s0304a0:530_9: abbāhi. Paricārakā dhuttā tāvadeva disāsu palāyiṃsu. Kumāro bhīto sāsanaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0304a0:530_10: Athassa te tattheva abhisekaṃ katvā setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā “sammā rajjaṃ anusāsāhī”ti
atk-s0304a0:530_11: raññā vuttaṃ yathābhūtavacanaṃ niyyātetvā yathāgatamaggameva paṭipajjiṃsu. Imamatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:531_0: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – samiddhamahānagaraṃ viya hi nibbānanagaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:531_1: sattaratanasamannāgato rājā cakkavatti viya sattabojjhaṅgaratanasamannāgato dhammarājā
atk-s0304a0:531_2: sammāsambuddho, paccantimanagaraṃ viya sakkāyanagaraṃ, tasmiṃ nagare kūṭarājaputto
atk-s0304a0:531_3: viya imassa bhikkhuno kūṭacittuppādo, kūṭarājaputtassa dhuttehi parivāritakālo viya
atk-s0304a0:531_4: imassa bhikkhuno pañcahi nīvaraṇehi samaṅgikālo, dve sīghadūtā viya samathakammaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0304a0:531_5: vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca, mahāyodhena sīse gahitakālo viya uppannapaṭhamajjhānasamādhinā
atk-s0304a0:531_6: niccalaṃ katvā cittaggahitakālo, yodhena sīse gahitamatte dhuttānaṃ disāsu palāyitvā
atk-s0304a0:531_7: dūrībhāvo viya paṭhamajjhānamhi uppannamatte nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvo, “karissāmi rañño
atk-s0304a0:531_8: sāsana”nti sampaṭicchitamatte vissaṭṭhakālo viya jhānato vuṭṭhitakālo, amaccena rañño
atk-s0304a0:531_9: sāsanaṃ ārocitakālo viya samādhinā cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā vipassanākammaṭṭhānassa
atk-s0304a0:531_10: vaḍḍhitakālo, tatthevassa tehi dvīhi dūtehi katābhisekassa setacchattaussāpanaṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:532_0: Nagaranti kho bhikkhu imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanantiādīsu pana
atk-s0304a0:532_1: cātumahābhūtikassātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vitthāritova. Kevalaṃ pana viññāṇarājaputtassa
atk-s0304a0:532_2: nivāsaṭṭhānattā ettha kāyo “nagara”nti vutto, tasseva dvārabhūtattā cha āyatanāni
atk-s0304a0:532_3: “dvārānī”ti, tesu dvāresu niccaṃ suppatiṭṭhitattā sati “dovāriko”ti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:532_4: ācikkhantena dhammarājena pesitattā samathavipassanā “sīghaṃ dūtayuga”nti. Ettha
atk-s0304a0:532_5: mahāyodho viya samatho, paṇḍitāmacco viya vipassanā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:533_0: Majjhe siṅghāṭakoti nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭako. Mahābhūtānanti hadayavatthussa nissayabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:533_1: mahābhūtānaṃ. Vatthurūpassa hi paccayadassanatthamevetaṃ catumahābhūtaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0304a0:533_2: Nagaramajjhe pana so rājakumāro viya sarīramajjhe hadayarūpasiṅghāṭake nisinno samathavipassanādūtehi
atk-s0304a0:533_3: arahattābhisekena abhisiñcitabbo vipassanāviññāṇarājaputto daṭṭhabbo. Nibbānaṃ pana
atk-s0304a0:533_4: yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ akuppaṃ adhikārīti katvā yathābhūtaṃ vacananti vuttaṃ. Ariyamaggo
atk-s0304a0:533_5: pana yādisova pubbabhāgavipassanāmaggo, ayampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā tādisoyevāti
atk-s0304a0:533_6: katvā yathāgatamaggoti vutto. Idaṃ tāvettha dhammadesanatthaṃ ābhatāya upamāya saṃsandanaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:534_0: Tassevatthassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ ābhatapakkhe pana idaṃ saṃsandanaṃ – ettha hi chadvārūpamā
atk-s0304a0:534_1: chaphassāyatanavasena dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatā, nagarasāmiupamā
atk-s0304a0:534_3: dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatā. Saṅkhepato panimasmiṃ sutte catusaccameva
atk-s0304a0:534_4: kathitaṃ. Sakalenapi hi nagarasambhārena dukkhasaccameva kathitaṃ, yathābhūtavacanena
atk-s0304a0:534_5: nirodhasaccaṃ, yathāgatamaggena maggasaccaṃ, dukkhassa pana pabhāvikā taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:536_0: 246. Navame yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vāti idaṃ satthā
atk-s0304a0:536_1: yathā nāma mahākuṭumbiko mahantaṃ kasikammaṃ katvā, nipphannasasso gharadvāre maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0304a0:536_2: katvā, ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ pavatteyya. Kiñcāpi tena ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:536_3: dvīsu pana parisāsu santappitāsu sesajanampi santappetiyeva, evameva bhagavā samadhikāni
atk-s0304a0:536_4: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigantvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0304a0:536_5: jetavanamahāvihāre nisinno bhikkhuparisāya ceva bhikkhuniparisāya ca mahādhammayāgaṃ
atk-s0304a0:536_6: yajanto vīṇopamasuttaṃ ārabhi. Taṃ penetaṃ kiñcāpi dve parisā sandhāya āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:536_7: catunnampi pana parisānaṃ avāritaṃ. Tasmā sabbehipi sotabbañceva saddhātabbañca,
atk-s0304a0:537_0: Tattha chandotiādīsu chando nāma pubbuppattikā dubbalataṇhā, so rañjetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0304a0:537_1: Aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā pana balavataṇhā rāgo nāma, so rañjetuṃ sakkoti. Daṇḍādānādīni
atk-s0304a0:537_2: kātuṃ asamattho pubbuppattiko dubbalakodho doso nāma. Tāni kātuṃ samattho aparāparuppattiko
atk-s0304a0:537_3: balavakodho paṭighaṃ nāma. Moho pana mohanasammohanavasena uppannaṃ aññāṇaṃ. Evamettha
atk-s0304a0:537_4: pañcahipi padehi tīṇi akusalamūlāni gahitāni. Tesu gahitesu sabbepi tammūlakā kilesā
atk-s0304a0:537_5: gahitāva honti. “Chando rāgo”ti vā padadvayena aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittuppādā, “doso
atk-s0304a0:537_6: paṭigha”nti padadvayena dve domanassasahagatacittuppādā, mohapadena lobhadosarahitā
atk-s0304a0:537_7: dve uddhaccavicikicchāsahagatacittuppādā gahitāti. Evaṃ sabbepi dvādasa cittuppādā dassitāva honti.
atk-s0304a0:538_0: Sabhayoti kilesacorānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā sabhayo. Sappaṭibhayoti vadhabandhanādīnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:538_1: kāraṇattā sappaṭibhayo. Sakaṇṭakoti rāgādīhi kaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭako. Sagahanoti rāgagahanādīhi
atk-s0304a0:538_2: sagahano. Ummaggoti devalokaṃ vā manussalokaṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā gacchantassa amaggo.
atk-s0304a0:538_4: kummaggo. Duhitikoti ettha ihitīti iriyanā, dukkhā ihiti etthāti, duhitiko. Yasmiñhi
atk-s0304a0:538_5: magge mūlaphalādikhādanīyaṃ vā sāyanīyaṃ vā natthi, tasmiṃ iriyanā dukkhā hoti, na
atk-s0304a0:538_6: sakkā taṃ paṭipajjitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ. Kilesamaggampi paṭipajjitvā na sakkā
atk-s0304a0:538_7: sampattibhavaṃ gantunti kilesamaggo duhitikoti vutto. Dvīhitikotipi pāṭho, esevattho.
atk-s0304a0:539_0: Tato cittaṃ nivārayeti tehi cakkhuviññeyyehi rūpehi taṃ chandādivasena pavattacittaṃ
atk-s0304a0:539_1: asubhāvajjanādīhi upāyehi nivāraye. Cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhārammaṇe rāge uppanne asubhato
atk-s0304a0:539_2: āvajjantassa cittaṃ nivattati, aniṭṭhārammaṇe dose uppanne mettato āvajjantassa cittaṃ
atk-s0304a0:539_3: nivattati, majjhattārammaṇe mohe uppanne uddesaparipucchaṃ garuvāsaṃ āvajjantassa
atk-s0304a0:539_4: cittaṃ nivattati. Evaṃ asakkontena pana satthumahattataṃ dhammassa svākkhātatā saṅghassa
atk-s0304a0:539_5: suppaṭipatti ca āvajjitabbā. Satthumahattataṃ paccavekkhatopi hi dhammassa svākkhātataṃ
atk-s0304a0:539_6: saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ paccavekkhatopi cittaṃ nivattati. Tena vuttaṃ “asubhāvajjanādīhi
atk-s0304a0:540_0: Kiṭṭhanti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassaṃ. Sampannanti paripuṇṇaṃ sunipphannaṃ. Kiṭṭhādoti
atk-s0304a0:540_1: sassakhādako. Evameva khoti ettha sampannakiṭṭhaṃ viya pañca kāmaguṇā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0304a0:540_2: kiṭṭhādo goṇo viya kūṭacittaṃ, kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādakālo viya bhikkhuno chasu dvāresu
atk-s0304a0:540_3: satiṃ pahāya vicaraṇakālo, kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādamāgamma goṇena gahitagabbhassa kiṭṭhassa
atk-s0304a0:540_4: khāditattā sassasāmino sassaphalānadhigamo viya chadvārarakkhikāya satiyā vippavāsamāgamma
atk-s0304a0:540_5: pañcakāmaguṇaṃ assādentena cittena kusalapakkhassa nāsitattā bhikkhuno sāmaññaphalādhigamābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0304a0:541_0: Uparighaṭāyanti dvinnaṃ siṅgānaṃ antare. Suniggahitaṃ niggaṇheyyāti ghaṭāyaṃ patiṭṭhite
atk-s0304a0:541_1: nāsārajjuke suṭṭhu niggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇheyya. Daṇḍenāti muggarasadisena thūladaṇḍakena.
atk-s0304a0:541_2: Evañhi so bhikkhave goṇoti evaṃ so kiṭṭhārakkhassa pamādamanvāya yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0304a0:541_3: kiṭṭhaṃ otaritukāmo hoti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe evaṃ niggaṇhitvā tāḷetvā osajjanena
atk-s0304a0:542_0: Evameva khoti idhāpi sampannakiṭṭhamiva pañca kāmaguṇā daṭṭhabbā, kiṭṭhādo viya kūṭacittaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:542_1: kiṭṭhārakkhassa appamādo viya imassa bhikkhuno chasu dvāresu satiyā avissajjanaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:542_2: daṇḍo viya suttanto, goṇassa kiṭṭhābhimukhakāle daṇḍena tāḷanaṃ viya cittassa bahiddhā
atk-s0304a0:542_4: taṃ taṃ suttaṃ āvajjetvā cittuppādassa puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā mūlakammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0304a0:547_0: Udujitanti tajjitaṃ. Sudujitanti sutajjitaṃ, sujitantipi attho. Udu, sudūti idaṃ
atk-s0304a0:547_1: pana nipātamattameva. Ajjhattanti gocarajjhattaṃ. Santiṭṭhatītiādīsu paṭhamajjhānavasena
atk-s0304a0:547_2: santiṭṭhati, dutiyajjhānavasena sannisīdati, tatiyajjhānavasena ekodi hoti, catutthajjhānavasena
atk-s0304a0:547_3: samādhiyati. Sabbampi vā etaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā hi sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0304a0:548_0: Rañño vāti kassacideva paccantarañño vā. Saddaṃ suṇeyyāti paccūsakāle pabuddho kusalena
atk-s0304a0:548_1: vīṇāvādakena vādiyamānāya madhurasaddaṃ suṇeyya. Rajanīyotiādīsu cittaṃ rañjetīti
atk-s0304a0:548_2: rajanīyo. Kāmetabbatāya kamanīyo. Cittaṃ madayatīti madanīyo. Cittaṃ mucchitaṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:548_3: karaṇato mucchiyatīti mucchanīyo. Ābandhitvā viya gahaṇato bandhatīti bandhanīyo.
atk-s0304a0:548_4: Alaṃ me, bhoti vīṇāya saṇṭhānaṃ disvā taṃ anicchanto evamāha. Upadhāraṇeti veṭṭhake.
atk-s0304a0:549_0: So taṃ vīṇanti so rājā “āharatha naṃ vīṇaṃ, ahamassā saddaṃ pasissāmī”ti taṃ vīṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:549_1: gahetvā. Dasadhā vātiādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva dasadhā phāleyya, athassā saddaṃ apassanto
atk-s0304a0:549_2: satadhā phāleyya, tathāpi apassanto sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ kareyya, tathāpi apassanto
atk-s0304a0:549_3: “sakalikā jhāyissanti, saddo pana nikkhamitvā palāyissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī”ti
atk-s0304a0:549_4: agginā ḍaheyya. Tathāpi apassanto “sallahukāni masicuṇṇāni vātena bhassissanti, saddo
atk-s0304a0:549_5: sāradhaññaṃ viya pādamūle patissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī”ti mahāvāte vā ophuneyya.
atk-s0304a0:549_6: Tathāpi apassanto “masicuṇṇāni yathodakaṃ gamissanti, saddo pana pāraṃ gacchanto
atk-s0304a0:549_7: puriso viya nikkhamitvā tarissati, tadā naṃ passissāmī”ti nadiyā vā sīghasotāya pavāheyya.
atk-s0304a0:550: Evaṃ vadeyyāti sabbehipimehi upāyehi apassanto te manusse evaṃ vadeyya. Asatī kirāyanti asatī kira ayaṃ vīṇā, lāmikāti attho. Asatīti lāmakādhivacanametaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0304a0:551: “Asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0304a0:552: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0304a0:553_0: Yathevaṃ yaṃkiñci vīṇā nāmāti na kevalañca vīṇāyeva lāmikā, yatheva pana ayaṃ vīṇā
atk-s0304a0:553_1: nāma, evaṃ yaṃkiñci aññampi tantibaddhaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ lāmakamevāti attho. Evameva
atk-s0304a0:553_2: khoti ettha vīṇā viya pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā, rājā viya yogāvacaro. Yathā so rājā
atk-s0304a0:553_3: taṃ vīṇaṃ dasadhā phālanato paṭṭhāya vicinanto saddaṃ adisvā vīṇāya anatthiko hoti,
atk-s0304a0:553_4: evaṃ yogāvacaro pañcakkhandhe sammasanto ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetabbaṃ apassanto
atk-s0304a0:553_5: khandhehi anatthiko hoti. Tenassa taṃ khandhasammasanaṃ dassento rūpaṃ samanvesati
atk-s0304a0:554_0: Tattha samanvesatīti pariyesati. Yāvatā rūpassa gatīti yattakā rūpassa gati. Tattha
atk-s0304a0:554_1: gatīti gatigati, sañjātigati, salakkhaṇagati, vibhavagati, bhedagatīti pañcavidhā
atk-s0304a0:554_2: honti. Tattha idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma heṭṭhā avīcipariyantaṃ katvā upari akaniṭṭhabrahmalokaṃ
atk-s0304a0:554_3: anto katvā etthantare saṃsarati vattati, ayamassa gatigati nāma.
atk-s0304a0:555_0: Ayaṃ pana kāyo neva padumagabbhe, na puṇḍarīkanīluppalādīsu sañjāyati, āmāsayapakkāsayānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:555_1: pana antare bahalandhakāre duggandhapavanavicarite paramajegucche okāse pūtimacchādīsu
atk-s0304a0:555_2: kimi viya sañjāyati, ayaṃ rūpassa sañjātigati nāma.
atk-s0304a0:556_0: Duvidhaṃ pana rūpassa lakkhaṇaṃ, “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpa”nti evaṃ vutta
atk-s0304a0:558: Vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti. –
atk-s0304a0:559_0: Evaṃ vutto rūpassa abhāvo vibhavagati nāma. Yo panassa bhedo, ayaṃ bhedagati nāma.
atk-s0304a0:559_1: Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhettha upari yāva bhavaggā tesaṃ sañjātigati, salakkhaṇagatiyañca
atk-s0304a0:560_0: Tampi tassa na hotīti yadetaṃ rūpādīsu ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā evaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:560_1: diṭṭhitaṇhāmānaggāhattayaṃ, tampi tassa khīṇāsavassa na hotīti yathānusandhināva
atk-s0304a0:562: Pariyosāne ca nibbānaṃ, esā vīṇopamā kathā”ti.
atk-s0304a0:564_0: 247. Dasame arugattoti vaṇasarīro. Tesaṃyeva arūnaṃ pakkattā pakkagatto. Saravananti
atk-s0304a0:564_1: kaṇḍavanaṃ. Evameva khoti arugatto puriso viya dussīlapuggalo veditabbo. Tassa kusakaṇṭakehi
atk-s0304a0:564_2: viddhassa sarapattehi ca asidhārūpamehi vilikhitagattassa bhiyyosomattāya dukkhadomanassaṃ
atk-s0304a0:564_3: viya tattha tattha sabrahmacārīhi “ayaṃ so imesañca imesañca kammānaṃ kārako”ti vuccamānassa
atk-s0304a0:565_0: Labhati vattāranti labhati codakaṃ. Evaṃkārīti evarūpānaṃ vejjakammadūtakammādīnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:565_1: kārako. Evaṃsamācāroti vidhavā gocarādivasena evarūpagocaro. Asucigāmakaṇṭakoti asuddhaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:566: Pakkhinti hatthisoṇḍasakuṇaṃ. Ossajjeyyāti vissajjeyya. Āviñcheyyunti ākaḍḍheyyuṃ. Pavekkhāmīti pavisissāmi. Ākāsaṃ ḍessāmīti ākāsaṃ uppatissāmi.
atk-s0304a0:567_0: Etesu pana ahi “bhogehi maṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā supissāmī”ti vammikaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:567_1: Susumāro “dūre bilaṃ pavisitvā nipajjissāmī”ti udakaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. Pakkhī “ajaṭākāse
atk-s0304a0:567_2: sukhaṃ vicarissāmī”ti ākāsaṃ ḍetukāmo hoti. Kukkuro “uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā
atk-s0304a0:567_3: usumaṃ gaṇhanto nipajjissāmī”ti gāmaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. Siṅgālo “manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0304a0:567_4: piṭṭhiṃ pasāretvā sayissāmī”ti āmakasusānaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti. Makkaṭo “ucce rukkhe
atk-s0304a0:567_5: abhiruhitvā disādisaṃ pakkhandissāmī”ti vanaṃ pavisitukāmo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:568_0: Anuvidhāyeyyunti anugaccheyyuṃ, anuvidhiyeyyuntipi pāṭho, anuvidhānaṃ āpajjeyyunti
atk-s0304a0:568_1: attho. Yattha so yāti, tattheva gaccheyyunti vuttaṃ hoti. Evamevāti ettha cha pāṇakā
atk-s0304a0:568_2: viya chāyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni, daḷharajju viya taṇhā, majjhe gaṇṭhi viya avijjā. Yasmiṃ
atk-s0304a0:568_3: yasmiṃ dvāre ārammaṇaṃ balavaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āviñchati.
atk-s0304a0:569_0: Imaṃ pana upamaṃ bhagavā sarikkhakena vā āhareyya āyatanānaṃ vā nānattadassanavasena.
atk-s0304a0:569_1: Tattha sarikkhakena tāva visuṃ appanākiccaṃ natthi, pāḷiyaṃyeva appitā. Āyatanānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:569_2: nānattadassanena pana ayaṃ appanā – ahi nāmesa bahi sittasammaṭṭhe ṭhāne nābhiramati,
atk-s0304a0:569_4: ekaggataṃ āpajjati. Evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ, maṭṭhāsu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu
atk-s0304a0:569_5: nābhiramati, oloketumpi na icchati, rūpacittapupphalatādivicittesuyeva pana abhiramati.
atk-s0304a0:569_6: Tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:570_0: Susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati, akkhiṃ nimīletvā carati. Yadā pana
atk-s0304a0:570_1: byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti, tadā tassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-s0304a0:570_2: hoti, sukhaṃ supati. Evameva sotampetaṃ bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ, kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva
atk-s0304a0:570_3: ajjhāsayaṃ karoti, kaṇṇacchiddākāsoyeva tassa saddasavane paccayo hoti. Ajaṭākāsopi
atk-s0304a0:570_4: vaṭṭatiyeva. Antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kayiramāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo
atk-s0304a0:570_5: bahi nikkhamati, dvāravātapānachiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparā ghaṭṭento
atk-s0304a0:570_6: āgantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Atha tasmiṃ kāle “asukaṃ nāma sajjhāyatī”ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.
atk-s0304a0:571_0: Evaṃ sante sampattagocaratā hoti, kiṃ panetaṃ sampattagocaranti? Āma sampattagocaraṃ.
atk-s0304a0:571_1: Yadi evaṃ dūre bheriādīsu vajjamānesu “dūre saddo”ti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyāti. No na
atk-s0304a0:571_2: bhavati. Sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite “dūre saddo, āsanne saddo, paratīre orimatīre”ti
atk-s0304a0:571_3: tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti, dhammatā esāti. Kiṃ etāya dhammatāya? Yato yato chiddaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:571_4: tato tato savanaṃ hoti candimasūriyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ viyāti asampattagocaramevetaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:572_0: Pakkhīpi rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati. Yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma
atk-s0304a0:572_1: ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhando hoti, tadā ekaggacittataṃ āpajjati. Evameva ghānampi ākāsajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:572_2: vātūpanissayagandhagocaraṃ. Tathā hi gāvo navavuṭṭhe deve bhūmiṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā
atk-s0304a0:572_3: ākāsābhimukho hutvā vātaṃ ākaḍḍhanti. Aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvāpi ca upasiṅghanakāle
atk-s0304a0:572_4: vātaṃ anākaḍḍhanto neva tassa gandhaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0304a0:573_0: Kukkuropi bahi caranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi upadduto hoti. Antogāmaṃ
atk-s0304a0:573_1: pavisitvā uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā nipannassa panassa phāsu hoti. Evameva
atk-s0304a0:573_2: jivhāpi gāmajjhāsayā āposannissitarasārammaṇā. Tathā hi tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:573_3: katvāpi pātova pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ hoti. Sukkhakhādanīyassa ca na
atk-s0304a0:574_0: Siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati, āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva
atk-s0304a0:574_1: panassa phāsu hoti. Evameva kāyopi upādiṇṇakajjhāsayo pathavīsannissitaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇo.
atk-s0304a0:574_2: Tathā hi aññaṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attanova hatthatale sīsaṃ katvā nipajjanti.
atk-s0304a0:574_3: Ajjhattikabāhirā cassa pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayo hoti. Susanthatassāpi hi sayanassa
atk-s0304a0:574_4: heṭṭhāṭhitānampi vā phalakānaṃ na sakkā anisīdantena vā anuppīḷantena vā thaddhamudubhāvo
atk-s0304a0:574_5: jānitunti ajjhattikabāhirā pathavī etassa phoṭṭhabbajānane paccayo hoti.
atk-s0304a0:575_0: Makkaṭopi bhūmiyaṃ vicaranto nābhiramati, hatthasatubbedhaṃ panassa rukkhaṃ āruyha
atk-s0304a0:575_1: viṭapapiṭṭhe nisīditvā disāvidisā olokentasseva phāsuko hoti. Evaṃ manopi nānajjhāsayo
atk-s0304a0:575_2: bhavaṅgapaccayo, diṭṭhapubbepi nānārammaṇajjhāsayaṃ karotiyeva mūlabhavaṅgaṃ panassa
atk-s0304a0:575_3: paccayo hotīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena pana āyatanānaṃ nānattaṃ visuddhimagge
atk-s0304a0:576: Taṃ cakkhu nāviñchatīti taṇhārajjukānaṃ āyatanapāṇakānaṃ kāyagatāsatithambhe baddhānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ āpannattā nākaḍḍhatīti imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:578_0: 248. Ekādasame yavakalāpīti lāyitvā ṭhapitayavapuñjo. Byābhaṅgihatthāti kājahatthā.
atk-s0304a0:578_1: Chahi byābhaṅgīhi haneyyunti chahi puthulakājadaṇḍakehi potheyyuṃ. Sattamoti tesu
atk-s0304a0:578_2: chasu janesu yave pothetvā pasibbake pūretvā ādāya gatesu añño sattamo āgaccheyya.
atk-s0304a0:578_3: Suhatatarā assāti yaṃ tattha avasiṭṭhaṃ atthi bhusapalāpamattampi, tassa gahaṇatthaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ hatā.
atk-s0304a0:579_0: Evameva khoti ettha catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni, catumahāpathe nikkhittayavakalāpī
atk-s0304a0:579_1: viya satto, cha byābhaṅgiyo viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavasena aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇāni,
atk-s0304a0:579_2: sattamā byābhaṅgī viya bhavapatthanā kilesā. Yathā catumahāpathe ṭhapitā yavakalāpī
atk-s0304a0:579_3: chahi byābhaṅgīhi haññati, evamime sattā aṭṭhārasahi ārammaṇadaṇḍakehi chasu āyatanesu
atk-s0304a0:579_4: haññanti. Yathā sattamena suhatatarā honti, evaṃ sattā bhavapatthanakilesehi suhatatarā
atk-s0304a0:580_0: Idāni nesaṃ taṃ bhavapatthanakilesaṃ dassetuṃ bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tatrāti
atk-s0304a0:580_1: sudhammāyaṃ bhummaṃ, sudhammāya devasabhāya dvāreti attho. Dhammikā kho devāti dhammikā
atk-s0304a0:580_2: ete devā nāma, yehi mādisaṃ asurādhipatiṃ gahetvā mayhaṃ bhedanamattampi na katanti
atk-s0304a0:580_3: sandhāya vadati. Adhammikā devāti adhammikā ete devā nāma, ye mādisaṃ asurādhipatiṃ
atk-s0304a0:580_4: navagūthasūkaraṃ viya kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitvā nisīdāpenti. Evaṃ sukhumaṃ
atk-s0304a0:580_5: kho, bhikkhave, vepacittibandhananti taṃ kira padumanāḷasuttaṃ viya makkaṭajālasuttaṃ
atk-s0304a0:580_6: viya ca sukhumaṃ hoti, chettuṃ pana neva vāsiyā na pharasunā sakkā. Yasmā pana citteneva
atk-s0304a0:581_0: Tato sukhumataraṃ mārabandhananti kilesabandhanaṃ panesaṃ tatopi sukhumataraṃ, neva
atk-s0304a0:581_1: cakkhussa āpāthaṃ gacchati, na iriyāpathaṃ nivāreti. Tena hi baddhā sattā pathavitalepi
atk-s0304a0:581_2: ākāsepi yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi gacchantipi āgacchantipi. Chijjamānaṃ panetaṃ
atk-s0304a0:581_3: ñāṇeneva chijjati, na aññenāti “ñāṇamokkhaṃ bandhana”ntipi vuccati.
atk-s0304a0:582_0: Maññamānoti taṇhādiṭṭhimānānaṃ vasena khandhe maññanto. Baddho mārassāti mārabandhanena
atk-s0304a0:582_1: baddho. Karaṇatthe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, kilesamārena baddhoti attho. Mutto pāpimatoti
atk-s0304a0:582_2: mārassa bandhanena mutto. Karaṇattheyeva vā idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, pāpimatā kilesabandhanena muttoti attho.
atk-s0304a0:583_0: Asmīti padena taṇhāmaññitaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayamahasmīti diṭṭhimaññitaṃ. Bhavissanti sassatavasena
atk-s0304a0:583_1: diṭṭhimaññitameva. Na bhavissanti ucchedavasena. Rūpītiādīni sassatasseva pabhedadīpanāni.
atk-s0304a0:583_2: Tasmāti yasmā maññitaṃ ābādhaṃ antodosanikantanavasena rogo ceva gaṇḍo ca sallañca,
atk-s0304a0:583_3: tasmā. Iñjitantiādīni yasmā imehi kilesehi sattā iñjanti ceva phandanti ca papañcitā
atk-s0304a0:583_4: ca honti pamattākārapattā, tasmā tesaṃ ākāradassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0304a0:584_0: Mānagatavāre pana mānassa gataṃ mānagataṃ, mānapavattīti attho. Mānoyeva mānagataṃ
atk-s0304a0:584_1: gūthagataṃ muttagataṃ viya. Tattha asmīti idaṃ taṇhāya sampayuttamānavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:584_2: Ayamahamasmīti diṭṭhivasena. Nanu ca diṭṭhisampayutto nāma māno natthīti? Āma natthi,
atk-s0304a0:584_3: mānassa pana appahīnattā diṭṭhi nāma hoti. Mānamūlakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:589_0: 249. Vedanāsaṃyutte sagāthāvaggassa paṭhame samāhitoti upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhito.
atk-s0304a0:589_1: Vedanā ca pajānātīti vedanā dukkhasaccavasena pajānāti. Vedanānañca sambhavanti tāsaṃyeva
atk-s0304a0:589_2: sambhavaṃ samudayasaccavasena pajānāti. Yattha cetāti yatthetā vedanā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0304a0:589_3: taṃ nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccavasena pajānāti. Khayagāminanti tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ khayagāminaṃ
atk-s0304a0:589_4: maggaṃ maggasaccavasena pajānāti. Nicchāto parinibbutoti nittaṇho hutvā kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0304a0:589_5: parinibbuto. Evamettha sutte sammasanacāravedanā kathitā. Gāthāsu dvīhi padehi samathavipassanā
atk-s0304a0:589_6: kathitā, sesehi catusaccaṃ kathitaṃ. Evamettha sabbasaṅgāhiko catubhūmakadhammaparicchedo vutto.
atk-s0304a0:591_0: 250. Dutiye adukkhamasukhaṃ sahāti adukkhamasukhañca sukhadukkhehi saha. Ajjhattañca
atk-s0304a0:591_1: bahiddhā cāti attano ca parassa ca. Mosadhammanti nassanasabhāvaṃ. Palokinanti palujjanakaṃ
atk-s0304a0:591_2: bhijjanasabhāvaṃ. Phussa phussa vayaṃ passanti ñāṇena phusitvā phusitvā vayaṃ passanto.
atk-s0304a0:591_3: Evaṃ tattha virajjatīti evaṃ tāsu vedanāsu virajjati. Idhāpi sutte sammasanacāravedanā
atk-s0304a0:593_0: 251. Tatiye acchecchi taṇhanti sabbampi taṇhaṃ chindi samucchindi. Vivattayi saṃyojananti
atk-s0304a0:593_1: dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi nimmūlakamakāsi. Sammāti hetunā kāraṇena. Mānābhisamayāti
atk-s0304a0:593_2: mānassa dassanābhisamayā, pahānābhisamayā ca. Arahattamaggo hi kiccavasena mānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:593_3: sampassati, ayamassa dassanābhisamayo. Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati, diṭṭhavisena
atk-s0304a0:594_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā ca pahīnattā ca ye
atk-s0304a0:594_1: ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati haritantaṃ vā”ti evaṃ vuttaantimamariyādanto ca,
atk-s0304a0:594_2: “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikāna”nti evaṃ vuttalāmakanto ca, “sakkāyo eko anto”ti
atk-s0304a0:594_3: evaṃ vuttakoṭṭhāsanto ca, “esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti (saṃ ni. 2.51;
atk-s0304a0:594_4: 2.4.71; udā. 71) evaṃ vuttakoṭanto cāti cattāro antā, tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0304a0:594_5: aduṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi, paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi, antimasamussayamattāvasesaṃ
atk-s0304a0:595_0: Sampajaññaṃ na riñcatīti sampajaññaṃ na jahati. Saṅkhyaṃ nopetīti ratto duṭṭho mūḷhoti
atk-s0304a0:595_1: paññattiṃ na upeti, taṃ paññattiṃ pahāya khīṇāsavo nāma hotīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0304a0:597_0: 252. Catutthe pātāloti pātassa alaṃ pariyatto, natthi ettha patiṭṭhāti pātālo. Asantaṃ
atk-s0304a0:597_1: avijjamānanti asambhūtattaṃ apaññāyamānattaṃ. Evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsatīti atthi mahāsamudde
atk-s0304a0:597_2: pātāloti evaṃ vācaṃ. So hi yaṃ taṃ balavāmukhaṃ mahāsamuddassa udakaṃ vegena pakkhanditvā
atk-s0304a0:597_3: cakkavāḷaṃ vā sineruṃ vā āhacca yojanadviyojanadasayojanappamāṇampi uggantvā puna
atk-s0304a0:597_4: mahāsamudde patati, yassa patitaṭṭhāne mahānarakapapāto viya hoti, yaṃ loke balavāmukhanti
atk-s0304a0:598_0: Yasmā pana tattha tathārūpānaṃ macchakacchapadevadānavānaṃ patiṭṭhāpi hoti sukhanivāsopi,
atk-s0304a0:598_1: tasmā asantaṃ asaṃvijjamānaṃ taṃ taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati nāma. Yasmā pana sabbaputhujjanā
atk-s0304a0:598_2: sārīrikāya dukkhavedanāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā pātassa alanti atthena ayameva
atk-s0304a0:598_3: pātāloti dassento sārīrikānaṃ kho etaṃ bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0304a0:599_0: Pātāle na paccuṭṭhāsīti pātālasmiṃ na patiṭṭhāsi. Gādhanti patiṭṭhaṃ. Akkandatīti
atk-s0304a0:599_1: anibaddhaṃ vippalāpaṃ vilapanto kandati. Dubbaloti dubbalañāṇo. Appathāmakoti ñāṇathāmassa
atk-s0304a0:599_2: parittatāya parittathāmako. Imasmiṃ sutte ariyasāvakoti sotāpanno. Sotāpanno hi ettha
atk-s0304a0:599_3: dhuraṃ, balavavipassako na tikkhabuddhi uppannaṃ vedanaṃ ananuvattitvā patiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0304a0:601_0: 253. Pañcame dukkhato daṭṭhabbāti vipariṇāmanavasena dukkhato daṭṭhabbā. Sallatoti
atk-s0304a0:601_1: dukkhāpanavinivijjhanaṭṭhena sallāti daṭṭhabbā. Aniccatoti adukkhamasukhā hutvā abhāvākārena
atk-s0304a0:601_2: aniccato daṭṭhabbā. Addāti addasa. Santanti santasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:603_0: 254. Chaṭṭhe tatrāti tesu dvīsu janesu. Anuvedhaṃ vijjheyyāti tasseva vaṇamukhassa
atk-s0304a0:603_1: aṅgulantare vā dvaṅgulantare vā āsannapadese anugatavedhaṃ. Evaṃ viddhassa hi sā
atk-s0304a0:603_2: anuvedhā vedanā paṭhamavedanāya balavatarā hoti, pacchā uppajjamānā domanassavedanāpi
atk-s0304a0:603_3: evameva purimavedanāya balavatarā hoti. Dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇanti dukkhāya vedanāya
atk-s0304a0:603_4: hi samādhimaggaphalāni nissaraṇaṃ, taṃ so na jānāti, kāmasukhameva nissaraṇanti jānāti.
atk-s0304a0:603_5: Tāsaṃ vedanānanti tāsaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ. Saññutto naṃ vedayatīti kilesehi sampayuttova
atk-s0304a0:603_6: hutvā taṃ vedanaṃ vedayati, na vippayutto. Saññutto dukkhasmāti karaṇatthe nissakkaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:603_7: dukkhena sampayuttoti attho. Saṅkhātadhammassāti viditadhammassa tulitadhammassa.
atk-s0304a0:603_8: Bahussutassāti pariyattibahussutassa paṭivedhabahussutassa ca. Sammā pajānāti bhavassa
atk-s0304a0:603_9: pāragūti bhavassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato, tadeva nibbānaṃ sammā pajānāti. Imasmimpi
atk-s0304a0:603_10: sutte ārammaṇānusayova kathito. Ariyasāvakesu ca khīṇāsavo ettha dhuraṃ, anāgāmīpi vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
atk-s0304a0:605_0: 255. Sattame yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkamīti “sadevake loke aggapuggalo tathāgatopi
atk-s0304a0:605_1: gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, upaṭṭhātabbayuttakā nāma gilānāti bhikkhū saddahitvā okappetvā
atk-s0304a0:605_2: gilāne upaṭṭhātabbe maññissantī”ti ca “ye tattha kammaṭṭhānasappāyā, tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:605_3: kathessāmī”ti ca cintetvā upasaṅkami. Kāye kāyānupassītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0304a0:605_4: parato vakkhāma. Aniccānupassīti aniccataṃ anupassanto. Vayānupassīti vayaṃ anupassanto.
atk-s0304a0:605_5: Virāgānupassīti virāgaṃ anupassanto. Nirodhānupassīti nirodhaṃ anupassanto. Paṭinissaggānupassīti
atk-s0304a0:606_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ dassitaṃ hoti? Imassa bhikkhuno āgamanīyapaṭipadā, satipaṭṭhānāpi hi
atk-s0304a0:606_1: pubbabhāgāyeva, sampajaññepi aniccānupassanā vayānupassanā virāgānupassanāti ca imāpi
atk-s0304a0:606_2: tisso anupassanā pubbabhāgāyeva, nirodhānupassanāpi paṭinissaggānupassanāpi imā dve
atk-s0304a0:606_3: missakā. Ettāvatā imassa bhikkhuno bhāvanākālo dassitoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0304a0:608: 256-257. Aṭṭhame imameva phassaṃ paṭiccāti vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ, atthato panetaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Kāyova hi ettha phassoti vutto. Navamaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0304a0:610: 258. Dasame sukhavedaniyanti sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Anupadavaṇṇanā panettha heṭṭhā vitthāritāva. Imasmiṃ suttadvaye sammasanacāravedanā kathitā.
atk-s0304a0:614_0: 259. Rahogatavaggassa paṭhame yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ dukkhasminti yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:614_1: taṃ sabbaṃ dukkhanti attho. Saṅkhārānaṃyeva aniccatantiādīsu yā esā saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā
atk-s0304a0:614_2: khayadhammatā vayadhammatā vipariṇāmadhammatā, etaṃ sandhāya yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:614_3: taṃ dukkhanti mayā bhāsitanti dīpeti. Yā hi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā, vedanānampi sā
atk-s0304a0:614_4: aniccatā eva. Aniccatā ca nāmesā maraṇaṃ, maraṇato uttari dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti iminā
atk-s0304a0:614_5: adhippāyena sabbā vedanā dukkhāti vuttā. Atha kho pana bhikkhu mayāti idaṃ na kevalaṃ
atk-s0304a0:614_6: ahaṃ vedanānaṃyeva nirodhaṃ paññāpemi, imesampi dhammānaṃ nirodhaṃ paññāpemīti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0304a0:614_7: āraddhaṃ. Vūpasamo ca passaddhiyo ca evarūpāya desanāya bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena
atk-s0304a0:614_8: vuttā. Saññāvedayitanirodhaggahaṇena cettha cattāro āruppā gahitāva hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:616: 260-261. Dutiye puthū vāyanti mālutāti bahū vātā vāyanti. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti. Tatiyaṃ vinā gāthāhi bujjhantānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:618_0: 262. Catutthe puratthimāti puratthimāya. Evaṃ sabbattha. Sāmisāpi sukhā vedanātiādīsu
atk-s0304a0:618_1: sāmisā sukhā nāma kāmāmisapaṭisaṃyuttā vedanā. Nirāmisā sukhā nāma paṭhamajjhānādivasena
atk-s0304a0:618_2: vipassanāvasena anussativasena ca uppannā vedanā. Sāmisā dukkhā nāma kāmāmiseneva
atk-s0304a0:618_3: sāmisā vedanā, nirāmisā dukkhā nāma anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato pihapaccayā
atk-s0304a0:618_4: uppannadomanassavedanā. Sāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma kāmāmiseneva sāmisā vedanā. Nirāmisā
atk-s0304a0:618_5: adukkhamasukhā nāma catutthajjhānavasena uppannā adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
atk-s0304a0:620: 263-266. Pañcamādīni cattāri heṭṭhā kathitanayāneva. Purimāni panettha dve paripuṇṇapassaddhikāni, pacchimāni upaḍḍhapassaddhikāni. Desanāya bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni.
atk-s0304a0:622_0: 267-268. Navame pañcakaṅgo thapatīti pañcakaṅgoti tassa nāmaṃ, vāsipharasunikhādanadaṇḍamuggarakāḷasuttanāḷisaṅkhātehi
atk-s0304a0:622_1: vā pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā so pañcakaṅgoti paññāto. Thapatīti vaḍḍhakījeṭṭhako.
atk-s0304a0:622_2: Udāyīti paṇḍitaudāyitthero. Pariyāyanti kāraṇaṃ. Dvepānandāti dvepi, ānanda, pariyāyenāti
atk-s0304a0:622_3: kāraṇena. Ettha ca kāyikacetasikavasena dve veditabbā, sukhādivasena tissopi, indriyavasena
atk-s0304a0:622_4: sukhindriyādikā pañca, dvāravasena cakkhusamphassajādikā cha, upavicāravasena “cakkhunā
atk-s0304a0:622_5: rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicaratī”tiādikā aṭṭhārasa, cha gehasitāni
atk-s0304a0:622_6: somanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni, cha gehasitāni domanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni,
atk-s0304a0:622_7: cha gehasitā upekkhā, cha nekkhammasitāti evaṃ chattiṃsa. Tā atīte chattiṃsa, anāgate
atk-s0304a0:622_8: chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:623_0: Pañcime ānanda kāmaguṇāti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Na kevalañhi dve ādiṃ katvā vedanā
atk-s0304a0:623_1: bhagavatā paññattā, pariyāyena ekāpi vedanā kathitā, taṃ dassento pañcakaṅgassa thapatino
atk-s0304a0:623_2: vādaṃ upatthambhetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Abhikkantataranti sundarataraṃ. Paṇītataranti
atk-s0304a0:623_3: atappakataraṃ. Ettha ca catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya adukkhamasukhā vedanā, sāpi santaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:623_4: paṇītaṭṭhena ca sukhanti vuttā. Nirodho avedayitasukhavasena sukhaṃ nāma jāto. Pañcakāmaguṇavasena
atk-s0304a0:623_5: hi aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ca uppannaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ nāma, nirodho avedayitasukhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:623_6: nāma. Iti vedayitasukhaṃ vā hotu avedayitasukhaṃ vā, niddukkhabhāvasaṅkhātena sukhaṭṭhena
atk-s0304a0:624_0: Yattha yatthāti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne. Sukhaṃ upalabbhatīti vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā avedayitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:624_1: sukhaṃ vā upalabbhati. Taṃ taṃ tathāgato sukhasmiṃ paññapeti, taṃ sabbaṃ tathāgato
atk-s0304a0:624_2: niddukkhabhāvaṃ sukhasmiṃyeva paññapetīti idha bhagavā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sīsaṃ katvā
atk-s0304a0:624_3: neyyapuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0304a0:628_0: 269. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame moḷiyasīvakoti sīvakoti tassa nāmaṃ. Cūḷā panassa atthi,
atk-s0304a0:628_1: tasmā moḷiyasīvakoti vuccati. Paribbājakoti channaparibbājako. Pittasamuṭṭhānānīti
atk-s0304a0:628_2: pittapaccayāni. Vedayitānīti vedanā. Tattha pittapaccayā tisso vedanā uppajjanti.
atk-s0304a0:628_3: Kathaṃ? Ekacco hi “pittaṃ me kupitaṃ dujjānaṃ kho pana jīvita”nti dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ
atk-s0304a0:628_4: samādiyati uposathakammaṃ karoti, evamassa kusalavedanā uppajjati. Ekacco “pittabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0304a0:628_5: karissāmī”ti pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, dasa dussīlyakammāni karoti,
atk-s0304a0:628_6: evamassa akusalavedanā uppajjati. Ekacco “ettakenapi me bhesajjakaraṇena pittaṃ na
atk-s0304a0:628_7: vūpasammati, alaṃ yaṃ hoti. taṃ hotū”ti majjhatto kāyikavedanaṃ adhivāsento nipajjati,
atk-s0304a0:629_0: Sāmampi kho etanti taṃ taṃ pittavikāraṃ disvā attanāpi etaṃ veditabbaṃ. Saccasammatanti
atk-s0304a0:629_1: bhūtasammataṃ. Lokopi hissa sarīre sabalavaṇṇatādipittavikāraṃ disvā “pittamassa
atk-s0304a0:629_2: kupita”nti jānāti. Tasmāti yasmā sāmañca viditaṃ lokassa ca saccasammataṃ atidhāvanti,
atk-s0304a0:629_3: tasmā. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha pana sannipātikānīti tiṇṇampi pittādīnaṃ
atk-s0304a0:629_4: kopena samuṭṭhitāni. Utupariṇāmajānīti visabhāgaututo jātāni. Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi
atk-s0304a0:629_5: anupadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo utu uppajjati, anupadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:629_6: malayasamuddatīrādivasenāpi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva. Tato jātāti utupariṇāmajātāni nāma.
atk-s0304a0:630_0: Visamaparihārajānīti mahābhāravahanasudhākoṭṭanādito vā avelāya carantassa sappaḍaṃsakūpapātādito
atk-s0304a0:630_1: vā visamaparihārato jātāni. Opakkamikānīti “ayaṃ coro vā pāradāriko vā”ti gahetvā
atk-s0304a0:630_2: jaṇṇukakapparamuggarādīhi nippothanaupakkamaṃ paccayaṃ katvā uppannāni. Etaṃ bahi
atk-s0304a0:630_3: upakkamaṃ labhitvā koci vuttanayeneva kusalaṃ karoti, koci akusalaṃ, koci adhivāsento
atk-s0304a0:630_4: nipajjati. Kammavipākajānīti kevalaṃ kammavipākato, jātāni. Tesupi hi uppannesu vuttanayeneva
atk-s0304a0:630_5: koci kusalaṃ karoti, koci akusalaṃ, koci adhivāsento nipajjati. Evaṃ sabbavāresu
atk-s0304a0:631_0: Tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ, kammavipākajānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:631_1: pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya. Imasmiṃ sutte lokavohāro nāma kathitoti.
atk-s0304a0:633_1: dhammakāraṇaṃ. Kāyikā ca cetasikā cāti ettha kāyikā kāmāvacareyeva labbhanti, cetasikā
atk-s0304a0:633_2: catubhūmikāpi. Sukhātiādīsu sukhā vedanā arūpāvacare natthi, sesāsu tīsu bhūmīsu
atk-s0304a0:633_3: labbhanti, dukkhā kāmāvacarāva, itarā catubhūmikā. Pañcake sukhindriyadukkhindriyadomanassindriyāni
atk-s0304a0:633_4: kāmāvacarāneva, somanassindriyaṃ tebhūmakaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ catubhūmakaṃ. Chakke
atk-s0304a0:633_5: pañcasu dvāresu vedanā kāmāvacarāva, manodvāre catubhūmikā, aṭṭhārasake chasu iṭṭhārammaṇesu
atk-s0304a0:633_6: somanassena saha upavicarantīti somanassūpavicārā. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Iti ayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:633_7: desanā vicāravasena āgatā, taṃsampayuttānaṃ pana somanassādīnaṃ vasena idha aṭṭhārasa vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0304a0:634_0: Cha gehasitāni somanassānītiādīsu “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:634_1: manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe
atk-s0304a0:634_2: vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:634_3: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ somanassa”nti. Evaṃ chasu dvāresu
atk-s0304a0:635_0: “Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi
atk-s0304a0:635_1: ca, sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0304a0:635_2: passato uppajjati somanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ
atk-s0304a0:635_3: somanassa”nti evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccatādivasena vipassanaṃ
atk-s0304a0:635_4: paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ sakkontassa “ussukkitā me vipassanā”ti somanassajātassa
atk-s0304a0:636_0: “Cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-s0304a0:636_1: appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ
atk-s0304a0:636_2: vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati
atk-s0304a0:636_3: gehasitaṃ domanassa”nti. Evaṃ chasu dvāresu “iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nānubhavissāmi nānubhavāmī”ti
atk-s0304a0:636_4: vitakkayato uppannāni kāmaguṇanissitadomanassāni cha gehasitadomanassāni nāma.
atk-s0304a0:637_0: “Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi
atk-s0304a0:637_1: ca, sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0304a0:637_2: disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0304a0:637_3: viharissāmi, yadariyā etarahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī”ti. Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu
atk-s0304a0:637_4: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0304a0:637_5: vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ domanassanti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu
atk-s0304a0:637_6: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā tadadhigamāya aniccatādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ
atk-s0304a0:637_7: asakkontassa “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:637_8: ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannāni domanassāni cha nekkhammasitadomanassāni nāma.
atk-s0304a0:638_0: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa
atk-s0304a0:638_1: avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa. Yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ
atk-s0304a0:638_2: sā nātivattati, tasmā sā upekkhā gehasitāti vuccatī”ti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe
atk-s0304a0:638_3: āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā viya rūpādīni anativattamānā tattheva laggā
atk-s0304a0:638_4: laggitā hutvā uppannakāmaguṇanissitā upekkhā cha gehasitaupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0304a0:639_0: “Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi
atk-s0304a0:639_1: ca, ‘sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0304a0:639_2: passato uppajjati upekkhā. Yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā ativattati, tasmā sā upekkhā
atk-s0304a0:639_3: nekkhammasitāti vuccatī”ti; evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa
atk-s0304a0:639_4: aniṭṭhe adussantassa asamapekkhane amuyhantassa uppannā vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā upekkhā
atk-s0304a0:639_5: nekkhammasitaupekkhā nāma. Imasmiṃ sutte sabbasaṅgāhako catubhūmakadhammaparicchedo
atk-s0304a0:641_0: 279. Ekādasame sāmisāti kilesāmisena sāmisā. Nirāmisatarāti nirāmisāyapi jhānapītiyā
atk-s0304a0:641_1: nirāmisatarāva. Nanu ca dvīsu jhānesu pīti mahaggatāpi hoti lokuttarāpi, paccavekkhaṇapīti
atk-s0304a0:641_2: lokiyāva, sā kasmā nirāmisatarā jātāti? Santapaṇītadhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannattā.
atk-s0304a0:641_3: Yathā hi rājavallabho cūḷupaṭṭhāko appaṭihārikaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rājakulaṃ pavisanto
atk-s0304a0:641_4: seṭṭhisenāpatiādayo pādena paharantopi na gaṇeti. Kasmā? Rañño āsannaparicārakattā.
atk-s0304a0:641_5: Iti so tehi uttaritaro hoti, evamayampi santapaṇītadhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannattā
atk-s0304a0:641_6: lokuttarapītitopi uttaritarāti veditabbā. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0304a0:642: Vimokkhavāre pana rūpapaṭisaṃyutto vimokkho attano ārammaṇabhūtena rūpāmisavaseneva sāmiso nāma, arūpapaṭisaṃyutto rūpāmisābhāvena nirāmiso nāmāti.
atk-s0304a0:645_0: 280-281. Mātugāmasaṃyuttassa paṭhame aṅgehīti aguṇaṅgehi. Na ca rūpavāti na rūpasampanno
atk-s0304a0:645_1: virūpo duddasiko. Na ca bhogavāti na bhogasampanno niddhano. Na ca sīlavāti na sīlasampanno
atk-s0304a0:645_2: dussīlo. Alaso cāti kantanapacanādīni kammāni kātuṃ na sakkoti, kusīto ālasiyo nisinnaṭṭhāne
atk-s0304a0:645_3: nisinnova, ṭhitaṭhāne ṭhitova niddāyati eva. Pajañcassa na labhatīti assa purisassa
atk-s0304a0:645_4: kulavaṃsapatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ na labhati, vañjhitthī nāma hoti. Sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0304a0:647: 282. Tatiye āveṇikānīti pāṭipuggalikāni purisehi asādhāraṇāni. Pāricariyanti paricārikabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:649_1: kātuṃ āraddho, puttakehipi yāciyamāno kiñci dātuṃ na icchati. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ “pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:649_2: maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā”ti. Majjhanhikasamaye pana mātugāmo kodhābhibhūtova
atk-s0304a0:649_3: hoti, antoghare kalahaṃ alabhanto paṭivissakagharampi gantvā kalahaṃ karoti, sāmikassa
atk-s0304a0:649_4: ca ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānāni vilokento vicarati. Tena vuttaṃ “majjhanhikasamayaṃ issāpariyuṭṭhitena
atk-s0304a0:649_5: cetasā”ti. Sāyanhe panassā asaddhammapaṭisevanāya cittaṃ namati. Tena vuttaṃ “sāyanhasamayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:652_0: 304. Dasame rūpabalantiādīsu rūpasampatti rūpabalaṃ, bhogasampatti bhogabalaṃ, ñātisampatti
atk-s0304a0:652_1: ñātibalaṃ, puttasampatti puttabalaṃ, sīlasampatti sīlabalaṃ. Pañcasīladasasīlāni
atk-s0304a0:652_2: akhaṇḍāni katvā rakkhantassa hi sīlasampattiyeva sīlabalaṃ nāma hoti. Imāni kho bhikkhave
atk-s0304a0:652_3: pañca balānīti imāni pañca upatthambhanaṭṭhena balāni nāma vuccanti.
atk-s0304a0:654_0: 305-313. Pasayhāti abhibhavitvā. Abhibhuyya vattatīti abhibhavati ajjhottharati.
atk-s0304a0:654_1: Neva rūpabalaṃ tāyatīti neva rūpabalaṃ tāyituṃ rakkhituṃ sakkoti. Nāsenteva naṃ,
atk-s0304a0:654_2: kule na vāsentīti “dussīlā saṃbhinnācārā atikkantamariyādā”ti gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīharanti,
atk-s0304a0:654_3: na tasmiṃ kule vāsenti. Vāsenteva naṃ kule, na nāsentīti “kiṃ rūpena bhogādīhi vā,
atk-s0304a0:654_4: parisuddhasīlā esā ācārasampannā”ti ñatvā ñātakā tasmiṃ kule vāsentiyeva, na nāsenti.
atk-s0304a0:656_0: 314. Jambukhādakasaṃyutte jambukhādako paribbājakoti evaṃnāmo therassa bhāgineyyo
atk-s0304a0:656_1: channaparibbājako. Yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayoti nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgo khīyati, tasmā
atk-s0304a0:656_2: nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayoti vuccati. Dosamohakkhayesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0304a0:657_0: Yo pana imināva suttena kilesakkhayamattaṃ nibbānanti vadeyya, so vattabbo “kassa
atk-s0304a0:657_1: kilesānaṃ khayo, kiṃ attano, udāhu paresa”nti? Addhā “attano”ti vakkhati. Tato pucchitabbo
atk-s0304a0:657_2: “gotrabhuñāṇassa kiṃ ārammaṇa”nti? Jānamāno “nibbāna”nti vakkhati. Kiṃ pana gotrabhuñāṇakkhaṇe
atk-s0304a0:657_3: kilesā khīṇā khīyanti khīyissantīti? “Khīṇā”ti vā “khīyantī”ti vā na vattabbā, “khīyissantī”ti
atk-s0304a0:657_4: pana vattabbāti. Kiṃ pana tesu akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu gotrabhuñāṇaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ
atk-s0304a0:657_5: ārammaṇaṃ karotīti? Addhā evaṃ vutte niruttaro bhavissati.
atk-s0304a0:658_0: Maggañāṇenāpi cetaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Maggakkhaṇepi hi kilesā “khīṇā”ti vā “khīyissantī”ti
atk-s0304a0:658_1: vā na vattabbā, “khīyantī”ti pana vattabbā, na ca akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayo
atk-s0304a0:658_2: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ. Yaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, taṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:658_3: Taṃ panetaṃ “rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammā”tiādīsu dukesu arūpino dhammāti saṅgahitattā
atk-s0304a0:660: 315. Arahattapañhabyākaraṇe yasmā arahattaṃ rāgadosamohānaṃ khīṇante uppajjati, tasmā “rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:662_0: 316-328. Te loke sugatāti te rāgādayo pahāya gatattā suṭṭhu gatāti sugatā. Dukkhassa
atk-s0304a0:662_1: kho āvuso pariññatthanti vaṭṭadukkhassa parijānanatthaṃ. Dukkhatāti dukkhasabhāvo.
atk-s0304a0:662_2: Dukkhadukkhatātiādīsu dukkhasaṅkhāto dukkhasabhāvo dukkhadukkhatā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0304a0:664_0: 329. Abhiratīti pabbajjāya anukkaṇṭhanatā. Naciraṃ āvusoti āvuso dhammānudhammappaṭipanno
atk-s0304a0:664_1: bhikkhu “pāto anusiṭṭho sāyaṃ visesamadhigamissati, sāyaṃ anusiṭṭho pāto visesamadhigamissatī”ti
atk-s0304a0:664_2: vuttattā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirassaṃ lahuyeva arahaṃ assa, arahatte patiṭṭhaheyyāti
atk-s0304a0:667_0: 332-339. Moggallānasaṃyutte kāmasahagatāti pañcanīvaraṇasahagatā. Tassa hi paṭhamajjhānavuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0304a0:667_1: pañca nīvaraṇāni santato upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Tenassa taṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ nāma
atk-s0304a0:667_2: ahosi. Taṃ pamādaṃ ñatvā satthā “mā pamādo”ti ovādaṃ adāsi. Dutiyajjhānādīsupi imināva
atk-s0304a0:667_3: nayena attho veditabbo. Ārammaṇasahagatameva hettha “sahagata”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:669_0: 340. Animittaṃ cetosamādhinti niccanimittādīni pahāya pavattaṃ vipassanāsamādhiṃyeva
atk-s0304a0:669_1: sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti. Nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ iminā vipassanāsamādhivihārena
atk-s0304a0:669_2: viharato vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahamāne. Yathā nāma purisassa tikhiṇena pharasunā
atk-s0304a0:669_3: rukkhaṃ chindantassa “suṭṭhu vata me pharasu vahatī”ti khaṇe khaṇe pharasudhāraṃ
atk-s0304a0:669_4: olokentassa chejjakiccaṃ na nipphajjati, evaṃ therassāpi “sūraṃ vata me hutvā ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0304a0:669_5: vahatī”ti vipassanaṃ ārabbha nikanti uppajjati. Atha vipassanākiccaṃ sādhetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0304a0:669_6: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti. Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā
atk-s0304a0:669_7: animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja vihāsinti sabbesaṃ niccasukhaattanimittānaṃ amanasikārena
atk-s0304a0:671: 341-342. Aveccappasādenāti acalappasādena. Dasahi ṭhānehīti dasahi kāraṇehi. Adhigaṇhantīti abhibhavanti, atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0304a0:673_0: 343. Cittasaṃyuttassa paṭhame macchikāsaṇḍeti evaṃnāmake vanasaṇḍe. Ayamantarākathā
atk-s0304a0:673_1: udapādīti porāṇakattherā atiracchānakathā honti, nisinnanisinnaṭṭhāne pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0304a0:673_2: ajānantā pucchanti, jānantā vissajjenti, tena nesaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi. Migapathakanti
atk-s0304a0:673_3: evaṃnāmakaṃ attano bhogagāmaṃ. So kira ambāṭakārāmassa piṭṭhibhāge hoti. Tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0304a0:673_4: “therānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā phāsuvihāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami. Gambhīre
atk-s0304a0:673_5: buddhavacaneti atthagambhīre ceva dhammagambhīre ca buddhavacane. Paññācakkhu kamatīti
atk-s0304a0:675_0: 344. Dutiye āyasmantaṃ theranti tesu theresu jeṭṭhakaṃ mahātheraṃ. Tuṇhī ahosīti
atk-s0304a0:675_1: jānantopi avisāradattā na kiñci byāhari. Byākaromahaṃ bhanteti “ayaṃ thero neva attanā
atk-s0304a0:675_2: byākaroti, na aññe ajjhesati, upāsakopi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ viheseti, ahametaṃ byākaritvā
atk-s0304a0:675_3: phāsuvihāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti cintetvā āsanato vuṭṭhāya therassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0304a0:675_4: evaṃ okāsamakāsi, katāvakāso pana attano āsane nisīditvā byākāsi.
atk-s0304a0:676_0: Sahatthāti sahatthena. Santappesīti yāvadicchakaṃ dento suṭṭhu tappesi. Sampavāresīti
atk-s0304a0:676_1: “alaṃ ala”nti hatthasaññāya ceva vācāya ca paṭikkhipāpesi. Onītapattapāṇinoti pāṇito
atk-s0304a0:676_2: apanītapattā dhovitvā thavikāya osāpetvā aṃse laggitapattāti attho.
atk-s0304a0:678: 345. Tatiye avantiyāti dakkhiṇāpathe avantiraṭṭhe. Kalyāṇaṃ vuccatīti “catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggissāmī”ti vacanaṃ niddosaṃ anavajjaṃ vuccati tayā upāsakāti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0304a0:680_0: 346. Catutthe sesakaṃ vissajjethāti tassa kira therehi saddhiṃyeva kaṃsathālaṃ pamajjitvā
atk-s0304a0:680_1: pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adaṃsu. So bhuttapāyāso therehiyeva saddhiṃ gantukāmo cintesi “ghare
atk-s0304a0:680_2: tāva upāsikā sesakaṃ vicāreti, idha panime dāsakammakārā mayā avuttā na vicāressanti,
atk-s0304a0:680_3: evāyaṃ paṇītapāyāso nassissatī”ti tesaṃ anujānanto evamāha. Kuthitanti kudhitaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:680_4: heṭṭhā santattāya vālikāya upari ātapena ca atitikhiṇanti attho. Idaṃ pana tepiṭake
atk-s0304a0:680_5: buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ. Paveliyamānenāti paṭiliyamānena sādhu khvassa bhanteti
atk-s0304a0:681_0: Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharīti adhiṭṭhāniddhiṃ akāsi. Ettha ca “mandamando sītakavāto
atk-s0304a0:681_1: vāyatu, abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvā devo ekamekaṃ phusāyatū”ti evaṃ nānāparikammaṃ – “savāto
atk-s0304a0:681_2: devo vassatū”ti evaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ ekatopi hoti. “Savāto devo vassatūti ekatoparikammaṃ,
atk-s0304a0:681_3: mandamando sītakavāto vāyatu, abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvā devo ekamekaṃ phusāyatū”ti evaṃ
atk-s0304a0:681_4: nānāadhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Vuttanayeneva nānāparikammaṃ nānādhiṭṭhānaṃ, ekato parikammaṃ
atk-s0304a0:681_5: ekato adhiṭṭhānampi hotiyeva. Yathā tathā karontassa pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0304a0:681_6: kataparikammassa parikammānantarena mahaggataadhiṭṭhānacitteneva taṃ ijjhati. Okāsesīti vippakiri.
atk-s0304a0:683_0: 347. Pañcame nelaṅgoti niddoso. Setapacchādoti setapaṭicchādano. Anīghanti niddukkhaṃ.
atk-s0304a0:683_1: Muhuttaṃ tuṇhī hutvāti tassa atthapekkhanatthaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni kaṇṇe kuṇḍalaṃ viya
atk-s0304a0:683_2: sañcālento “ayaṃ imassa attho, ayaṃ imassa attho”ti upaparikkhaṇatthaṃ muhuttaṃ tuṇhī
atk-s0304a0:683_3: hutvā. Vimuttiyāti arahattaphalavimuttiyā. Imaṃ pana pañhaṃ kathento upāsako dukkaraṃ
atk-s0304a0:683_4: akāsi. Sammāsambuddho hi “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0304a0:683_5: odātakaṃ tanukaṃ tuṅganāsika”nti attano diṭṭhena kathesi. Ayaṃ pana nayaggāhena “arahato
atk-s0304a0:685_0: 348. Chaṭṭhe kati nu kho bhante saṅkhārāti ayaṃ kira, gahapati, nirodhaṃ valañjeti,
atk-s0304a0:685_1: tasmā “nirodhapādake saṅkhāre pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā evamāha. Theropissa adhippāyaṃ
atk-s0304a0:685_2: ñatvā puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu anekesu saṅkhāresu vijjamānesupi kāyasaṅkhārādayova ācikkhanto
atk-s0304a0:685_3: tayo kho gahapatītiādimāha. Tattha kāyappaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati nibbattīyatīti
atk-s0304a0:685_4: kāyasaṅkhāro. Vācāya saṅkharoti nibbattetīti vacīsaṅkhāro. Cittappaṭibaddhattā cittena
atk-s0304a0:686_0: Katamo pana bhanteti idha kiṃ pucchati? “Ime saṅkhārā aññamaññaṃ missā āluḷitā avibhūtā
atk-s0304a0:686_1: duddīpanā. Tathā hi kāyadvāre ādānaggahaṇamuñcanacopanāni pāpetvā uppannā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā
atk-s0304a0:686_2: dvādasa akusalacetanāti evaṃ kusalākusalā vīsati cetanāpi, assāsapassāsāpi kāyasaṅkhārotveva
atk-s0304a0:686_3: vuccanti. Vacīdvāre hanusañcopanaṃ vacībhedaṃ pāpetvā uppannā vuttappakārāva vīsati
